The visit, which was scheduled to take place from 10 to 14 October, by United Nations (UN) Special Rapporteur on Torture Juan E. Méndez, has been postponed by the Government.	Hikûmetê dema hatina rapornivîsê îşkenceyê yê Neteweyên Yekbûyî bi paş de da.
In a statement on the website of the UN Human Rights High Commissioner, Méndez said the delay has caused a huge disappointment.	Rapornivîsê NYyê Méndez, dê di 10-14ê Çiriya Pêşiyê de bihatiya Tirkiyeyê hatina wî heta demekê nedîyar hat paşdedan.
“While I understand that the developments in Turkey during the last months demand the government’s fullest attention, I believe that postponing my visit at this late stage sends the wrong message,” said the human rights expert.	Komîseriya Bilind a Mafê Mirovan a Neteweyên Yekbûyî li malpera xwe ya fermî da zanîn ‘’paşdedana demê hêvîyên wan şikênandin.’’
“In light of the thousands of arrests made following the failed coup-attempt of 15 July 2016, and the allegations of severe overcrowding and poor conditions in many detention centres throughout the country, my visit is of utmost importance”.	Mêndezî got: ‘’ez dizanim ku ji ber tiştên di vê dawiyê de diqewimin hikûmet divê bala xwe bide ser gelek tiştan lê bipaşdedana demê, peyameka dî dide.’’
“Basic rights cannot be suspended even during the State of Emergency”	‘’Di Rewşa Awarte de jî mafên bingehîn nikare bêne paşguhkirin’’
Juan E. Méndez remarked in his statement that the torture ban and exercise of basic rights cannot be suspended even during the State of Emergency.	 Juan E. Mêndezî da zanîn ku di dema Halê Awarte de jî qedexeya îşkenceyê û mafên dî yên bingehîn çênabe bê paşguhkirin.
Former Editor-in-Chief of the Taraf daily, Ahmet Altan, was taken into custody last (September 22) night. Altan had already been detained as a part of the investigation into the media network of the Fethullahist Terrorist Organization / Parallel State Organization (FETÖ/PDY) and later released.	Berpirsê Weşana Giştî yê Rojnameya Tarafê yê berê Ahmet Altan çend roj ewil di çarçoveya “Lêpirsîna li dijî Rêxistina Fetullahiyên Teror (FETO/PDY) yên kesên di medyayê de” hatibû binçavkirin û piştre wî serbest berda bûn. Altan duh êvarê careke din hat binçavkirin.
What happened?	Çi bûbû?
Journalist and writer Ahmet Altan and his brother Prof. Dr. Mehmet Altan were detained for the words they used on the program "Özgür Düşünce," which was broadcast on Can Erzincan TV on July 14. They were charged for giving “subliminal coup messages”.	Nivîskar-rojnameger Ahmet Altan û birayê wî Prof. Dr. Mehmet Altan ku di 14ê Tîrmehê de beşdarê weşana Can Erzincanê bûbûn û bi hinceta di axavtinên xwe de “derbarê derbekirinê dayîna peyama sublîminal dane” ve di 10ê Îlonê de hatibûn binçavkirin.
The 10th Criminal Judgeship of Peace on duty has ruled to arrest Prof. Dr. Mehmet Altan for the crimes of “attempting to overthrow the Government of the Republic of Turkey or to prevent it from performing its duties” and “being a member of a terrorist organization”.  	10. Dadweriya Sulh Cezayê ya Stenbolê derbarê Mehmet Altan de bi îdiaya “Teşebus kiriye ku hukimeta Komara Tirkiyeyê ji holê rake û endamê rêxistina terorî ye” biryara girtinê da.
A curfew has been declared in 18 villages in the Lice, Hazro and Kocaköy districts of Diyarbakır as of 5 a.m. today (September 23) until further notice.  	Walîtiya Amedê duhî li 18 gundên navçeyên Hezro, Licê û Karazê yên Amedê qedexeya derketina derve îlan kir. Qedexe dê ji siet 5:00ê ve dest pê bike.
In a statement regarding the curfew, the Diyarbakır Governorship said that “operations will be conducted in order to neutralize members and supporters of the BTÖ (Separatist Terrörist Organization) who are active in the mountain and forest regions within the borders of Lice and Hani districts, to destroy their shelters, storage facilities and anti-aircraft weapon sites as well as to seize their ammunition.	Li malpera walîtîyê hatiye dîyarkirin ku operasyonek dê li wan deran bê pêk anîn û ji bo operasyonê derketina derve hatiye qedexekirin.
The Governorship announced that the curfew was declared in order to ensure the security of the residents’ lives and property during the operation.	Li gor daxuyaniya walîtîyê ‘’operasyon ji bo parastina can û malên welatiyan tê kirin.’’

Insel: We are in a darker period than 2007	Wêne: Berge Arabian
The president of the Prize Committee, Ahmet İnsel, spoke at the opening of the ceremony.	Weqfa Hirant Dînkî, Xelata Navneteweyî ya Hirant Dînkî ya 8. da Baroya Amedê ku serokê wê Tahîr Elçî bû.
“Almost 10 years have passed since Hrant Dink was killed. We are in a darker period than that of his murder in 2007. The coup attempt failed but a State of Emergency Regime in which the state of law has fallen by the wayside has has been realized. Alongside those who are genuinely guilty, tens of thousands of people are being detained without any legal ruling.”	Xelata dî parlamentera seroka qebîleya xwe Theresa Kachindamotoyê stand. Former Taraf daily newspaper Editor-in-Chief Ahmet Altan, who was detained as part of the investigation launched into “media leg of the Fethullahist Terror Organization (FETÖ)” and then released, has been arrested.	Berpirsê Weşana Giştî yê Rojnameya Tarafê yê berê Ahmet Altan çend roj ewil di çarçoveya “Lêpirsîna li dijî Rêxistina Fetullahiyên Teror (FETO/PDY) yên kesên di medyayê de” hatibû binçavkirin û piştre wî serbest berda bûn. Altan duh êvarê careke din hate binçavkirin
Altan was arrested on charges of “Attempting to annihilate the Republic of Turkey or trying to prevent it from doing its duty and being a member of a terror organization”.	Ahmet Altan ku îro sewqî dadgehê hatibû kirin bi îdiaya “teşebus kiriye ku hukimeta Komara Tirkiyeyê ji holê rake û endamê rêxistina terorî ye” biryara girtinê hat dayîn.
Charge: Delivering subliminal message	Sûc: “Derbarê derbekirinê de dayîna peyama sublîminal”
Attorney Veysel Ok representing them had said the reason for the detention was the words they used and delivered subliminal messages on the program "Özgür Düşünce" broadcasted on Can Erzincan TV on July 14.	Berpirsê Weşana Giştî yê Rojnameya Tarafê yê berê Ahmet Altan çend roj ewil di çarçoveya “Lêpirsîna li dijî Rêxistina Fetullahiyên Teror (FETO/PDY) yên kesên di medyayê de” hatibû binçavkirin û piştre wî serbest berda bûn. Altan duh êvarê careke din hat binçavkirin.

About Ahmet Altan	Serbest hatibû berdan
Ahmet Hüsrev Altan (born 1950) is a Turkish journalist and author. A working journalist for more than twenty years, he has served in all stages of the profession, from being a night shift reporter to editor in chief in various newspapers.	Dadgehê bi şertê kontrola edlî Ahmet Altan jî serbest berda û çûyîna wî ya derveyê welêt jî qedexe kir.
First, Hasan Cemal and Mehmt Güç have testified already.	Ewil Mehmet Guç û Hasan Cemal çûn îfade dan dozger.
Cemal: “No legal action was taken even after meeting with Öcalan”	Cemal: Di 1993an de jî ji min re lêpirsîn nehatibû vekirin
Güç: Reports are within the scope of freedom of expression	Guç: Ew nûçeyana di çarçoveya azadiya ramanê de ne
Mehmet Güç said in his testimony: “I was the editor-in-chief of the issue dated May 22, 2016 published by the daily called Özgür Gündem. I am of the opinion that the reports that have been subjected to the probe are within the scope of the freedom of the press and expression. I learned through the press that many journalists served as editor-in-chief on watch for Özgür Gündem. They called me from Özgür Gündem and I served as editor-in-chief on watch for one day. I deny the charges. I am innocent. I had seen the articles and reports to be published but I left the building before I saw the issue of the daily”.	Di 15ê Hezîrana 2016an de ji bo rojekê tenê ez bûme Berpirsê Weşana Giştî ya Ozgur Gundemê. Ew nûçeyên ku hûn behsê dikin li gorî min di çarçoveya azadiya ramanê de divê were dîtin. Gelek nivîskar û rojnamger beşdarî kampanyaya hevigiriya bi Ozgur Gundemê re bûn. Min jî van nûçeyan ji çapemeniyê dişopandin. Rojek ji Ozgur Gundemê li min jî geriyan û min jî qebûl kir. Ez wan sûcên ku hûn li min bar dikin qebûl nakim. Belê ew nûçeyên ku di rojnameye de hat weşandin min dîtibûn lê dema rojname dihat çapkirin ez ji wir zûda çûbûm.”
Mater: I went there to act in solidarity	Mater: Ez ji hevgiriyê çûm
Submitting to the prosecutor the BIA Media Monitoring reports and 10 Years in Freedom of Expression published by the İPS Communication Foundation, Mater said in her testimony:	Nadire Mater raporên Çavdêriya li Medyayê ya Biayê ku ji 2001an vir tên amadekirin û pirtûka azadiya xwe îfadekirinê ku ji Weşanên Weqfa Ragihandinê ya IPSe derketiye da dozger de û di îfadeya xwe de wiha got:
“I have been practicing journalism. I am the İPS Communication Foundation Chair and at the same time I work as consultant at the bianet.org news site. I went to Özgür Gündem to act in solidarity with the journalists. I served as editor-in-chief on watch for one day. I participated in this campaign since I believe in the right to information and journalists’ right to report. I also attended the news meeting, however, I didn’t have the chance to read all the reports. I am of the opinion that the reports released are within the scope of the freedom of the press and expression. I deny the charges.	“Ez rojnameger im û Seroka Lijneya Rêveberiyê ya Weqfa Ragihandinê IPSê me. Herwiha di heman demê de li bianet.orgê weke şêwirmend dixebitim. Ez ji bo hevgiriya bi rojnamegeran re çûme Ozgur Gundemê. Ji bo rojekê li wir bûm berpirsa weşana giştî ya rojnameyê. Li gorî min mafê gel heye ku bi agahî û nûçeyan agahdar be û mafê rojnamegeran jî heye ku nûçe çêbike û ez bi vê mebestê beşdarê kampanyayê bûm. Lêbelê ew derfetên min nebûn ku ez hemû nûçeyên weşandî konrol bikim. Li gorî min ev nûçeyên weşandî divê di çarçoveya azadiya ramanê û rojnamegeriyê de were nirxandin. Ez van sûcana qebûl nakim.”
Eryılmaz: People have a right to information	Eryilmaz: Mafê gel heye ku bi agahî û nûçeyan agahdar be
Tuğrul Eryılmaz said in his testimony:	Tugrul Eryilmaz di îfadeya xwe de wiha got:

My whole concern was the occupational solidarity.	“Nêzî 40 sal in ez rojnamer im û endamê lijneya etîkê ya cemiyeta rojnamegeran im. Ez ji bo hevgiriya bi rojnamegeran re çûm Ozgur Gundemê. Mafê gel heye ku bi agahî û nûçeyan agahdar be. Ji bo vê yekê ez beşdarê kampanyayê bûm. Ferasta min a rojnamegeriyê wiha ye.”
What had happened?	Çi bûbû?
İstanbul 8th Criminal Court of Peace shut down Özgür Gündem newspaper on August 16. The verdict decision said that the newspaper would be “temporarily shut down” but did not mention how long it would remain closed.	Piştî 24ê Tîrmeha 2015ê pevçûnan dest pê kir, gelek doz li Ozgûr Gûndemê hatin vekirin. Li hemberî zordariyan Ozgûr Gûndemê Kampanyaya Nobedariya Berpirsiyariya Weşanê da dest pê kirin.
Following the court’s decision, police raided the newspaper’s headquarters. 22 people were taken into custody.	Doza ‘’propagandaya rêxistina terorî’’ li wan kesên ku ji bo rojekê bûbûn berpirsên weşanê, hat vekirin.
Police have also raided the apartment of Filiz Koçali and Eren Keskin, as well as Sinan Zarakolu, who was registered at the same address. Rûniştina doza derbarê Arzû Demir de ku ji ber pirtûka wê ya 'Dagin Kadin Halî' hatiye vekirin, îro li 13. Dadgeha Cezayê Giran ya Stenbolê hat kirin.

Those taken into custody following the hacker organization RedHack’s last action, told their lawyers that they were being exposed to maltreatment and torture in detention. The Housing Development Administration (TOKİ) will complete the rest of the wall whose 200 km has been completed. A wall will have been built on the 911-km Syrian border when it is completed.	Wezareta Parastinê ji bo li ser sînorê digel Sûriyeyê yê 911 kîlometreyî dîwar bê çêkirin, TOKI(Birêvebiriya Avahiyên Komane) erkdar kir. Li ser hemiya sînorî dîwarekê bi sê metreyan bilind dê bê çêkirin û têlên jilêt pê ve dê li ser dîwaran bêne honandin.
Speaking to Star, Hürriyet and Milliyet dailies, TOKİ President Ergün Turan said:	Ergûn Turanê serokê TOKIyê ji Hûrrîyet, Mîllîyet û Starê re axiviye û ev agahî dane:
“The Ministry of National Defense (MSB) and governorships had closed 200 km of the Syrian border. As TOKİ we have made a tender of 200 km and we are in preparation of other 400 km.	‘’[Dîwarê] 200 kîlometreyên sînorî Wezareta Parastina Neteweyî û walîtîyan çêkiribûn. Me îhaleyên 200 kîlometreyan çêkirin û amadekariyên ji bo 400 kîlometreyan didomin.
“We have been continuing with our work of ‘putting up the wall’ for 15-20 days. We will have it completed the border wall of 700 km in five months.	‘’15-20 roj in ku em diwaran didanin em ê 700 kîlometreyên dîwarî di 5 mehan de temam bikin.
“Increasing the border security with Syria has become crucial with respect to our national security. Our border will be more secure as the wall is completed”.	‘’Ji bo paratina neteweyî, parastina dîwarê li ser sînorê Sûriyeyê gelekî girîng e. Bi temamkirina dîwarê tê çêkirin sînorên me dê ewletir bibin.
As to the specifications of the wall, Turan stated that the concrete wall will be of 3-meter high and 2-meter wide and that razor wire will be placed on the wall.	‘’Dîwar bi qalibên betonî ên ku sê metreyan bilind in û firehiya wan du metre ne, têne danîn.

Who is Emre Madran?	Emre Madran kî ye?
Between 1968-1973 he worked for the General Directorate for Foundations, and between 1974-1981 for the Ministry of Culture. In 1981, he became a lecturer in ODTÜ Faculty of Architecture Restoration Department. He was retired from his position in 2011.	Di navbera salên 1968-1972an de li Mudiriyeta Giştî ya Weqfan, di navbera 1974-1981an de li Wezareta Çandê xebitî. Di sala 1981an de li Fakulteya Avahîsaziyê ya ODTUyê de b3u akademîsyen.
He became a Central Management Board Member of Chamber of Architects in the 40th term (2006-2008) and 41th term of (2008-2010) of the Union of Chambers of Turkish Engineers and Architects (TMMOB)	Di bin sîwana Odeya Avahîsazan de bi awayekî akademîk li ser dîroka parastina berhemên dema Osmanî û Cimhuriyetê de xebitî.
Who is Nilay Vardar?	Nîlay Varda kî ye?
Nilay Vardar graduated from Galatasaray University Faculty of Journalism. She has been working as a journalist/editor in bianet since 2011. She is specialized on urban issues, ecology, people with disabilities and minorities. (HK/DG) 	Wê li Zanîngeha Galatasarayê beşa Rojnamegeriyê xwendiye. Ji 2011an vir ve li bianet’ê weke nûçegihan/edîtor dixebite. Bi taybetî li ser nûçeyên bajêr, ekolojî, kêmendam û kêmnetewe de dixebite.

Passports of journalist Celal Başlangıç and Cumhuriyet daily columnist Ayşe Yıldırım have been rendered invalid.	Peseporta rojnamegerê Celal Başlangiç û nivîskara Rojnameya Cumhurîyetê, Ayşe Yildirimê hatin betalkirin.
Speaking to bianet, Başlangıç explained:	Başlangiş ji bianetê re axivî û got:
“Passport bureau [of Security Directorate] asked court to cancel my passport as part of my trial heard by 14th Heavy Penal Court because of my service as editor-in-chief on watch Özgür Gündem [daily]. However, chief judge didn’t approve that and told them that they misinterpret the Statutory Decree. I have this ruling but we’ve learned in the airport that my and my wife’s passports were rendered invalid by the Security Directorate as we were going abroad. We have been given no justification. I don’t know why they cancelled my wife’s [passport], we don’t know if they did it because she is a journalist or just because she is my wife”.	‘’Ji ber lêpirsîna li ser min ku li Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a14. berdewam dike, berpirsiyarîya peseportan ji dadgehê xwestiye biryara betalkirina peseporta min bide.
Participating in the “Editor-in-Chief on Watch” campaign launched to act in solidarity with Özgür Gündem, journalist Başlangıç is being tried on charges of “Openly inciting to commit crime”, “Praising crime and criminal” and “Propagandizing for a terror organization”	Dadgerî ev yek qebûl nekiriye û gotiye ku Biryarnameya di Hikmê Qanûnan de xelet tê şîrovekirin. Ev biryara dadgerî li nik min e lê li balafirgehê em pê hesiyan ku peseporta me hatiye betalkirin. Ti sebeb nîşanî me nekirin. Em nizanin çima ya hevsera min jî hat betalkirin, em nizanin ji ber ku ew rojnameger e an jî ji ber ku hevsera min e, peseporta wê hatiye betalkirin.’’

Nûnerê Weqfa Mafê Mirovan ya Tirkiyeyê (THIV) yê Cizîrê Dr. Serdar Kuni di 19ê Cotmehê de hat girtin û wî şandin Girtîgeha Şirnexê.
Human Rights Association (İHD) Hakkari Branch President İsmail Akbulut was detained on October 18 when he was home. Akbulut is still in custody.	Serokê IHDê (Komeleya Mafê Mirovan) ya Şaxa Colemêrgê Îsmaîl Akbulut jî di 18ê Cotmehê de li mala xwe hat binçavkirin û polêsan bi saetan li mala wî lêgerîn pêk anîn malê belawela kirin.
TİHV and İHD demanded release of the rights defenders by releasing a written statement.	THIV û IHD bi daxuyaniyeke nivîskî xwest ku ew her du parazvanên mafan serbest werin berdan.
“Main question of this arrest process is national and international treaties”	Lijneya Rêveberiya THIVê daxuyand ku Dr. Serdar Kuni bi îdiayên xeyalî hatiye girtin û wiha got:
TİHV Board declared that Küni was “arrested on abstract charges based on directly his occupational practices”.	“Li Cizîrê gelek dijwar e ku mirov karê xwe li gorî etîka pîşeyî pêk bîne. Di nav van şert û serdema hanê de Dr. Serdar Kuni yê ku bi awayekî dilxwaz û kedhelal li Cizîrê peywîra xwe pêk dianî, hat girtin.
“Küni has sustained his profession of medicine whose only reason for existence is protecting and developing human life with the medicine’s basic ethical and scientific references. For this reason, the main question of this arrest process is national and international treaties, universal ethical rules and conscience.	“Girtina Dr. Serdar Kune astengkirina kar û hewldanên THIVê yanê heldanên li dijî îşkenceyê bi xwe ye.
“This unlawfulness that Dr. Küni has been exposed to must be ended immediately”.	“Ev bi hiqûqiya ku li endamê me tê kirin divê demildest bi dawî bibe û Dr. Serdar Kuni serbest were berdan.”
İHD: It is unknown what he has been charged with	IHD: Sedema girtina wî jî negotin
İHD in its statement stated that İHD Hakkari Branch Chair İsmail Akbulut is still in custody in Hakkari Security Directorate but not allowed to meet his lawyer and couldn’t be learned of what he has been charged with.	Di daxuyaniya IHDê de jî hat gotin ku Serokê wan ê Şaxa Colemêrgê Îsmaîl Akbulut hê jî li Emniyeta Colemêgê binçavkirî ye, ji ber ku nahêlin bi parêzeran re hevdîtin bike nehatiye zanîn ka sedema binçavkirina wî çiye û got:
“Detention of human rights defenders in these conflict times is unacceptable.	“Di vî serdema hanê ku şer û pevçûn zêde ne de, binçavkirina parazvan û aktîvîstên mafên mirovan bi ti awayî nayê qebûlkirin.
Murat Şahin who had assaulted Cumhuriyet daily’s then editor-in-chief Can Dündar with a gun, has been released after six months of trial under arrest.	Mûrat Şahinê ku li ber dadgehê bi ser Can Dundar De gule reşandibû û piştre hatibû girtin, piştî 6 mehan serbest hat berdan.
On May 6, Friday an armed attack had been carried out against Can Dündar whilst verdict in hearing over his and the daily’s Ankara Representative Erdem Gül’s MİT Truck report had been awaited.	Rojnameger Can Dundar di 6ê Gulanê de dema ji ber nûçeya TIRên MITê dihatin dadkirin û navber dane rûniştina dozê li ber derê dadgehê rastî êrişa çekdarî hatibû. Di encama wê êrişê de tiştek bi Dundar nebû lê guleyek li çokê nûçegihanê NTVê Yagiz Şenkal ketibû.
Dündar was not hurt in the attack which took place in front of İstanbul Courthouse in Çağlayan. NTV reporter Yağız Şankal was wounded in his leg.	Piştî gulereşandinê, Mûrat Şahinê êrişkar hatibû binçavkirin û piştre hate girtin.
Following the attack, assaulter Murat Şahin was caught, brought to trial and was arrested on charge of “opposing the Law on Armed Weapons and Knives and armed threat”.	Rûniştina doza derbarê Mûrat Şahin, îro li 28. Dadgeha Asliye Cezayê ya Stenbolê de hat dîtin. Êrişkar Mûrat Şahin beşdarê dozê bû.
Can Dündar did not attend the hearing of the arrested suspect Murat Şahin before İstanbul 28th Criminal Court of Justice.	Di rûniştina dozê de parêzerê Şahin mafê axavtinê xwest û got ku li gorî çarçoveya qanûna înfazê ku di vê dawiyê de ketiye meriyetê, eger girtina muwekîlê wî dewam bike dê ev yek bibe maxdûriyet.
Providing additional time for defence attorneys, the hearing was adjourned	Bu da oldu:Basına saldırıya yargı onayı:Saldırgan serbest. https://t.co/YtowuquIzY
Following the court decision, Can Dündar as to the release of Murat Şahin shared a comment on Twitter and said described the decision as an "Approval by the judiciary for an attack on press".	
(HK/DG)	(HK/YO)
The results of the presidential elections of İstanbul Bar Association have been announced late Sunday (October 23).	Encamên hilbijartina Baroya Stenbolê hat eşkerekirin.
According to the final counts, Mehmet Durakoğlu from the “Principles First - Contemporary Lawyers Group” won the presidential elections of İstanbul Bar Association.	Li gorî encamên diyarkirî Mehmet Durakoglu dengên herî zêde (23092/%54.42) hilgirt û bû Serokê Baroya Stenbolê.
 Getting 13,019 votes out of 23,091-2 votes in total, Durakoğlu became the president with 54.42% of the votes.	Di hilbijartinê de namzeta “Parêzerên Azadîxwaz û Hemdem” Several Ballikaya Çelik jî 3.423 dengan girt.
After a break of two years, Turkey once again has become “world’s biggest journalist-prison” and ranked low in press freedom and transparency on international indices.  	Piştî du salan Tirkiye dîsa bû ‘’mezintirîn girtîgeha rojnamegeran’’ ji bo azadî û zelalîya karên medyayê di raporên navneteweyî de ket di rêzên dawiyê de.
Click to see the infographic	    Ji bo mezinkirina înfografîkê bitikîne
The Government has often been criticized for “becoming distant from its goals of democracy” and “using the State of Emergency to speed up its ideological transformation process within the state-structure” at national and international levels.	Desthilat di nava welatî û di nava dewletan de tê rexnekirin ku ‘’ew ji armancên xwe yên demokrasîyê bi dûr dikeve, ji bo guhertina îdeolojiya dewletê Rewşa Awarte şixulandiye û dişixulîne.’’
BİA Media Monitoring Report 2016 July-August-September points out to the diversity and vastness of administrative and judicial interventions on the media in the third quarter of the year; 226 journalists face the risk of a life imprisonment and 2,235 years and 4 months in prison.	Rapora Çavdêrîya BIAyê nîşan dide ku di Tîrmeh-Tebax û Îlona 2016ê de mûdaxaleyên îdarî û dadî yên li ser medyayê pirhêl û pirreng in; di mehên Tîrmeh-Tebax û Îlonê de tehdîda girtinê ket ser 226 rojnamegeran, bi giştî daxwaza 2.235 salên girtina di girtîgehan de ji bo wan tê xwestin, ji bo rojnamegerekî daxwaza girtina heta-hetayê tê kirin.
The report also demonstrates that 107 journalists and 10 distributors have entered October 2016 in prison, 78 journalists in custody and that 775 press cards and 49 passports have been revoked in the State of Emergency.	Rapor nîşan dide ku di Çiriya Pêşiyê ya 2016ê de, 107 rojnameger û 10 belavkerên rojnameyan di girtîgehê de ne, 78 rojnameger desteserkirî ne, ji ber Halê Awarte qerta rojnamegerîyê ya 775 rojnamegeran peseporta 49 rojnamegeran hatine betalkirin.
In these three months, action has been taken against 22 journalists for “defaming the President” or “defaming Recep Tayyip Erdoğan”. In accordance with Article 229 of the Turkish Penal Code (Defaming the President), two of these have been sentenced to a punitive fine of 3,130 euro each.	Di van sê mehan de, 22 rojnameger ji ber ‘’heqareta li Erdoganê serokkomar’’ hatine dadkirin.  Bi Maddeya 229ê ya TCKyê(Qanûna Cezayên Tirkan) du rojnameger hatine cezakirin û wan 10 hezar û 500 lîre ceza dane.
The report also demonstrates that in comparison to the last quarter,  the number of the arrested journalists has risen from 24 to 106 the detentions from 49 to 78 and the unemployed from 45 to 2,500.	Li gor rapora berê ya sêmehane, rapor nîşan dide ku hejmara rojnamegerên girtîn ji 24ê bûye 106, hejmara desteserkiriyan ji 49ê bûye 78, hejmara medyakarên bêkar ji 45ê bûye 2 hezar û 500.
Highlights from the Media Monitoring Report	Sernavên Çavdêriya li Medyayê
BİA Media Monitoring Report includes the chapters “Killed Journalists”, “Journalists Imprisoned”, “Assaults, Threats and Blockings”, “Investigations, On-going Trials, Verdicts”, “Defamation, Personal Rights and Claims for Damages”, “Bans, Closures and Pull-offs”, “Constitutional Court”, “European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR)”, ”Radio and Television Supreme Council (RTÜK)” and “Supreme Election Board (YSK)”.	Di Rapora Çavdêriya li Medyayê ya BIAyê de ev beş hene: ‘’rojnamegerên hatîn kuştin’’, ‘’rojnamegerên girtî’’,’’êrîş, astengkarî û tehdîd’’, ‘’lêpirsîn, dozên vebûyî û dozên dom dikin’’,’’heqaret, mafên kesayetiyan, dozên tezmînatê’’,’’astengkirina rojnamegeran’’,’’Dadgeha Makeqanûnê’’,’’DMME’’,’’RTUK’’ û ‘’YSK.’’
During these three months, the lawsuits brought against journalists on grounds of both the Turkish  Penal Code (TCK)  and Anti-Terror Law (TMK) have continued. The charges pressed against journalists, distributors and media outlet workers in these trials were “being a member of an armed organization”, “aiding an [illegal] organization” as well as “forming, conducting and controlling an [illegal] organization”.	Di sê mehan de dadkirina rojnamegeran bi TCK û TMKyê dom kir. Rojnameger û belavker bi tometên ‘’piştgiriya rêxistinê’’,’’endambûna rêxistinê’’, ‘’ava-kirin, sewq û îdarekirina rêxistinê.’’
Majority of  journalists imprisoned are from Gülen Community-owned media	Rojnamegerên girtî: Piraniya wan ji ‘’Medyaya Cimaetê’’ ne
107 journalists and 10 distributors have entered October 2016 in prison. 71 of these journalists work for Gülen Community-owned media outlets and 29 others as well as all of the distributors are from the Kurdish media. The aforementioned have been sent to prison on charge of being a member of an [illegal] organization.  	Di Çiriya Pêşiyê ya 2016ê de, 107 rojnameger û 10 belavker di girtîgehê de bûn. 71 rojnamegerên gitî ji Medyaya ‘’Cimaetê’’ 29 ji wan jî ji Medyaya Kurdan in. ev rojnameger bi tometa têkiliya digel ‘’rêxistinê’’ hatine girtin.
In the same quarter of 2015, 24 journalists and 9 distributors were in prison. 13 of the journalists and all of the distributors were from the Kurdish Media.	Di heman dewra 2015ê de, 24 rojnameger û 9 belavkar di girtîgehê de bûn. 13 ji rojnamegeran û hemî belavker medyakarên kurd bûn.
Of the 107 journalists in prison, 82 are under investigation, 18 are convicted, 1 other was convicted by a local court and still waits for the decision of Supreme Court of Appeal, 5 others are still being tried.	Ji 107 rojnamegeran lêpirsîn li ser 82 rojnamegeran hene, biryara girtina 18 rojnamegeran hatiye dayin, rojnamegerek li dadgeha bajarî hatiye dadkirin û li benda biryara Dadgeha Bilind e. Pênc rojnameger hê jî têne dadkirin.
9 assaults, 3 threats and 2 maltreatments	9 êrîş, 3 tehdîd û 2 mûameleya xerab
In the same quarter of 2015, 21 journalists, 3 media organs and 1 newspaper printing house had been attacked, 20 journalists, as well as 7 media organs had been threatened.	Di heman dewra 2015ê de, êrîş li 21 rojnameger, 3 organên medyayê û çapxaneyekê hatiye kirin. 20 rojnameger û 7 organên medyayê hatibûn tehdîtkirin.
In the entire year of 2015, In the entire year of 2015, 3 Syrian journalists and 1 newspaper columnist had been killed; 64 journalists, 4 media organs and 1 writer had been assaulted. In addition to that 38 journalists and  21 media organs had been threatened.	Di hemîya sala 2015ê de, 3 rojnamegerên ji Sûriyeyê û qunciknivîskarek hatibû kuştin, êrîş li 64 rojnamegeran, 4 organên medyayê û nivîskarekî hatibû kirin. 38 rojnameger û 21 organên medyayê hatibûn desteserkirin.
In the same quarter of 2015, 49 journalists and media workers were taken into custody and the figure was 120 for the entire year of 2015.	Di heman dewra 2015ê de, 49 rojnameger û xebatkarên medyayê hatibûn desteserkirin. Di hemiya sala 2015ê de 120 kes hatibûn desteserkirin.
Upon President Erdoğan’s declaration following the coup attempt on July 15, that he would withdraw the charges he had filed against approximately 3,000 individuals, some individuals were released in certain provinces including Antalya and Ankara.	Piştî hewildana derbekirinê Erdoganî eşkere kiribû ku ew ê dest ji giliya li nêzîkî 3 hezar kesan berde. Piştî vê yekê li Antalya û Enqereyê tehlîyeya bersûcan dest pê kir.
In the same quarter of 2015, 4 individuals including 1 journalist were sentenced to 7 years, 9 months and 25 days in prison (4 years deferred), 23 individuals in total including 11 journalists were still standing trial over their articles, criticisms and expressed opinions on same charges. New investigations were launched on same charges in accordance with Article 299 against 19 journalists and there were 3 new criminal complaints filed. A verdict of non-prosecution was filed for four journalists.	Di heman dewra par de, bi maddeya 299. a TCKyê çar kesên yek ji wan rojnameger bû hatine mehkûmkirin. Wan cezayê girtîgehê yê 7 sal û 9 meh û 25 rojan stand, ceza ji bo 4 salan hat paşdedan. 23 kesên 11 ji wan rojnameger bûn jî ji ber nivîs, rexne û hizrên xwe bi maddeya 299. hê jî têne dadkirin.
Defamation: 4 journalists stand trial facing 55 years in prison	Heqaretkirin: Derbarê 4 rojnamegeran de 55 sal ceza tê xwestin
In the third quarter of 2016, 4 journalists stood trial facing in total 55 years in prison.	Di serdema Tîrmeh-Tebax-Îlona 2016an de 4 rojnameger tev li ser hev bi daxwaza 55 sal û 4 meh cezayê hepiskirinê ve hatin dadkirin.
In the same quarter of last year (2015), 1 journalist was sentenced to 3 years and 6 months in prison, the cases brought against 10 journalists and 2 newspapers were still continuing and 3 new criminal charges were pressed. 1 newspaper was sentenced to pay compensation in amount of 1,500 euro for damages due to violation of personal rights and 5 journalists stood trial seeking 342,350 euro compensation payment in total. A new lawsuit was brought against 1 journalist seeking 30,050 euro in damages.	Di heman serdema sala borî de rojnamegerek bi 3 sal û 6 mehan cezayê hepiskirinê ve hatibû mehkûmkirin. Dozên derbarê 10 rojnameger û 2 saziyên rojnameyê de dewam dikirin û 3 dozên nû hatibûn vekirin. Bi îdiaya binpêkirina mafên ferdî ve rojnameyek bi 5 hezar TL cezayê peredayînê ve hat mehkûmkirin, 5 rojnameger bi temamî 1 milyon û 140 hezar TL cezayê temînatê ve dihatin dadkirin û derbarê rojnamegereke de bi 100 hezar TL cezayê tezmînatê ve dozeke nû hatibû vekirin.
TMK/TCK: Life imprisonment and 2,152 years in prison demanded for 191 journalists	TMK/TCK: 2152 sal cezayê hepiskirinê
In the 3rd Quarter of 2016, 117 journalists were tried in accordance with the Anti-Terror Law (TMK) facing 880 years and 6 months in prison. 61 journalists stood trial demanding 1,036 years in prison on charges of  “conducting [illegal] organization”, “being a member of an [illegal] organization” and“aiding an [illegal] organization”. 5 journalists are being tried facing 10 years in prison on charge of violating Article 301 (insulting Turkey, the Turkish nation, or Turkish government institutions) of the Turkish Penal Code.	Di serdema Tîrmeh-Tebax-Îlona 2016an de 117 rojnameger di çarçoveya TMKê de bi daxwaza 880 sal û 6 meh cezayê hepiskirinê ve hatin dadkirin. 61 rojnameger bi îdiayên “rêveberê rêxistinê ye”, “endamê rêxistinê ye”, “alîkarî daye rêxistinê” tev ser hev bi daxwaza 1036 sal cezayê hepiskirinê ve hatin dadkirin. 5 rojnameger jî bi îdiaya qanûna 301. ya TMKê îxlal kirine ve bi daxwaza 10 sal cezayê hepiskirinê ve hatin dadkirin.
The trials of 6 other journalists facing a sentence of life imprisonment and 216 years and 6 months in prison on charges of “providing and disclosing confidential documents regarding security of the state” still continued and 2 others were still being tried “inciting people to hatred and hostility” and 1 journalist for “violating the confidentiality of a trial”. The punishment demanded for all above mentioned charges equals to 1 life imprisonment and 2,152 years in prison in total.  	6 rojnameger beriya vê serdemê bi îdiya “belgeyên veşartî yên dewletê temîn kirine” dihatin dadkirin û ji yek ji wan re cezayê hepiskirina heta dawiya emrê, derbarê 5ên din de jî 216 sal û 6 meh ceza tê xwestin.  Bi hemû tewanbariyan derbarê rojnamegeran de yek cezayê hepiskirina heta dawiya emrê û 2152 sal jî ceza tê xwestin.
In this quarter, 32 journalists and rights advocates involved in the symbolic one-day act of solidarity with Özgür Gündem daily were put on trial on charge of “propagandizing for the terrorist organization”. Verdict of non-prosecution was rendered for 10 of these cases, 8 others are still on trial.	Di vê dema hanê de derbarê 32 rojnameger û aktivîstinên mafparêz de ji ber hevgiriya bi rojnameya Ozgur Gundemê re bi hinceta “propagandaya rêxistinê kirine” lêpirsîn hat vekirin. 10 ji wan lêpirsînan ji ber tinebûna delîlan betal bû, lê 8 lêpirsîn hêjî dewam dikin.
In the same quarter of last year (2015), 28 journalists stood trial in accordance with the Anti-terror Code facing 430 years and 6 months in prison. New investigations were launched or criminal complaints were filed against 4 journalists and 18 books on the same basis. 60 journalists in total were being tried on charges of  “conducting [illegal] organization”, “being a member of an [illegal] organization” and“aiding an [illegal] organization” facing 546 years and 6 months in prison.	Sala borî di heman serdemê de 28 rojnameger di çarçoveya TMKê de bi daxwaza 460 sal cezayê hepiskirinê dihatin dadkirin. Derbarê 4 rojnameger û 18 pirtûkan de lêpirsînên nû hatibûn vekirin. Bi temamî 60 rojnameger bi hincetên “rêveberê rêxistinê ye”, “endamê rêxistinê ye”, “alîkarî daye rêxistinê” tev ser hev bi daxwaza 546 sal cezayê hepiskirinê ve dihatin dadkirin.
In addition, 3 journalists stood trial for “breaching confidentiality”, 2 others for “insulting religious values” and “inciting people to hatred and hostility”, 2 journalists for “insulting the Turkish Nation”, 2 others for “turning people against military services”,  2 journalists for “disclosing documents regarding state security” and 1 other for “opposing to the law on assembly and demonstration”. The prison sentence demanded for all afore listed charges reached 44 years in total.	Herwiha 3 rojnameger bi hinceta “îxlalkirina veşartîbûnê”, 2 rojnameger bi hinceta “rûreşkirina gelê tirk”, 2 rojnameger bi hinceta “ji leşkerbûnê dilsarkirin”, 2 rojnameger bi hinceta “weşandina belgeyên veşartî yên dewletê”, yek “muxalefetkirina li dijî qanûna çalakî û meşê” dihatin dadkirin. Ji bo van sûcdarkirina jî bi temamî 44 sal ceza dihat xwestin.
Charges pressed against HDP Deputies on basis of summary of proceedings	Derbarê parlementerê HDPê de piştî fezlekeyan doz hatin vekirin
799 summary of proceedings drawn up for 152 deputies in the Parliament most of whom were from the Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP), were put into process after their parliamentary immunities were lifted.	Piştî rakirina parêzbendiya 152 parlementeran hatin rakirin bi 799 fezlekeyên amadekirî doz hatin vekirin. Piraniya wan parlementeran yên HDPê ne.
Ankara 25th Criminal Court of First Instance sent a notice to HDP deputy Altan Tan who was subjected to 16 summary of proceedings that “he might get arrested if he did not attend before the court for his hearing”. Referring to a intra-party decision, Tan declared that he would not attend the hearing on December 5. Charges have also been pressed on basis of the summary of proceedings drawn up against HDP co-Chairs Selahattin Demirtaş and Figen Yüksekdağ.	Derbarê Parlementerê HDPê Altan Tan de 16 fezleke hatiye amadekirin û 25. Dadgeha Asliye Cezayê yê Enqereyê di teblîgata şandî de bo wî got ku eger neçe rûniştina dozê wê derbarê wî de biryara girtinê were dayîn. Derbarê Hevserokên Giştî yên HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş û Figen Yuksekdag de jî piştî gelek fezlekeyên amadekirî, doz hatin vekirin.
No verdicts from Constitutional Court and ECtHR	DMME û DM xwe dane sekinandin
In the 3rd quarter of 2016, the Constitutional Court (AYM) has rendered no verdicts on individual applications submitted on basis of the freedom of expression and the right to communicate. Upon its objection being overruled, Özgür Gündem daily appealed to the the Constitutional Court challenging its closure.  	Di serdema Tîrmeh-Tebax-Îlona 2016an de ji Dadgeha Makeqanûnê (DM) derbarê serlêdanên azadiya xweîfadekirinê û ragihandinê de ti biryar nehat dayîn. Îtiraza li dijî girtina Ozgur Gundem hat redkirin û li ser vê yekê serî li DMê hat dayîn.
In this quarter, the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) passed no sentence on freedom of expression and press freedom either. HDP applied to the ECtHR upon the parliamentary immunities of its members being lifted.	Di vê serdemê de Dadgeha Mafên Mirovan ê Ewropayê jî (DMME) derbarê serlêdanên azadiya xweîfadekirinê û ragihandinê de ti biryar neda. Piştî îtiraza rakirina parêzbendiya parlementerên HDPê hat redkirin, serî li DMMEyê hat dayîn.
2,500 left unemployed due to closures in media	Ji ber girtina saziyên medyayê 2500 kes bê kar man
In the 3rd quarter of 2016 almost 2,500 journalists and media workers were left unemployed due to closures of various media organs which were grounded on the statutory decrees issued in the State of Emergency.	Di serdema Tîrmeh-Tebax-Îlona 2016an de bi KHKan (Biryarnameyên Di Hukmê Qanûnê de) gelek saziyên medyayê hatin girtin. Ji ber vê yekê 2 hezar û 500 kes bê kar man.
Radio and Television Supreme Council increased penalty required for resisting broadcast bans	RTUK: Ji ber lidijîderketina qedexeyên weşanê cezayan zêde kir
Radio and Television Supreme Council (RTÜK) imposed 5 warnings, 5 penalty fines and 1 broadcast ban on TV outlets due to broadcasting certain reports, films and programmes. In this quarter, the council inflicted a penalty fine on 1 radio outlet. The administrative fines imposed on Radio and TV outlets has  reached the sum of 89,850 euro in this quarter.	RTUKê (Lijneya Radyo û Televizyonê) di serdema Tîrmeh-Tebax-Îlona 2016an de ji ber nûçe nûçe, bername û filmên weşandî ji 5 kanalên TVê re 5 cezayên hişyarkirinê, 5 cezayên peredayînê û li kanalekê jî cezayê weşanbirînê da. Lijneyê li gelek radyo û televizyonan bi temamî 300 hezar û 698 TL cezayê pereyê birî.
In the same quarter of last year (2015), the council had imposed 4 warnings and 5 punitive fines on TV outlets and 1 warning and 1 penalty fine for radio outlets. The punitive fines imposed had reached the sum of 33,760 euro.	Di heman dema sala borî de li kanalên TVê 4 cezayê hişyarkirinê, 5 cezayê peredayînê; li radyoyan jî cezayek hişyarkirin û yek jî peredayîn hatibû birîn. Lijneyê li radyo û televizyonan 112 hezar û 989 hezar TL cezayên peredayînê birîbû.
3) Where the insult is committed	(EO/BA/YO/MB)
The explosion took place in the car park of the Antalya Chamber of Commerce and Industry.	Di siet 08.50ê li Odeya Bazirganî û Pîşesaziyê ya Antalyayê teqînek çêbûye.
The reason of the explosion is not known yet. Many ambulances have been dispatched to the explosion scene.	CNN Turkê ragihand ku teqîn li otoparka Odeya Bazirganî û Pîşesaziyê ya Antalyayê çêbûye.
Antalya 1st Criminal Judgeship of Peace has issued a gag order regarding the explosion in accordance with Article 3/2 of the Press Law No. 5187.	Serokê Şaredariya Mezin a Antalyayê ji CNN Turkê re di weşana zindî de got: 
* Photograph: Süleyman Elçin - Antalya / Anadolu Agency (AA)	Antalya wek bajarê geştê tê nasîn.(NV/ÇT/MB) 
A military operation has been launched in the rural areas of Aşağı Ölek and Yukarı Ölek villages in Bitlis.	Li gundên Oleka Jor û Oleka Jêr yên girêdayê navenda Bedlîsê operasyona leşkerî tê lidarxistin.
As the operation still continued, Bitlis Governorship declared curfew in the two villages.	Îro dema ku operasyon dewam dikir Walîtiya Bedlîsê li gundên Oleka Jor û Oleka Jêr derketina derve qedexe kir.

IPS Communication Foundation/ bianet and Reporter ohne Grenzen, the German wing of RSF (Reporters without Borders) will represent the results of their joint project “Media Ownership Monitor (MOM) Turkey” today (October 27).	bianet û Reporter ohne Grenzen dê îro, dı 27ê Çiriya Pêşiyê de, di civîna ‘’Xwediyên Medyayê’’ de encamê eşkere bike.
Besides the presentation of MOM project’s website, where the results of the project will be online, the topic “Media Ownership and Unemployment” will also be discussed at the forum which will be moderated by RSF Turkey representative Erol Önderoğlu.    	Di civînê de danasîna malpera MOMê dê bê kirin. Berpirsê Tirkiyeyê yê RSFyê Erol Onderoglû dê civînê bi rê ve bibe û li ser mijara ‘’Xwedîtîya li Medyayê û Bêkarî’’ minaqeşe dê bêne kirin.

Police sealed the door of Dicle News Agency (DİHA) Ankara Office yesterday (October 31) evening. Parrot Tolaz, living in the office, was locked in. Workers of DİHA are trying to get the parrot out.	Polêsan duh êvarê li Enqereyê bi ser buroya DÎHAyê de girtin û deriyê wê morkirin. Tûtiya bi navê Tolaz ku li buroyê bû, bi ser de derî hatiye morkirin û xebatkarên DÎHAyê niha hewl didin ku wê ji hundir derxin.
DİHA reporter Hayri Demir talking to bianet has said that the office was sealed without notice, the door locks were changed and that Parrot Tolaz was left locked in.	Nûçegihanê DÎHAyê yê Enqereyê Hayrî Demir derbarê mijarê de ji bianetê re axivî û got ku bêyî ti agahiyeke derê buroya wan hatiye morkirin û tûtîya (papagan) wan ê bi navê Tolaz jî di hundir de asê maye.
"They appeared without notice"	“Bêyî ti agahî bidin hatin”
DİHA is also among the news agencies closed in the Statutory Decree No. 675 issued on October 29. Diyarbakır and Ankara offices of the news agency were sealed.	Bi Biryarnameya Di Hukmê Qanûnê de ku di 29ê Cotmehê de hatibû îlankirin ve Ajansa Nûçeyan a Dicleyê jî hatibû girtin û piştre bi ser buroyên ajansê yên li Sêmsûr, Amed û Agiriyê ve girtibûn û deriyên wan hatibûn morkirin.
Hayri Demir stated that they had already been expecting that the Ankara office would be sealed but they did not expect that this would be done without notice.	Hayrî Demir ku got ku ew jî li bendêbûne ku buroya wan ê li Enqereyê were morkirin lê texmîn nekirine ku ev yek bêyî agahîdayînê pêkwere û wiha got:
"Yesterday, we left the office and closed the door behind. Seazure and seal orders were issued for all offices. They sealed the door without notice [...] We found out that units from police and treasury derpartment had been here. They took the inventory, changed the locks and changed.	“Me duh êvarê deriyê buroyê girt û em derketin. Derbarê hemû buroyên me de biryara destdanîn û morkirinê hatibû dayîn. Bêyî ti agahî bidin, bi awayekî korsanî destdanîne ser hacetên buroyê û deriyê wê mor kirine. Me bîhîst ku polês û mufetişên maliyeyê hatine, nifteya derî guhertine û çûne.
"Ankara office existed since the agency was founded iin 2002. We were a team of ten people consisting of reporters working on the fields of politics, economics, judiciary, women and on the kurdish service".	“Buroya Enqereyê, ji damezirandina ajansê (2002) vir ve vekirîbû. Nûçegihanên me yên ku di warê  polîtîka, ekonomî, dadwerî û jinê de dixebitîn, hevalên me yên ku di beşa Kurdî de dixebitî û şefê me yê nûçeyan.. Em bi tevahî 10 kes bûn ku li wir dixebitîn.”

Rêxistina Rojnamegerên Sînornenas(RSF) di Roja Cezanekirina Sûcên li dijî Rojnamegeran(2ê Çiriya Paşiyê) de, lîsteya ‘’Dijminên Azdiya Medyayê’’  belav kir. Women organizations have launched a campaign to act in solidarity with JINHA, the first and only women news agency in Turkey, so that it can sustain its publication life after it was closed by a Statutory Decree.	Gelek rêxistinên jinan ji bo ku Ajansa Nûçeyan a Jinê xebatên xwe bidomîne û wê biryara girtinê şermezar bikin, dest bi kampanyayek ji bo hevgiriyê dikin.
With the motto "JINHA Will Not Remain Silent", women organizations will open their doors to JINHA reporters as part of the campaign. JINHA reporters will prepare their reports and women will serve as correspondent for JINHA at JINHA News Point, which will be formed at venues of women organizations.	Rêxistinên jinan bi durişma “JINHA bêdeng namîne” wê deriyên xwe ji nûçegihanên JINHAyê re vebikin. Nûçegihanên JINHAyê dê her roj li saziyeke jinan nûçeyên xwe çêbikin û di medyaya civakî de parve bikin.
The reports will be released on agency's Facebook page and the @jinhadayanisma (jinhasolidarity) account after the hacking of agency's Twitter account yesterday (November 1).	Nûçeyên ku dê were çêkirin jî di twitterê de bi ser hesabê @jinhadayanisma, di facebookê de jî li ser hesabê JINHAyê wê were parve kirin.
From Filmmor, Melek Özman about the campaign said:	Ji Filmmorê Melek Ozman derbarê kampanyayê de axivî û wiha got:
"JINHA doesn't have a place, now we are all walking together. We are in solidarity at any time. A JINHA desk will operate each day in one of ours offices. At first stage, a schedule was set until November 11 but it will continue afterwards as well.	“Ti ciheke JINHAyê nîn e. Em ê êdî bi hev re bimeşin. Em her tim di nav hevgiriyê de ne. Wê her roj li ofîseke saziyekê maseya JINHAyê were danîn. Di destpêkê de pilansaziyeke heta 11ê Mijdarê hat çêkirin. Lê ji wir şûnde jî kampanya wê bidome.
With the press meeting held today (November 2), The Democratic Regions Party (DBP) reacted against trustee appointment to Diyarbakır Metropolitan Municipality.	Îro li avahiya navenda Partiya Herêmên Demokratîk (DBP) derbarê li Şaredariya Amedê tayînkirina qayumê de civîna çapemeniyê hat lidarxistin.
DBP Co-Chairs Sebahat Tuncel and Kamuran Yüksek, Democratic Society Congress (DTK) Co-Chair Leyla Güven, Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) Diyarbakır MP Nursel Aydoğan, HDP Siirt MP Besime Konca, HDP Ağrı MP Dirayet Taşdemir, and DBP and HDP co-mayors participated in the meeting.	Hevserokên Giştî yên DBPê Sebahat Tuncel û Kamuran Yuksek,  Hevseroka Kongreya Civaka Demokratîk (KCD) Leyla Guven, parlementerên HDPê Nursel Aydogan, Besime Koca, Dirayet Taşdemir û hevşaredarên HDP û DBPî jî tevlî civîna çapemeniyê bûn.
Yüksek: A trustee was appointed during 1980 coup period as well	Yuksek: Dema derbeya 80an de jî qayûm li Amedê hatibû tayînkirin
Criticizing the trustee appointment to Diyarbakır DBP municipality, Yüksek stated that the crackdowns nowadays resemble September 12, 1980 coup period:	“Di 12ê Îlonê de jî qayûm dihatin tayînkirin. Amedê di dîroka xwe de 2 caran qayûman dîtine. Dema serdema 12ê Îlonê (derbeya leşkerî) û niha jî dema AKP û Erdogan de.
Tuncel said: AKP wants to have people's will by force	Tuncel: AKP bi darê zorê dixwaze dest dayne ser îradeya gel
"We will fight during the upcoming period by saying 'No to AKP coup'. The AKP that doesn't receive support and approval of people is trying to have people's will by force.	Sebahat Tuncel jî di axavtina xwe de bibîr xist, ku wan di 30ê Cotmehê de civîna Meclîsa Partiyê, di 31ê Cotmehê de jî civîna Desteya Rêveberiya Navendî ya partiyê bi rengekî awarte lidar xistin e û got:
"The second leg of the real coup is being tried to be sustained by seizing DBP municipalities. Standing against this is a duty for us all". Dixwazin aliyê duyemîn ê darbeyê bi desteserkirina şaredariyên DBPyî bidomînin. Rabûna li ber vê yekê erka me hemûyan e.
Ferhat Tunç, a significant name in protest music, has produced "Kobane", a new video clip, following the an earlier one he produced for the Ankara massacre recently.	Ferhat Tûnçê ku li ser ‘’Komkujîya Enqereyê’’ klîbek çêkiribû li ser Kobanîyê jî klîbek çêkiriye.
The result of this significant resistance which continued house by house, street by street and neighbourhood by neighbourhood for 134 days was a relentless struggle against ISIS (Islamic State of Iraq and Syria) gangs and an inspiration to the free spirit of humanity against darkness.	Klîp ji wan dîmenan pêk tên ku dema Ferhat Tûnç çûbû Kobanîyê Ferhat Arslanî girtibûn.
Let's complete the resistance story via artistic expression	Li ser klîbê Tûncî gotiye:
In relation to the video clip, Tunc expressed the following: "We produced this work in memory of the youth whose laughter was greeted under and gifted to the rainbow. Through their smiles and courage the world has breathed a sigh. To remember these beautiful people is a conscientious sensitivity. As a musician, I have only played a small part. If a painter plays a part, a poet another, then this resistance story can be completed." (HK/TK)	‘’Wek kesekê mûzîkjen min beşek ji çîrokê got, wênesaz ji aliyekê dî ve, helbestkat ji aliyekê dî ve bibêje çîroka vê têkoşînê dê bê temamkirin.’’ (HK/MB)
10-month prison sentence imposed on Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) Co-Chair Figen Yüksekdağ has been affirmed by Supreme Court 16th Penal Chamber.	Dadgeha Bilind biryara girtina hevseroka Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP), Fîgen Yûksekdagê pesend kiriye.
Yüksekdağ was sentenced to 10 months in prison by Adana 7th Heavy Penal Court on charge of "terror organization propaganda" for attending funeral of Yasemin Çiftçi from the Marxist-Leninist Communist Party (MLKP) in Ankara on February 13, 2012.	Endama Partiya Rizgarîya Marksîst û Lenînîst(MLKP), Yasemîn Çîftçî di 13ê Sibata 2012ê de, bi teqîna teqemeniyeka xwemalî miribû. Fîgen Yûksekdagê jî beşdariya rê-û-rismên cenazeyê wê kiribû, li ser vê yekê Dadgeha Edeneyê ya Cezayên Giran, biryar dabû Fîgen Yûksekdag 10 salan cezayê mana di girtîgehê de bistîne.
The court earlier had imposed the same penalty on Sabahattin Pişkinbaş, Dilek Keskin, Soner Geçgel, Hasan Köse, Meriç Solmaz and Murat Akıncı on charge of "terror organization propaganda".	Dadgehê digel Yûksekdagê bi sûcê ‘’propagandaya rêxistina terorî’’ ceza ji bo Sabahattin Pişkinbaş, Dilek Keskin, Soner Geçgel, Hasan Kose, Meriç Solmaz û Murat Akinciyî jî xwestibû.  
Then-Chair of the Socialist Party of the Oppressed, Yüksekdağ had defended herself as follows, according to a report by Rudaw:	Li gor nûçeya Rûdawê, Yûksekdaga ku hingê seroka Partiya Sosyalîst a Bindestan(ESP) bû xwe weha parastiye:
"No slogan in favor of terror organization was chanted, I want my acquittal". (EKN/TK)

Ji bo vê bi armanca hejmara 367 parlementeran bi dest bixe, dixwaze hilbijartinek pêşwext an jî herêmkî pêk bîne."

Democratic Regions Party (DBP) Co-Chair Sebahat Tuncel has been detained in front of Diyarbakır Courthouse where she went in protest of detention of Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) Co-Chairs and MPs.	Piştî binçavkirina parlementerên HDPê gelek kes li ber Dadgeha Amedê kombûn.

Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) Diyarbakır MP Nursel Aydoğan and Şırnak MP Leyla Birlik were arrested today (November 4).	Parlementerên HDPê Nursel Aydogan û Leyla Birlik hatin girtin.
Aydoğan and Birlik were detained in a house raid during the operation launched against 12 MPs including HDP Co-Chairs.	Îro destê destê sibehê (4ê Mijdarê) hevserokên giştî yên partiyê jî tê de 12 parlementerên HDPê hatin binçavkirin. Nursel Aydogan li Amedê, Leyla Guven jî li Mêrdînê hatin binçavkirin. There was a detention warrant for Akdoğan. Two of the HDP MPs are in status of “fugitive”, Kurtulmuş said.	Biryara desteserkirina Akdoganî hatibû dayin û hat dîyarkirin ku du parlamenterên HDPyê ‘’firarî’’ ne.

Di 4ê Çiriya Paşiyê de, herdu hevserokên HDPyê, Fîgen Yûksekdag û Selahattîn Demîrtaş, berdevkê koma HDPyê Idrîs Balûken, parlamentera Şirnexê Leyla Bîrlîk û Ferhat Encû, parlamenterên Colemêrgê Abdullah Zeydani û Selma Irmak hatibûn girtin.
Rejecting the deferment of the announcement of the verdict, Mater said,	Parêzera Materê, Merîç Eyûpoglûyê got:
"I am a journalist, a citizen. My editorship-in-chief for one day meets exactly with where I stand in life as a journalist and a citizen. Because I don't accept restrictions on people's right to information and limitations for citizens and journalists on making reports".	‘’Tiştê li vê derê minaqeşe li ser tê kirin azadiya xwe-îfadekirinê ye. Attorney Meriç Eyüboğlu stated, "What is being discussed in these proceedings is the freedom of expression.
