Fîkret Îlkîzê parêzer diyar kir ku dozgerê dozê bi rê ve dibe bi sûcê ‘sixurîya leşkerî û siyasî û endamîya FETOyê(Rêxistina Terorî ya Fethûllahgir)’ tê dadkirin û çênabe ev dozger dozan bi rê ve bibe.’’
The next hearing will be on December 9, at 2.15 p.m.	Kizilkaya: Her tiştên ku behsa wan tên kirin nûçe ne
Kızılkaya:All evidences mentioned are news reports	Kizilkayayî ho got:
"All the evidences mentioned, are news reports and articles which are within the scope of the freedom of expression. Before July 7, all newspapers used to go to Qandil and make interviews. But following the change in the conjuncture, charges began to be pressed against our newspaper. All the news referred to in this trial serve the purpose to inform the society and the public opinion. I deny the charges".	‘’Her tiştên ku behsa wan têne kirin nûçe ne û beşek ji azadiya xwe-îfadekirinê ne. Ji beriya 7ê Hezîranê hemî rojnameger diçûn Qendîlê û hevpeyvîn dikirin. Lê dema ku konjoktûr guherî doz li rojnameya me hat vekirin. Hemî tiştên doz lê hatine vekirin ji bo agahdarkirina gelî ne.’’
Mater: Solidarity with Özgür Gündem is also an objection to the current situation	Mater: ‘’Hevgirîya digel Ozgûr Gûndemê, dîyarkirina nerazîbûna ji vê rewşê ye.’’
Drawing attention to the fact that 120 journalists were in prison at the moment, Mater recalled the access blocks to the internet and the social media as well as the closures in the media and noted;	Materê da zanîn ku niho 120 rojnameger di girtîgehê de ne, înternet û medyaya civakî tê astengkirin. Materê ev gotin li axiftinên xwe zêdekirin:
Eyüpoğlu stated that they would submit a report on the situation of freedom of speech and its violations to the court and added they demanded time from the court for that purpose.	‘’Ev rewş wê yekê nîşan dike ku dengên cida têne veşartin, welê tê kirin neyên bihîstin, medya ber bi yek-rengîyê ve diçe.
Following the court's decision, police raided the newspaper's headquarters. 22 people were taken into custody.	’’Hevgirîya digel Ozgûr Gûndemê, dîyarkirina nerazîbûna ji vê rewşê ye.
On August 19, Özgür Gündem Publishing Consultant Board member Aslı Erdoğan was arrested.	‘’Bi niyeta nûçeyan hin çîrok têne nivîsîn û tê îdiakirin ku bêalî ne lê ev yek bi tenê îdiayek e. ‘’
On August 22, Özgür Gündem's Editor-in-Chief Zana Kaya and Chief Editor İnan Kızılkaya were arrested on the charge of "being a member of an [illegal] organization.	Materê da zanîn ku di vê rewşa pevçûn/şer/hewildana derbekirinê û di rewşa piştî hewildana derbekirinê de ew ê nûçeyên aştîparêz çêbike û li ser vê yekê dewam bike.
On September 1, nine people from the watch group were asked by the Chief Public Prosecutor's Office to appear before the Press Bar within 15 days.	Materê eşkere kir ku li ser polîtîkayên weşanê bi tenê rojnameger û xwendevan û rêxistinên rojnamegerîyê dikarin biryarê bidin.
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Mardin MP Mithat Sancar has said they will not participate in legislative activities but will use parliament’s democratic elements to the fullest.	Parlementerê Mêrdînê yê HDPê Mithat Sancar got ku wan karên xwe yên li meclisê dane sekinandin lê, derfetên demokratîk bi meclisê bides xistine wê bi kar bînin.
About dropping of their deputyship and by-election possibility, HDP MP Sancar has said “If the AKP is making these calculations, it can plot towards dropping deputyships. They own every instrument of political power. Our only base is people”.	Mithat Sancar derbarê xistina ji parlementeriyê û hilbijartinên pêşwext de got: “Eger AKP hesabeke wiha bike, dibe ku li pey lîstîkên ji bo xistina wekiltiya hevalên me be. Ew xwediyê hemû hêzên desthilatdariyê ne.”
HDP announced that it halted its legislative activities in the parliament following the arrest of 9 HDP MPs including party’s two co-chairs.	HDPê piştî ku hevserokên giştî jî tê de 9 parlementerên wan hatin girtin daxuyand ku wan karên xwe yên li meclisê dane sekinandin.
“We will organize group and press meetings”	“Em ê komcivîna partiya xwe û civînên çapemeniyê bikin”
Speaking to bianet, Sancar explained why they took such a decision and what this decision means in practice:	Sancar sedema biryara ku HDPê hildaye de ji bianet’ê re axivî û nirxandinên xwe anîn ziman.
“We are not totally withdrawing from the parliament. We will continue to use every field of democratic politics to the fullest. We will not attend general assembly studies. We will not be present in commission studies. We will not use tools such as parliamentary inquiry, summary of proceedings.	“Em bi temamî ji meclisê venakişin. Em ê heta dawî her war û derfetên siyaseta demokratîk bi kar bînin. Em ê tevlî xebatên lijneya giştî ya parlementoyê nebin û di nav xebatên komîsyonê de jî cih nagirin. Her wiha hevalên me dê êdî pirsname, daxwaznameya lêkolînkirinê jî nedin meclisê.”
“For instance, we will organize group meetings on Tuesdays. We will turn these meetings into people platform, field of deliberation and venue of solidarity. Furthermore, we will organize press meetings at parliament group building”. (NV/TK)	“Em ê komcivînên roja sêşemê bikin. Em ê wan civînan weke platforma gel, cihê îstîşare û hevgiriyê bi kar bînin. Hevalên me li meclisê wê civînên çapemeniyê jî pêk bînin. Her wiha em ê welatî û heyetan jî pêşwazî bikin.
I am a journalist, a citizen. My editorship-in-chief for one day meets exactly with where I stand in life as a journalist and a citizen.	Ez rojnameger im. Beşdabûna min a kampanyaya “Nobedariya Weşanê” ya ji bo hevgiriya bi Ozgur Gundemê re ji ber helwesta min a derbarê jiyanê de ye.
Because I don’t accept restrictions on people’s right to information and limitations for citizens and journalists on making reports.	Ji ber ku; ez weke welatîyekê astengkirina gihiştina ragihandinê, weke rojnamegerekê jî him ji bo xwe him jî bo hemû rojnamegeran astengkirina mafê nûçeçêkirinê qebûl nakim.
I started the day at Özgür Gündem with a news meeting that we held with mostly women and a few men. I listened and spoke. This solidarity was important in terms of making what happened with Özgür Gündem’s journalism of 24 years life visible.	Roja ku ez çûme Ozgur Gundemê me bi edîtorên ku piraniya wan jin bûn re civîn kir. Me guhdarê hev kir, em derbarê gelek mijaran de axivîn, me pêşniyar û nîqaşan jî kirin. Hevgiriya bi wan re bû balkişandinek ji bo Ozgur Gundemê û di 24 salan tiştên hatine serê wan re.
Özgür Gündem’s June 3, 2016 issue was prepared. After a short while, we experienced July 15, 2016 Coup Attempt.	Di 3ê Hezîrana 2016an de ew hejmara Ozgur Gundemê derket. Û em ji xwe di 15ê Tîrmehê de jî bûne şahidê derbekirinê.
Even though it is hard to follow what has been happening in media world during post July-15 period, I will briefly summarize. There are at least 120 journalists and 10 distributors in jail with the latest arrests.	Piştî 15ê Tîrmehê şopandina geşedanên li medyayê gelek zehmet e. Lê ez ê bi kurtasî bînim ziman. Herî dawî bi girtinên li rojnamegera Cumhuriyetê ve herî kêm 120 rojnameger û 10 belavkar li girtîgehan e.
173 media organs (TV, radio, newspaper, website, publishing house) have been closed with the help of the Statutory Decree No. 668 enacted on July 28 and Statutory Decree No.675 enacted on October 3. Over 2,500 journalists have been left unemployed because of these closings. 775 press cards and 49 passports have been cancelled.	Bi KHKan 173 rojnameger, TV, radyo, weşanxane, malperên nûçeyan û hwd. hatin girtin. Ji ber van girtinan herî kên 2500 rojnameger bêkar man. 775 kartên çapemeniyê hatin betalkirin û dest danîn ser 49 pasaportên rojnamgeran.
All these “measures” lead to blocking of social media channels such as WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and raids, detentions, attacks, threats are being supported by RTÜK (Radio and Television Supreme Council) penalties.	Yên ku hatine kirin bi qutkirina girêdana medyaya civakî (twitter, facebook, watshap, instigram), bi serdegirtin, êrişkirin, binçavkirin, gefxwarin û cezayên RTUKê ve tên piştgirîkirin.
The already problematic issue of editorial independency is a mere word in Turkey now	Serxwebûna edîtoran ku ji xwe li Tirkiyeyê gelek tê binpêkirin, piştî van yekan hema bêjin bi temamî ji holê rabû; sansûr û otosansûr ket dewsa wê.
This picture also tells a course heading towards a media environment in which different voices are tried to be made unheard, invisible and inaccessible. Solidarity with Özgür Gündem is also an objection to this environment. Journalist-reader watches are like the protests and objections carried out by journalist and right organizations, and establishments of which Turkey is a part. As citizens, it is our right and duty to stand against this imposition.	Di encama vê rewşê de tê xwestin ku deng û rengên cuda werin bêdengkirin û medyayeke yektîpî derxin holê. Hevgiriya bi Ozgur Gundemê re nerazîbûna li dijî vê yekê ye. Kampanyayên nobedariya weşanê, îtiraz û prostestokirinên di vê warê de him li Tirkiyeyê him jî li qada navneteweyî meşrû ye û mafê her kesî ye û divê were bikaranîn jî.
A journalist has to be free from all governmental influence and be critical against all kinds of political powers. I believe that the only power to inspect editorial policies is journalists themselves, journalism organizations and readers, which is a universal value in journalism.	Rojnamegerek divê ji her desthilatî rizgar bibe û bi helwesteke rexnegir tevbigere. Ez bi baweriyê de me ku kontrolkirina polîtîkayên weşanê tenê ji hêla xwendekar û rêxistinên medyayê ve dikare bête kirin. Ev yek derheqê nûçegihaniyê de jî nirxeke gerdûnî ye.
A news after all tells a story. The claim that this story is “impartial” is just a claim. Therefore, even though a news is what a journalist conveys from his/her own perspective in its most general sense, intervention or intervention efforts of different governmental circles including media owners to these conveys is a fact.	Min weke rojnamegerek her dem li Tirkiyeyê di serdema şer/pevçûn/hewldana derbekirinê/piştî derbekirinê bi helwesta mafparêz û aştîxwazî de rojnamegerî kir, min vê yekê parast û hêjî jiyan û helwesta min bi heman şêwazê ye.
I as a journalist have always advocated right based and peace journalism during the environments of war/conflict/post coup attempt period, and am still doing it. I am practicing journalism from this perspective.	Di encamê de ya li holê maye mafê xweîfadekirinê ye. Nabe ku ti keseke mudaxeleyê li vî mafê bike. Dadwerî jî nikare mudaxele bike.”
Submitted for your information. (NM/ÇT/TK)	(NM/ÇT/YO)
According to reports bianet compiled from local and national newspapers, news sites and agencies, men have killed 23 women and two girls; raped four women; forced 17 women to sex work; harassed 13 women; sexually harassed 32 girls; wounded 27 girls.	Li gor nûçeyên bianetê ji rojnameyên herêmî û neteweyî, ji malper û ajansan berhev kirîn, mêran di meha Îlonê de 23 jin û 2 zarokên keç kuştine, tecawiz li çar jinan kiriye, detdirêjî li sêzdeh jinan kiriye, îstismar li 32 zarokên keç kiriye, 27 jin birîndar kirine, bi zorê karê seksê li 27 jinan daye kirin.
50% of the perpetrators were husbands/lovers of women who sought break up.	Ji sedî 28 jinên hatîn kuştin ji ber ku daxwaza ji-hev-cida-bûnê kirine hatine kuştin. Zavayê jinekê ji ber ku keça wê dixwest ji mêrê xwe cida bibe ew kuştiye. Zavayekê dî jî xwesîya xwe bi dijwarî birîndar kiriye.
28% of women were killed for seeking divorce/break up or turning down offer for reconciliation. One woman was killed by husband of her daughter who was seeking divorce; another woman was heavily injured by husband of her daughter who was seeking divorce.	Li gor nûçeyên dii meha Çiriya Pêşiyê de hatîn nivîsîn ji sedî 50yê zêdetirê wan kesên tecawiz kirî tecawiz li destgirtî an jî jina ku dixwest ji wî cida bibe kiriye.
Men killed at least 220 women; raped 65; harassed 104, inflicted violence on 282 and sexually harassed 352 girls in the first 10 months of 2016.  	Ji destpêka 2016ê ve di deh mehan de, mêran ya kêm 220 jin kuştine, tecawiz li 65 jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 104 jinan kiriye, îstismara cinsî li 352 zarokan kiriye, tûndkarî li 282 jinan kiriye.
Femicide	Kuştin
Men killed 23 women and two girls in October.	Mêran di meha Çiriya Pêşiyê de 23 jin û 2 zarokên keç kuştine. Ji bilî kuştina 25 jinan termê du jinên dî jî hatine dîtin û hêj nehatiye eşkerekirin ka ew çawa mirine.
12% of femicides took place on the street. Two women were killed despite protection orders.	Ji sedî 12 jinan li kolanan hatine kuştin. Digel ku biryara parastina du jinan hebû jî ew hatine kuştin.
68% of the women were killed by their partners or ex-partners. One woman was killed by her elder brother, two by their son-in-law, one by her husband of religious ceremony, nine by their husbands, four by their ex-husbands, two by their ex-lovers, two by their neighbors, one by her son, one by her lover, one by the father of a man with whom she was forced to marry.	Ji sedî 68ê jinan, partnerên wan an jî partnerên wan ên berê ew kuştine. Birayê jinekê ew kuştiye, zavayê du jinan, mêrê jinekê yê bi zewaca dîn pê re zewicîbû, cîranê du jinan, kurê jinekê, destgirtiyê jinekê ew kuştiye.
52% of the homicides were committed with firearms: Hunting rifles were used in two femicides, knife in seven, sharp object in one, shotgun in two, pistol in nine. Four women were killed by being strangled.	Ji sedî 52yê jinên hatîn kuştin bi çekan hatine kuştin.
The cities in which femicides took place in October were Antalya (2), Aydın (2), Balıkesir (2), Çorum (1), Erzincan (1), Eskişehir (1), İstanbul (3), İzmir (1), Malatya (1), Manisa (1), Maraş (1), Mersin (1), Muğla (1), Ordu (1), Osmaniye (1), Tokat (1), Trabzon (1), Urfa (2) and Van (1).	Di meha Çiriya Pêşiyê de jinên hatîn kuştin li van bajaran hatine kuştin. Antalya (2), Aydin (2), Balikesir (2), Çorum (1), Erzincan (1), Eskişehir (1), Stenbol (3), İzmir (1), Malatya (1), Manisa (1), Mereş (1), Mêrsîn (1), Mugla (1), Ordu (1), Osmaniye (1), Tokat (1), Trabzon (1), Urfa (2) û Wan (1).
Rape	Tecawiz
Four rape incidents took place in media in October.	Di meha Çiriyaa Pêşiyê de çar nûçeyên tecawizê hatine nivîsîn.
One woman was raped by her lover with whom she wanted to break up, one by her husband on whom she filed a divorce case, one by her husband’s friend, one by a man whom she knew.	Destgirtiyê jinekê yê ku wê dixwest ji wî cida bibe, mêrê jinekê yê ku wê dixwest ji wî cida bibe, hevalê mêrê jinekê û hevalê jinekê tecawiz li wê kiriye.
Two men were arrested, one was released, the judicial process about the other didn’t take place in media.	Du mêr hatine girtin, mêrek serbest hatiye berdan, di heqê pêvajoya hiqûqî ya kesekê de jî di nûçeyan de behs nehatiye kirin.
The cities in which rape incidents took place were Afyon (1), Edirne (1), İstanbul (1) and Zonguldak (1).	Bajarên tecawiz lê hatiye kirin: Afyon (1), Edirne (1), Stenbol (1) û Zonguldak (1).
Forcing to sex work	Bi zorê kirina karê seksê
17 women and girls were forced to sex work in Adana	Li bajarê Edeneyê karê seksê li 17 jin û zarokên keç hatiye kirin.
Harassment	Destdirêjî
13 harassment cases were covered by media in October.	Di meha Çiriya Pêşiyê de destdirêjî li 13 jinan hatiye kirin.
85% of the harassers were men the women didn’t know: 11 women were harassed by men they didn’t know, one by her neighbor, one by her coworker.	Ji sedî 85 kesên destdirêjî kirîn ne nasên wan kesan in ku destdirêjî li wan kiriye.
Five harassers were arrested, two were released after their testimony was taken, police didn’t commence any legal proceedings for a man who harassed two women, and in six harassment cases judicial process about the harassers didn’t take place in media.	Pênc kesên destdirêjî kirîn hatine girtin. Du kean îfade daye û serbest bûne. Ji bo du kesan polîsan ti tişt nekiriye.
The cities in which harassment cases took place were Aksaray (1), Aydın (2), İstanbul (3), İzmir (1), Kırklareli (1), Kocaeli (1), Manisa (1), Samsun (1) and Trabzon (2).	Karên destdirêjîyê li van bajaran pêk hatiye: Aksaray (1), Aydin (2), Stenbol (3), Izmîr (1), Kırklareli (1), Kocaeli (1), Manisa (1), Samsun (1) û Trabzon (2).
Child abuse	Îstîsmarkirina zarokan
32 girls were sexually abused in October. 10 girls were sexually abused in schools, a girl having impaired hearing was raped at school picnic.	Di meha Cotmehê de 32 zarokên hatin îstîmarkirin. 10 zarokên keç li dibistanan hatin îstîsmarkirin. Zarokeke keç ku guhê wê giran e li geştiya dibistanê hat tecawîzkirin.
31% of the children were abused by their teachers, 9% by other students at the school: 10 girls were sexually abused by their teachers, three by the others students at the schools, six by grocers, three by their relatives, one by her father, one by her father’s friend, one by a man whom she met on social media, six by men they didn’t know. Identity of one person sexually abusing a girl didn’t appear in media.	Bûyerên îstîsmarkirinan %31 ji hêla mamosteyan, %9an jî ji hêla xwendekaren din ve hatin kirin. 10 zarokên keç ji hêla mamosteyên xwe ve, 3 zarok ji hêla xwendekarên din ve, 6 ji wan ji hêla xwediyê marketan ve, 3 ji wan ji hêla xizmên xwe ve, 6 ji hêla mêrên xerîb ve û yek jî ji hêla kesê di medyaya civakî de naskirî ve hatin îstîsmarkirin.
16% of the girls were raped, 16% were forced to sex work, 3% were exposed to exhibitionism. The other cases were covered as “sexual abuse” in media and no further detail was provided.	%16 ji wan zarokên keç hatin tecawîzkirin, %16 rastî zorkirina kedkariya sexê hatin, %3ên wan jî rastî gefxwarina teşhîrkirinê hatin. Bûyerên din di nûçeyan de weke “îstîsmarkirina cinsî” cih girtin.
According to the reports covered by media in October, 14 men were arrested, three men were released after receiving their testimonies, detention warrants were issued for two men but they couldn’t be found yet. About a harasser teacher only an administrative investigation was launched, and a harasser police faced penalty of just being relieved of duty. Legal process about harassers of 15 girls weren’t covered by media.	Li gorî nûçeyên ku di meha Cotmehê de li medyayê de cih girtin; 14 mêr hatin girtin, 3 mêr jî piştî îfadedayînê serbest hatin berdan û derbarê 2 mêran de jî biryara girtinê hat derxistin lê hêj nehatine girtin. Derbarê mamosteyeke tacîzkar de tenê lêpirsîna îdarî hat vekirin, polîseke tacîzkar jî tenê ji wezîfeyê hat hildan. Di nûçeyan de agahiyên derbarê mêrên ku 15 zarokan îstîsmar kirine de pêkanînên hiqûqiyê  cih negirtin.
The cities in which sexual abuse took place were Antep (9), Aydın (1), Bursa (1), Dersim (1), Hatay (1), İzmir (2), Kocaeli (6), Muğla (1), Osmaniye (3), Sakarya (1), Tekirdağ (5) and Zonguldak (1).	Bajêrên ku zarok lê hatine îstîsmarkirin wiha ne: Dîlok (9), Aydin (1), Bursa (1) Dêrsim (1), Hatay (1), Îzmîr (2), Kocaeli (6), Mugla (1), Osmaniye (3), Sakarya (1), Tekirdag (5), Zonguldak (1).
Violence-injury	Tundî-birîdarkirin
Men inflicted violence on 27 women in October. One man pounded 2.5-year-old daughter of his lover with whom he got angry.	Mêran di meha Cotmehê de tundî 27 jinan kirin. Mêrek jî dema hêrsa xwe li destgirtiya xwe anî, zaroka wê ya 2 salî derb kir.
70% of the violence incidents took place by means that could lead to death: Two women were injured with hunting rifle, six by knife, two by shotgun, two by pistol. One woman was burned to death by being poured down oil. One man drove the car on four women driving. One woman was thrown into a construction hole after being heavily pounded. Eight women were pounded.	%70yê bûyerên tundkarî de derbên kuştinê li mexdûran hat kirin. 4 jin bi tifinfan, 2 jin bi kêran û yek jî demançeyê hat birîndarkirin. Li ser jinekê benzîn hat rijandin û agir berdanê, bi ser mala jinekê jî gule hat reşandin. 4 jin dema wesayîtê diçûn, mêrek wesayîtê bi ser wan de qulumand. Jinek pişt3i bi dijwarî hat derbkirin, wê avêtin kurta înşeatekê. 8 jin jî hatin derbkirin.
A woman who was exposed to violence had complained against her husband for seven times and obtained protection order twice. One woman was pounded despite restraining order.	Jinekê ku rastî tundê hatibû, mêrê xwe 7 caran gilî kiribû û ji bo wê 2 caran jî biryara parastinê hatibû derxistin. Jinek jî her çiqas biryara dûrxistinê dabû girtin jî hate derbkirin.
11% of the women were exposed to violence for seeking divorce/break up. One woman was injured with a hunting rifle by her daughter’s husband with whom she sought divorce.	%11ê jinan ji ber daxwaza cihêbûn/berdanê tundî li wan hat kirin. Jinek jî ji hêla zavayê xwe yê klu keça wê dixwest jê veqete ve bi tifingê hat birîndarkirin.
18% of the violence cases took place in public places.	%18ê bûyerên tundiyê li derve bi awayekî eşkere û li ber çavê mirovan hatin kirin.
55% of the women were imposed violence by their partners or ex-partners: 12 women were exposed to violence/injury by their husbands, one by her ex-husband, two by their lovers, one by her ex-lover, one by her son-in-law, one by her ex-son-in-law, one by her employer, one by her client, one by her son, five by men they didn’t know,	%55 jinan ji hêla partner/partnerên xwe yên berê ve hatin derbkirin: 12 jin ji hêla hevserên xwe ve, jinek ji hêla hevserê xwe yê berê ve, 2 jin ji hêla destgirtiyên xwe ve, yek ji hêla zavayê xwe ve, yek ji hêla patronê xwe ve, yek ji hêla muşteriyê xwe ve, yek ji hêla kurê xwe ve, 5 jî ji hêla mêrên xerîb ve hatin derbkirin/birîndarkirin.
The cities in which violence/injury cases took place were Adana (2), Afyon (1), Aksaray (3), Ankara (1), Antalya (3), Aydın (1), Bartın (1), Batman (2), Eskişehir (1), İstanbul (5), İzmir (1), Kayseri (1), Kırıkkale (1), Malatya (1), Muğla (2) and Tekirdağ (1).	Bajarên ku bûyerên tundlêkirinê pêk hatiye: Edene (2), Afyon (1), Aksaray (3), Enqere (1), Antalya (3), Aydin (1), Bartın (1), Êlih (2), Eskişehir (1), Stenbol (5), Îzmir (1), Kayseri (1), Kirikkale (1), Meletî (1), Mugla (2) ve Tekirdag (1).
Distribution by regions	Li gorî herêman
In total 118 male violence, femicide, attempted murder, harassment, sexual violence, rape and injury cases were covered by media in October.	Di meha Cotmehê de 118 bûyerên tundlêkirin, cînayet, teşebuskirina cînayetê, destdirêjî, tundkirina cinsî, tecawîzkirin û birîndarkirinê di nûçeyên medyayê de cih girtin.
Detained after the protest organized in İstanbul’s Kadıköy district on November 6 following arrest of Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Co-Chairs Selahattin Demirtaş and Figen Yüksekdağ and seven deputies of the party, and allegedly tortured in custody, Muhammed Cihad Ebrari, the son of HDP İstanbul MP Hüda Kaya’s son, told bianet what happened.	‘’Ne bi tenê min, wan kesên dî yên [polîsan] ew desteser kiribûn jî heta em gihan nexweşxaneyê lêdan xwar. Ji ber ku wan dizanî ez kurê Hûda Kayayê me wan pirtir biriya xwe da min. Hem dema ez hatîm desteserkirin, hem di rêya nexweşxaneyê de, hem di rêya qereqolê de, hem jî li qereqolê min lêdan xwar...’’
As taken into custody	Desteserkirina wî
“After the protest was over and the women were dispersing, they commenced detention proceedings for men.	‘’[Polîsan] piştî xwenîşandanê dest pê kirin ku mêrên li dora xwenîşandanê desteser bikin.
“Some women started to oppose the detention proceeding. My mother was among those women. I was always next to my mother in case something bad would happen to her.	‘’Hinek jin li dijî desteserkirinan derktin, dêya min jî yek ji wan jinan bû. Da tiştek ji dêya min neyê ez li rexa wê bûm.
“They started push and shove her. When a police officer directly intervened in my mother, I came between them and they detained me”.	‘’Çendcarekê [polîsan] dehf li wê dan lê cara paşiyê polîsan rasterst mûdaxaleyî wê kirin, ez çûm di nava wan de û wan ez desteser kirim.
In custody	Desteserkirin
“I was constantly beaten as being taken into custody and in police vehicle on the way to a police station.	‘’Di dema desteserkirinê de û di rêyê de bi dewamî min lêdan xwar.
“I didn’t spend much time with other detainees but I heard that they were too being pounded. I witnessed orders were given such as ‘get down on your knee-sit-stand up.	‘’ez gelek digel wan kesên hatîn desteserkirin nemam lê bûm şahidê wê yekê ku polîsan ew li dîwaran didan û ferman li wan dikir ku rûnin û rabin.
As taken to hospital	Di rêya nexweşxaneyê de
“I was beaten as I was being detained, in the police vehicle on the way to the police station, in the station and on the way to hospital.	‘’ Hem dema ez hatîm desteserkirin, hem di rêya nexweşxaneyê de, hem di rêya qereqolê de, hem jî li qereqolê min lêdan xwar.
In the hospital	Li nexweşxaneyê
“I was held with handcuffs in the hospitals. Police wanted to take me to prosecutor’s office by their own vehicle despite my broken spine.	‘’Di nexweşxaneyê de, polîsan ez kelepçe kirin. Di gel ku hestiyê min şikestî bû jî polîsan xwestin min bi tirimbêla xwe bibin qereqolê.
“The police suddenly took off my handcuffs in the afternoon and left. In the evening hours, I learned that I was released”. (EKN/TK)	‘’Piştî nîvro polîsan ji nifşkê ve kelepçeya min ji min vekir û min paşê zanî ez serbest hatime berdan. (EKN/MB) 
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Hakkari MP Nihat Akdoğan in his statement he made at Silivri Prison No.9 where he is held, has responded to Vice Prime Minister Numan Kurtulmuş’s allegations.	Parlementerê Colemêrgê yê HDPê Nîhat Akdogan ku piştî binçavkirinê hatibû girtin û wî şandibûn Girtîgeha Silivriyê, derbarê îdiayên Alîkarê Serokwezîr Numan Kurtulmuş de daxuyanî da.
Akdoğan said he was detained at Hakkari city center, not at the border and Kurtulmuş’s allegations are not true”.	Akdogan got: “Ez li sînor na, li navenda Colemêrgê hatim binçavkirin.”
Arrested on November 7, Akdoğan met with HDP İstanbul Provincial Co-Chair Doğan Erbaş, who came to visit him at Silivri Prison. Akdoğan delivered his statement via Erbaş.	Nîhat Akdogan di 7ê Mijdarê de hate girtin û di 8ê Mijdarê de wî şandin Girtîgeha Silivriyê ya Stenbolê. Hevserokê Rêxistina HDPê ya Stenbolê Dogan Erbaş li girtîgehê bi Akdogan re hevdîtin pêk anî.
“I was detained at center, not border”	“Ez li sînor na, li navenda Colemêrgê hatim binçavkirin.”
Akdoğan’s press statement is briefly as follows:	Akdogan di daxuyaniya xwe ya ku şandiye ji çapemeniyê re de wiha got:
“Governmental Spokesperson Numan Kurtulmuş’s statement about me that ‘he was caught at Hakkari border trying to escape’ is completely false. This statement intended to create a perception against me and my party. Kurtulmuş obviously lied.	“Alîkarê Serokwezîr Numan Kurtulmuş ku derbarê min de gotiye “Dema hewl dida kuı bireve li sînorê Colemêrgê hat binçavkirin”. Ew gotinên wî serî heta binî derew in û bi vî awayî dixwaze ku derbarê min de zanebûneke çewt biafirîne.
“I, my advisor and a group of party members were detained at police check point during police search at the city center on November 7.	“Li noqteya polêsan a ketina bajêr de, ez ligel şêwirmendê xwe û hin hevalên me yên ji paritiyê dema diçûn Colemêrgê, piştî kontrolkirinê hatim binçavkirin.
“My detention process can be seen by examining camera recordings of the police check point. Besides, there were tens of people around witnessing my detention.The border where Kurtulmuş claimed I was ‘captured’ is 80 km away from the city center.	“Li cihê ku ez hatime binçavkirin kamerayên polêsan jî hene û eger li qeydên wan binêrin wê vê rastiyê bibînin. Herwiha li derdor jî bi dehan kes binçavkirina min ditîn. Ew sînorê ku Kurtuılmuş dibêje ‘ez lê hatime’ girtin 80 km dûrî navenda Colemêrgê ye.
“I am not an arrestee, I am a hostage. I know we will overcome these difficult days all together”.	“Li Colemêrgê him ji rêveberiya herêmî him jî ji parlementeran ti kesên bijartî neman û gişkî hatine girtin. Ez ne keseke girtî an mehkûm im. Ez hatime dîl girtin. Ez bawer dikim ku em ê li hemberî van rojên reş bi ser bikevin.”
What had happened?	Çi bûbû?
On November 4, HDP Co-Chairs Figen Yüksekdağ and Selahattin Demirtaş, HDP Group Deputy Chair İdris Baluken, Şırnak MPs Leyla Birlik, Ferhat Encü, Diyarbakır MP Nursel Aydoğan, Hakkari MPs Selma Irmak, Abdullah Zeydani and Mardin MP Gülser Yıldırım were arrested.	Hevserokên Giştî yên HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş û Figen Yuksekdag parlementerên HDPê Ferhat Encu, Leyla Guven, Îdrîs Baluken, Îmam Taşçier, Selma Iramak, Nursel Aydogan, Ziya Pir, Gulser Yildirim, Sirri Sureya Onder, Gulser Yildirim îro destê sibehê di encama serdegirtina malan û avahiya navenda HDPê de hatibûn binçavkirin.
Detained during the same operation, Diyarbakır MPs Ziya Pir and İmam Taşçıer, and Ankara MP Sırrı Süreyya Önder were released on condition of judicial control.	Heta niha Ziya Pir, Sirri Sureya Onder û Îmam Taşçier bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest hat berdan, Hevserokên Giştî yên HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş û Figen Yuksekdag, Îdrîs Baluken, Nûrsel Aydogan, Selma Irmak, Leyla Birlik, Gulser Yildirim û Selma Irmak  hatin girtin.
The number of arrested HDP deputies has risen to 10 with the arrest of Akdoğan. (AS/TK)	Nîhat Akdogan di sala 1980an de li Colemêrgê hatiye dinê. Li Zanîngeha Anadoluyê beşa Rêvebiriya Civakî xwend. Di Partiya Civaka Demokratîk (DTP) de xebatên siyasî kir. Demeke bû Endamê Meclisa HDPê. Bi awayekî baş Kurdî dizane. 
 Varto Municipality co-Mayor Sabite Ekinci from the Democratic Regions Party (DBP) has been arrested in Muş.	Hevseroka Şaredariya Gimgimê ya ji DBPyê hatibû hilbijarti, Sabite Ekîncî hat girtin.
Varto Municipality co-Mayors Sabite Ekinci and Hüseyin Güneş had been taken into custody in their apartments in a house raid on November 4. Police had searched the DBP Varto office.	Polîsan di 4ê Çiriya Paşiyê de bi ser mala Sabite Ekîncîyê û Huseyîn Gûneşî de girtibû û ew desteserkiribûn.
Güneş was released after testifying in the police department, Ekinci on the other hand was arrested on claims of "being a member of a terrorist organisation", "damaging Varto Municipality", and "tender irregularity".	Gûneşî piştî îfade daye emniyetê serbest hatiye berdan. Lê belê Ekîncî bi tewanên ‘’endambûna rêxistina terorî’’,’’zererdana Şaredariya Gimgimê’’ û ‘’bêûsûlîya ji bo îhaleyan’’ hat girtin.
Ekinci reportedly was sent to Muş E-type Prison.	Hat eşkerekirin ku Ekîncî ji bo girtîgeha Mûşê ya Cûrreyê Eyê hatiye şandin.
Including Ekinci, there are 33 co-Chair women in prison.	Digel Ekîncîyê 33 hevserokên şaredariyan yên ji DBPyê di girtîgehan de ne.
About Sabite Ekinci	Sabite Ekîncî
She was born in 1970 in Varto. She graduated from Gazi University. In 1992, she started working as a teacher. She was elected co-Mayor to Varto Municipality in the elections on March 30, 2014. (ÇT/DG)	Di sa 1970yê de li Gimgimê hatiye dinyayê. Di Zanîngeha Gazîyê de xwendina xwe temam kiriye. Wê di sala 1992 de wek dersdar dest bi karî kiriye. Ew di 30ê Adara 2014ê de wek hevşaredara Şaredariya Gimgimê hatiye hilbijartin.(ÇT/MB) 
Cat Tombili's statue erected on October 4 World Animal Day in Kadıköy's Ziverbey neighborhood and stolen on the night of November 7 was put back on its place yesterday (November 9) night.	Tombîlî ew pisîk(kitik) e, bi wêneyê ku wê pala xwe daye peyarêyê navdar e. Piştî ku Tombîlî mir peykerê wê hatibû çêkirin û dizan peykerê wê di 7ê Çiriya Paşiyê de dizîbû, îro peykerê wê hat dîtin û dîsa li cihê wê hat danîn.
Lived at Güleç Çıkmazı in Ziverbey neighborhood of Kadıköy district in İstanbul, cat Tombili had passed away on August 1, 2016. Following its death, a campaign to erect its statue was launched and animal lover and sculptor Seval Şahin had started to make the statue of Tombili after Kadıköy Municipality responded positively. (EKN/DG)	Tombîlî di 1ê meha Tebaxê de ji ber nexweşiya gurçikên xwe miribû û ji bo peykerê wê bê çêkirin kampanyaya îmzeyan hatibû dest pê kirin. Şeval Şahînê peykerê wê çêkiribû.(EKN/MB)
Investigation launched by İstanbul Chief Public Prosecutor’s Office into writers and executives of Özgür Gündem daily, which was closed by the Statutory Decree (KHK) has been completed.	Serdozgeriya Komarê ya Stenbolê, bi Biryarnameya di Hikmê Qanûnan de, lêpirsînek li ser nivîskar û birêveberên Ozgûr Gûndemê dabû dest pê kirin, lêpirsîn temam bû.
Of Özgür Gündem executives and some of its workers, Kemal Sancılı, Aslı Erdoğan, İnan Kızılkaya, Zana Bilir Kaya, Ayşe Necmiye Alpay, Emire Eren Keskin, Filiz Koçali, Ragıp Zarakolu and Bilge Akut took place as suspects on the 32-page indictment prepared by Prosecutor Umut Tepe.	Umut Tepeyê ku yek ji serdozgerên Serdozgeriya Komarê ya Stenbolê ye doz vekiriye. Serdozgerî di îdianameya dozê de navê Kemal Sancılı, Aslı Erdoğan, İnan Kızılkaya, Zana Bilir Kaya, Ayşe Necmiye Alpay, Emire Eren Keskin, Filiz Koçali, Ragıp Zarakolu û Bilge Akut wek bersûc nîşan dane.

What had happened?	Çi bûbû?

Li gorî nûçeya Cumhuriyetê Komeleya CHPê ya Kolnê û Navenda Çanda Nazim Hikmet ji bo bîranîna Tarik Akan wî diyariyê Almanyayê kiribûn û ew jî bo vê yekê çûbû wir û dema serdegirtinê de ew li mala xwe nebû.

242 academics from 21 universities, 942 administrative personnel from 89 universities have been suspended by a Statutory Decree No. 677.	Bi KHKya dawî ya bi hejmara 677an 242 akademîsyen û 942 personel-kedkarên li zanîngehan ji kar hatin avêtin.
1,262 academics by the Statutory Decree No. 675 enacted on October 29, and 2,346 academics by the Statutory Decree published on Official Gazette on September 2 were suspended. The number of suspended academics has climbed to 3,850 with the latest Statutory Decree.	Tê zanîn ku si 29ê Cotmehê de bi KHKya hejmara 675an ve 1262, di 2ê Îlonê de jî bi KHKya 672an jî 2346 akademîsyen hatibûn îxrackirin. Bi vê KHKya dawî ve hejmara akademîsyenên ku hatin îxeackirin derkete 3850an.

Leonard Viohl, from Germany, has been beaten by police as police found a paper reading “Free Demirtaş” in İstanbul’s Tarlabaşı neighborhood.	Turîstê Alman Leonard Viohl li Stenbol Tarlabaşiyê ji ber ku di bêrika wî de kaxiza li ser “Free Demirtaş” nivîsî bû hatiye dîtin, rastî êrişa polîsan hat.
Speaking to bianet, Viohl said that the police officers put him into a small room at the entrance of a building and beat him there, and then released him without an official detention proceeding.	Viohl ji bianet’ê re axivî û got ku polîsan wî birine odeyeke piçûk yê apartmanekê, li wir jê re dane xeberan, heqaretan lê kirine û piştî derbkirinê wî bêyî binçavkirinê serbest berdane.
The incident can be heard on the tape recorder, which was kept on Viohl during the incident. The police officers are heard saying “So, Free Demirtaş? Who the hell gave this to you! Demirtaş is a terrorist, you are a terrorist too! Why the hell have you come to Turkey? You don’t speak Turkish, you come to Turkey. Are you an agent? What the hell is your purpose? You don’t understand Turkish but I’ll f.ck you”.	Viohl dema bûyerê makîneya dengqeydkirê ku li cem bûye vekiriye û kirinên polîsan qeyd kiriye. Di wê qeydê de polîsan dibêjin “Free Demirtaş haa? Keko! Kî vê kaxizê daye te?” û piştre dest bi dijûn û derbkirinê dikin. Polîsan bi Tirkî û Îngîlîzî dibêjin “Demirtaş terorîst e, tu jî terorîst î.” “Tu çima hatî Tirkiyeyê? Ti him tirkî nizanî him jî têyî Tirkiyeyê. Gelo tu ajan î? Tu tirkî nizanî. Ez ê di q... te nim.”
Coming to Turkey as a tourist, Viohl said “Until now I have no Idea why they we're letting me go but I think my german passport was the reason and they wanted to scare me without getting in trouble, when arresting me for no reason”.	Turîst Viohl got: “Min ewil fêm nekir ka bo çi min serbest berdan. Lê ez bawerkim ji ber pasaporta min a Almanyayê û bêyî ti hincet nexwastin min binçav bikin û serê xwe têxin belayê.”
“I wrote paper signs ‘Free Demirtaş’ on the day of arrests of HDP politicians”	“Roja ku parlementerên HDPê hatin girtin min li ser kaxiza nivîsî ‘Free Demirtaş’ û min wan belav kir”
Being in Germany now, Viohl explained what happened that day:	Viohly ku niha li Almanyayê ye, yên ku hatine serê wî wiha anî ziman:
The situation you're asking about happened already two weeks ago on Friday the 4th. On that day I stayed in the neverland hostel and just read the embarrasing news about what happened the night before to the HDP polititians. I decided to write some paper signs with "Free Dermirtas" and tagged them to some walls i just passed. That was about 8 pm. Afterwards I stayed in the Hostel again with some friends, talking about the situation and the hostel staff warned me to be careful with actions like this, because you can never know, wether there are civil policemen around.	“Ev bûyera ez behsê dikim şeva 4ê Mijdarê roja Înê pêk hat. Ez li Beyogluyê li hosteleke dimanyam. Parlementerên HDPê hatibûn girtin û min wan nûçeyên rûreşiyê xwendin. Min li ser hin kaxizan “Free Demritaş (Ji Demirtaş re Azadî)” nivîsandin û min biryar da ku ez ê van kaxizan li cihê ku ez jî derbas dibim ve daliqînim. Saet dora 8an bû. Piştre ez zivirîme hostelê. Dema ez derbarê vê de bi hevalê xwe re diaxivîm, xebarkarên hostelê ji min re gotin ku ji ber vê yekê divê ez miqatê xwe bim ku li derdor gelek polîsên sivîl hene.
Later (about 11 pm) I went with a friend from Iran to the Talabasi Blv. He left me for a while and I was waiting at the corner, rolling a cigarette. Suddenly several guys we're around me. They were five as I remenber - in civil clothes- and showed their police cards. They asked me whether it is tobacco or marijuana, I was rolling. They saw, that it was just normal rolling tobacco, anyway they asked me my passport and wanted to know, what I was doing there. I said, that I'm waiting for a friend”.	“Ez û hevaleke xwe yê Îranî dora saet 11an çûne Tarlabaşiyê. Ew ji ber karê xwe ji min qetiya. Ez jî serê kolanê li benda wî bûm û min cigarekê vêxist. Di wê demê de 5-6 kesên sivîl dora min girtin û nasnameyên xwe yên polîsbûnê nîşanê min dan. Li pasaporta min nihêrîn û ji min pirsîn ka ez li vir çi dikim. Min jî got ku ez li benda hevalê xwe me.”
“They accused me of being a terrorist and an agent”	“Ji min re gotin terorîst, ajan”
In this moment one of them grabbed into my jacket pocket and found the last "Free Demirtas" sign, I still had left.	“Ji wan yekî destê xwe avête bêrika min ji wê kaxizên ku li ser “Free Demirtaş” dinivisî û ji xwe yek tenê mabû derxist. Wê demê rewş dijwartir bû û min weke “terorîst” û “ajantiyê” sûcdar kirin.
“The strongest punch I received”	“Qer dikirin û digotin ‘Demirtaş kî ye’”
So I entered and they immediately started beating me. Not with full force (I now think they just wanted to scare me) but many times in the face.	“Li her cihê min nihêrîn, berikên min vala kirin. Lê ti tişteke nedîtin. Pasaporta min dîsa dane min. Min lêz kir û ez ji wir dûr bûm.

Biryara girtinê ji bo 48 kesan hatiye dayin ku hevserokê PYDyê, Salih Mûslim û 5 fermandarên pile-bilind ên PKKyê Zûbeyîr Aydar, Remzî Kartal, Cemîl Bayik, Murat Karayilan û Fehman Huseyn jî tê de ne.

In its session titled “EU-Turkey relations” organized in Strasbourg last night (November 22), the European Parliament (EP) discussed pausing the negotiations with Turkey.	Parlementoya Ewropayê (PE) duh êvarê li Strasbourgê rûniştineke bi navê “Têkiliyên navbera YE-Tirkiye” lidar xist.
Tendency of political groups in the EP was towards pausing the membership negotiations held between the European Union and Turkey on the ground that Turkey “strays away from the way of democratic and law state”.	Helwesta komên siyasî yên di PEyê de ew e ku Tirkiye ji ber “ji demokrasî û hiqûqê” dûr ketiye divê muzakereyên bo endambûna Yekîtiya Ewropayê were sekinandin.
The motion, which has been brought to agenda by Socialists and Democrats, the second biggest group in the EP, on Turkey will be voted tomorrow (November 24).	Wê sibê (24ê Mijdarê) di rûniştina duyem de ji bo pêşniyaznameya ku bi înîsiyatîfa Sosyalîst û Demokratan (S&D) hatiye rojevê dengdan pêk were.
The EP is not authorized to freeze, suspend or stop the negotiations by itself.	PE bi tena serê xwe nikare muzakereyên navbera YE-Tirkiyeyê de bide sekinandin an betal bike.
The final decision is made by EU leaders. The EU leaders will convene in December. The EP decision might be influence EU’s decision. (AS/TK)	Biryara dawî ji hêla lîderên dewletên endamên YEê ve tê dayîn. Lêbelê ev biryara PEyê wê gelek bandorî biryara YEyê jî bike.

The European Parliament (AP) has passed the motion for a resolution, suggesting a temporary freeze of the on-going accession negotiations, which started on September 3, 2005, between Turkey and the European Union (EU).	Li Parlementoya Ewropayê weke pêşniyaz hatibû xwestin ku muzakereyên navbera Tirkiye-Yekîtiya Ewropayê (YE) were sekinandin û ji bo wê yekê îro dengdan hat lidarxistin. Muzakereyên bi Tirkiyeyê re ya ji bo tevlibûna YEyê di sala 2005an de destpê kiribû.
The motion was passed with 479 yes votes against 37 no votes out of 623 votes in total. There were 107 abstain votes.	Reutersê ragihand ku ew pêşniyaz bi nêzî temamiya dengan hat qebûlkirin. Di encama dengdanê de 37 dengên na, 479 dengên erê hat jimartin. 107 parlementer jî dengên xwe weke bêbiryar bi kar anîn.

According to reports that bianet compiled from national and local newspapers, news sites and agencies, men killed 21 women and two girls in November, raped seven women, forced 37 women to sex work, sexually harassed nine women, inflicted violence on 32 women, sexually abused 35 girls.	Li gor nûçeyên bianetê ji rojnameyên herêmî û neteweyî, ji malper û ajansan berhev kirîn, mêran di Çiriya Paşiyê de 21 jin û du zarok kuştine, tecawiz li heft jinan kiriye, detdirêjî li neh jinan kiriye, îstismar li 35 zarokên keç kiriye, tûndkarî li 32 jinan kiriye.
Men killed over 241 women in the first 11 months in 2016, raped 72 women, harassed 111 women, sexually abused 387 girls, inflicted violence on 314 women.	Di yazdeh mehên 2016ê de mêran ya kêm 241 jin kuştine, tecawiz li 72 jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 111 jinan kiriye, îstismara zayendî li 387 zarokên keç kiriye, tûndkarî li 314 jinan hatiye kirin.
Femicide	Kuştin
Following the end of his restraining order, a man killed his wife and two children by slitting their throats.	Mêrekê jina xwe ya berê û xwesiya xwe kuştiye û gotiye: “Tê gotin ku mafên jinan hene, ew nînin”
One of the killed women was forced to marry at an early age, she left the home number of times but returned to house upon her parents’ insistences and was killed aged 22.	Yek ji jinan di emrê biçûk de bi zorê hatiye zewicandin. Ew gelek caran ji malê reviyaye lê malbata wê ew li malê vegerandiye. Di 22 saliyê de hatiye kuştin.
Men killed three women by choking, two by cutting their throat, one by throwing her from high, one by burning her, six by stabbing them, six by pistol, one by beating, one by bearing with an object.	Mêran sê jin xeniqandine, serê sê jinan jê kirine, jinek ji cihek bilind avêtiye, jinek şewitandiye,  şeş jin kêr-ve-dane, şeş jin bi demancan kuştine.
The cities in which femicide took place are Adana (2), Afyon (1), Antalya (1), Antep (2), Balıkesir (2), Elazığ (1), Eskişehir (1), İstanbul (3), İzmir (1), Kayseri (1), Konya (3), Muğla (1), Ordu (1) and Urfa (1). Rape	Tecawiz
Seven rape incidents were covered by media in November.	Di Çiriya Paşiyê de heft nûçeyên tecawiza li jinan hatine nivîsîn.
One woman was raped by her lover, one by her elder brother, one by a manager whom she met for an employment interviewing, four by men they didn’t know. Harassment	Destdirêjî
Men harassed nine women in November.	Mêran di meha Mijdarê de 9 jinan tacîzkirin.
44% of the harassers were known by the women: One woman was harassed by her ex-lover, one by her neighbor, one by her lover, one by a man whom she met on social media, five by men they didn’t know.	Nêzî nîvê ji wan mêrên destdirêjkar naskiriyên jinan bûn.
Two women killed the women on self-defense while the men were harassing or threatening them. One of the two women arrested was victim of systemtatic harassment and had changed her address three times to get rid of the harassment.	2 jinan li dijî mêrên ku wan tacîz û tehdît dike xwe parastin û wan kuştin. Ji 2 jinên hatin girtin; yek maxdûrê desrtdirêjiyê bû û ji bo ku ji tacizkirinê xwe xwelas ke 3 caran mala xwe guherandibû.
Seven women were subjected to physical, one was subjected to digital and one was subjected to verbal harassment.	7 jin bi bi awayekî fizikî, jinek bi riya digitalê, yek bi awakî devkî û yek jî bi şopandinê ve hatin tacîzkirin.
Only two women were arrested in nine harassment cases. One of the perpetrators arrested was a Syrian refugee.	Di encama 9 bûyerên destdirêjiyê de tenê 2 mêr hatin girtin. Yek ji wan mêran penaberê Sûrî bû.

Child abuse	Îstîsmarkirina zarokan
Men sexually harassed 35 girls in November.	Mêran di meha Mijdarê de 35 zarokan îstîsmar kirin.
60% of the harassment cases took place at schools: 21 girls were subjected to sexual abuse at school, one in a bus, three on the street and four at home. Whereabouts of the five incidents weren’t covered by media.	Bûyerên îstîsmarkirina cinsî  %60 li dibistanan pêk hatine. 21 zarokên keç li dibistanê, yek di otobusê de, 3 li derê malê, yek li salona werzîşê û 4 jî di nav malan de rastî îstîsmarina cinsî hatin.
34% of the girls were abused by their teacher or other school staff and 14% by their male relatives: Seven children were sexually abused by their teachers, two by school principals, three by school staff, nine by other students at school, one by her elder brother, one by her relatives, one by her father, two by their step-fathers, five by men they didn’t know. Perpetrators of the five incidents didn’t take place in media.	Ji wan zarokên keç; %34 ji hêla mamoste û xebatkarên li dibistanê, %14ên wan bi destê xizmên wan ve, hatin îstîsmarkirin. 7 zarok ji hêla mamosteyên xwe ve, 2 ji hêla mudirê dibistanê ve, 3 ji hêla xebatkarên li dibistanê ve, 9 ji hêla xwendekarên din ve, yek ji hêla kekê xwe ve, yek ji hêla xizmê xwe ve, yek ji hêla bavê xwe ve, 2 ji hêla kurên jinbavê xwe ve, 5 zarok jî ji hêla mêrên xerîb ve hatin îstîsmarkirin.
15 perpetrators were arrested, 14 perpetrators were released. Only one of the three teachers abusing seven girls was arrested, one was released on probation and the other was only suspended.	15 sûcdar hatin girtin. 14 faîl jî serbest hatin berdan. Derbarê pêvajoya dadkirina 5 destdirêjkaran de agahî di medyayê de cih negirtin.
The cities in which child abuse incidents took place are iller Adana (2), Adıyaman (1), Antalya (2), Aydın (1), Çanakkale (1), Edirne (1), Eskişehir (2), İstanbul (2), İzmir (2), Kayseri (8), Kocaeli (1), Kütahya (1), Muğla (2), Sakarya (1), Tekirdağ (1), Tokat (5), Urfa (1) and Zonguldak (1).	Bajarên ku zarok lê hatin îstîsmarkirin wiha ne: Edene (2), Sêmsûr (1), Antalya (2), Aydin (1), Çanakkale (1), Edirne (1), Eskişehir (2), Stenbol (2), Îzmir (2), Kayseri (8), Kocaeli (1), Kutahya (1), Mugla (2), Sakarya (1), Tekirdag (1), Tokat (5), Riha (1) û Zonguldak (1).
Violence-injury	Tundî-birîndarkirin
Men injured/inflicted violence on 32 women in November and killed five men (their father, lover, co-worker etc.) near them.	Mêran di meha Mijdarê de li 32 jinan tundî/birîndar kirin. 5 mêrên (bav, destgirtî, heval hwd) ku dema bûyeran li cem wan jinan bûn jî hatin kuştin.
31% of the violence cases took place in public places such as in the middle of the street, bank or tube.	Bûyerên tundî û birîndarkirinê; %31 li derê malê cihên weke banke û metroyê pêk hatin.
12.5% of the women were subjected to violence for seeking divorce.	%12ê jinan ji ber ku xwestine ji wan mêran biqetin, rastî tundlêkirinê hatin.
37.5% of violence-injury incidents took place by methods that could be resulted by death. Four women were injured by rifle, five by knife, two by pistol and 20 by being beaten. One woman was tortured. Two women were subjected to violence despite protection order.	Di %37,5ê wan bûyeran de qesta kuştinê hat kirin û bi wî awayî jin hatin birîndarkirin. 4 jin bi tifingê, 2 bi kêrê, 2 bi demançê û 20 jî bi derbkirinê ve hatin birîndarkirin. Li jinek jî îşkence hat kirin.

- Attack on Konyaaltı beach in Antalya on August 26, 2011 and the attack on Kemer public beach leaving 6 wounded on August 28.	26ê Tebaxa 2011an de li Antalya Konyaaltiyê, di 28ê Tebaxê de jî li Antalya Kemerê êrişên bi bombeyan pêk hatibûn û di encamê de 6 kesan bîrîndar bûbûn.
- The attack launched against military vehicle killing 28 on Merasim street in Ankara on February 17, 2016.	17 Sibata 2016an de li Enqereyê li dijî servîsa leşkeran bi bombeyan êriş hat kirin û di encamê de 28 kesan canên xwe ji dest dan.
- The attack launched in Kızılay, the Ankara's one of most crowded district claiming lives of 37 on March 13, 2016.	Êrişa 13ê Adara 2016an a li Enqere Guvenparkê ku di encamê de 37 kes hatibûn kuştin,
- The bomb attack carried out against police bus killing 11 people including six police officers in İstanbul's Vezneciler district on June 7, 2016.	Êrişa 7ê Hezîrana 2016an ya li Stenbol Veznecilerê ku di encamê de 6 jê polîs 11 kes hatib3un kuştin,
- The attack that took place at the western door of Grand Mosque in Bursa wounding 20 people on April 28, 2016.	Êrişa 28ê Nîsana 2016an ya li Bursayê ku di encamê de çalakvan miribû û 20 kes birîndar bûbûn,
- The attack that wounded 10 people in İstanbul's Bahçelievler district on October 6, 2016.	Êrişa 6ê Cotmeha 2016an ku li Stenbol Yenibosnayê ku di encamê de 10 kes birîndar bûbûn,
Warrants of forcefully bringing eight Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) MPs to court have been issued.	Di 10ê Çiriya Paşiyê de dadgehan biryar dabûn parlamenteran ji ber doza KCKyê bi zorê nedine anîn.
One of the eight MPs is Selma Irmak, who is still under arrest.	Yek ji wan heşt parlamenteran Selma Irmak e ku ew di girtîgehê de ye.
The two are Çağlar Demirli and Besime Konca, who were detained yesterday.	Du ji wan parlamenteran Çaglar Demîrel û Besîme konca ne ku şeva dî ew hatine desteserkirin.
The other MPs are Osman Baydemir, Dirayet Taşdemir, Ahmet Yıldırım, Alican Önlü and Nadir Yıldırım. (YY/TK)	Parlamenterên dî yên biryara girtina wan hatiye dayin ev in: Osman Baydemîr, Dirayet Taşdemir, Ahmet Yıldırım, Alican Önlü û Nadir Yıldırım. (YY/MB)
 	 
Mardin Co-Mayor Emin Irmak has been arrested.	Hevşaredarê Mêrdîn Artûklûyê Emîn Irmak hat girtin.
Alawi Bektashi Organization Federation Secretary General and Sultangazi Pir Sultan Abdal Djemevi President Zeynel Odabaş has been taken into custody from his home towards morning.	Polîsan îro destê sibehê avêtin ser mala Berpirsê Rêxistina Pîr Sûltan Abdalê û Serokê Cemgeha Sultangaziyê Zeynel Odabaş û wî desteser kirin.
While it is unknown of what charge has been pressed against Odabaş, Sultangazi Pirsultan Djemevi Board has issued a statement.	Lijneya Rêveberiya Cemgeha Pîr Sûltan Abdalê ya Sultangaziyê jî daxuyanî da ku derbarê binçavkirina Zeynel Odabaş de ti agahî nehatiye dayîn.
“They told not to inquire after him for five days”	“Gotin heta 5 rojan ti tiştek nepirsin”
Filling in bianet on the developments, Sultangazi Pirsultan Djemevi Secretary Fatma Karabulut said security officers didn’t inform them of the ground of the detention.	Derbarê mijarê de Sekretera Giştî ya Pîr Sûltan Abdalê Fatma Karabulut got ku emniyetê derbarê sedema binçavkirina Zeynel Odabaş de ti agahî nedaye wan.
Stating that police entered the house at around 4:30 a.m. and couldn’t find anything subsequent to their search, Karabulud conveyed the information that police told people around “Don’t inquire after him for five days”.	Karabulut destnîşan kir ku polîsan di saet 4.30ê sibehê de avêtine ser mala Odabaş de, di lêgerînê de ti tiştek nedîtine û ji malbata wî re jî gotine ku “heta 5 rojan neyên neçin û ti tiştek nepirsin.”
Noting that they don’t know where Odabaş was taken to, Karabulut said the authorities said he was taken to Esenler Security Directorate but they confirmed that he is not there and they predict he was taken to Vatan Police Station.	Fatma Karabulutê ragihand ku polîsan gotine ku wî dibin Emniyeta Esenlerê lêbelê wan tespît kirine ku ew ne li wir e û îhtîmaleke zêde wî birine Vatan Emniyetê.
“Alawis have been tried to be taken hostage”	“Bi vî awayî hewl dan ku hemû elewiyan dîl bigrin”
According to a report by Alevinet, Alawi Cultural Associations (AKD) issued a statement as to detaining of Odabaş.	Li gorî nûçeya Alevinetê Lijneya Rêveberiya Cemgeha Pîr Sûltan Abdalê ya Sultangaziyê derbarê binçavkirina Zeynel Odabaş de daxuyanî da û wiha hat gotin:
“We will never bow to this unlawfulness. All Alawis have been tried to be taken hostage in the person of Odabaş.	“Em bi ti awayî li hemberî vê bêhiqûqiyê serî natewînin. Di şexsê Zeynel Odabaş de hewl dane ku hemû gelê elewî dîl bigirin.”

According to a report by Alevinet, Alawite Cultural Associations (AKD) issued a statement as to detaining of Odabaş.	Li gorî nûçeya Alevinetê Lijneya Rêveberiya Cemgeha Pîr Sûltan Abdalê ya Sultangaziyê derbarê binçavkirina Zeynel Odabaş de daxuyanî da û wiha hat gotin:

Demirel and Konca for whom detention warrants were issued as a part of two separate investigation carried out by Diyarbakır and Batman Chief Public Prosecutor’s Offices were detained by Ankara Security Directorate Anti-Terror Bureau in front of HDP Headquarters.	Polîsan parlamentera Sêrtê ya Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP), Besîme Konca û parlamentera Amedê Çaglar Demîrel duhî li Enqereyê desteser kiribû.
The other MPs are Osman Baydemir, Dirayet Taşdemir, Ahmet Yıldırım, Alican Önlü and Nadir Yıldırım.	Dadgeha Êlihê îro, bi şertê “kontrola edlî” biryara  serbest-berdana Besîme Koncayê da.
Who is Besime Konca?	Besîme Konca kî ye?
Born in Maraş in 1970, she graduated from Samsun 19 Mayıs high school. She stayed in prison over political crimes between 1993 and 2004 for 11 years. She was arrested as part of KCK Main Case Operations in 2009, and released in 2014.	Besîme Konca di sala 1970yê de li Mereşê hatiye dinê. Ji sala 1993yê heta sala 2004ê, 11 salan di girtîgehê de maye.
She worked at Free Women Congress Foundation for some time.	Di sala 2014ê de, bi doza KCKyê dîsa hat girtin.
Konca was elected HDP Siirt MP in 2015.	Demekê li Komeleya Kongreya Jinên Azad xebitî. di hilbijartina 2015ê de ji HDPyê wek parlamentera Sêrtê hat hilbijartin.
10 MPs arrested	10 parlamenterên HDPyê gitî ne
HDP Co-Chairs Selahattin Demirtaş and Figen Yüksekdağ, Şırnak MPs Ferhat Encü, Leyla Birlik, Hakkari MPs Selma Irmak, Abdullah Zeydan, Diyarbakır MPs İdris Baluken, Nursel Aydoğan, Ziya Pir, İmam Taşçıer, Ankara MP Sırrı Süreyya Önder and Mardin MP Gülser Yıldırım were taken into custody on November 4.	Herdu hevserokên HDPyê Selahattîn Demîrtaş û Fîgen Yûksekdag parlamenterên Şirnexê Ferhat Encû û Leyla Bîrlîk, parlamenterên Colemêrgê Selma Irmak û Abdullah Zeydan, parlamenterên Amedê Zîya Pîr, Idrîs Balûken, Nûrsel Aydogan û Îmam Taşçier, parlamenterê Enqereyê Sirri Sûreyya Onder û parlamentera Mêrdînê Gulser Yildirim di 4ê Çiriya Paşiyê de hatibûn desteserkirin.
A solidarity night has been organized for arrested writer Aslı Erdoğan simultaneously in cities of Paris, Nantes and Bordeaux.	Li Fransa Parisê li Mala Helbestan (La Maison de la Poésie) ji bo nivîskar Asli Erdogan şeva hevgiriyê hat lidarxistin. Di heman demê de li bajarên Nantes û Bordeauxê jî bi heman armancî şeva hevgiriyê hatin lidarxistin.
Attended by 200 people, the night was opened with reading out of Aslı Erdoğan’s letter that she wrote in prison on December 5.	Şeva li Parisê ku herî kêm 200 kes beşdar bû, bi xwendina nameya Asli Erdogan ku di 5ê Kanûnê de ji zindanê nivîsandibû ve destpê kir.
Stating that some 150 journalists are in prison, Erdoğan said “We owe even our existence to freedom of expression”.	Asli Erdogan di nameya xwe de diyar ku herî kêm 150 rojnameger di zindanan de ne û got: “Em hebûna xwe deyndarê azadiya xweîfadekirinê ne.”
Aslı Erdoğan’s mother Mine Aydostlu, Actes Sud editor, manager of “Turkish letters” collection Timour Muhidine, Actes Sud Director Françoise Nyssen and writer-translator Yiğit Bener attended the night.	Dayîka Asli Erdoga Mine Aydostu, Edîtorê Actes Sudê Timour Muhidine Mudirê Actes Sudê Françoise Nyseen û nivîskar-wergêr Yigit Bener beşdarê şevê bûn.
The literary columns that caused arrest of Aslı Erdoğan will be published by Actes Sud in January 2017. These pieces were read out in French and Turkish.	Françoise Nyseen diyar kir ku divê weşanxane azadîparêz be û got: “Gotinên Asli Erdogan di pirtûkên wê de derbas dibe. Divê em jî wan çap bikin. Actes Sud li gel wê ye. Em li benda wê ne.”
Halfeti Co-Mayor Mustafa Bayram has been arrested.	 Mustafa Bayram hevserokê Şaredariya Xelfetiyê ye ku îro hat girtin.
According to a report by Fırat News Agency, 18 people who were detained as part of a probe launched on November 2 were referred to court for arrest after having their testimonies.	Li gor ANFyê bi lêpirsîna di 2yê Çiriya Paşiyê de hatî dest pê kirin dozgeran xwestine  18 kes bêne girtin.
Eight people including Bayram were arrested. (BK/TK)	Dadgeha Ruhayê hevşaredarê Xelfetîyê jî tê de biryara girtina 8 kesan da.(BK/MB)
* Photo: Halil Fidan / 2 Aralık / Halfeti / AA	*Wêne: Halîl Fîdan /Xelfetî / AA 
Detained in Ankara, Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Deputy Chair Çağlar Demirel has been arrested by Diyarbakır 5th Heavy Penal Court.	Polîsan Çaglar Demîrel li Enqereyê bi biryara serdozgerîyê desteser kiribû. Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a 5.  a Amedê biryara girtina wê da.
Following the detention warrant, Demirel was referred to court after her proceedings at Diyarbakır Security General Directorate were completed.	Çaglar Demîrel cihgira berdevkê Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk e.
While Demirel denied the accusations and demanded her acquittal, the prosecutor in his indictment requested arrest of Demirel.	Dadgeha Amedê ji beriya Demîrel bê girtin biryara desteserkirin û bi zorê birina dadgehê ji bo wê dabû.
The prosecutor demanded jail term from 10 to 23 years on charges of “Being a member of a terror organization”, “Propagandizing for terrorism” for Demirel, who was then arrested.	Demîrel hat dadkirin û wê ti sûcên ew pê tê sûcdarkirin qebûl nekir. Demîrel bi sûcên “endambûna rêxistineka çekdar a terorî”,”propagandakirina rêxistina terorî”,”bêçek beşdarbûna civîn û xwenîşandanên derqanûnî.
Besime Konca has been detained again	Besîme Konca dîsa hat desteserkirin
HDP Siirt MP Besime Konca, who was detained along with Çağlar Demirel and released by the court afterwards, has been detained again.	Besîme Koncaya parlamentera HDPyê jî duhî Dadgeha Êlihê bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest berdabû. Polîsan bi biryara serdozgeriyê ew dîsa girt.

Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Siirt MP Besime Konca was detained in Ankara on December 12 and then released but then arrested again upon objection by prosecutor’s office last night.	Polîsan parlamentera Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP) ya Sêrtê bi biryara serdozgeriya Dadgeha Êlihê, di 12ê Kanûna Paşiyê de li Enqereyê desteser kiribû.
Konca was taken into custody in Diyarbakır Courthouse where she came to watch hearing of HDP Group Deputy Chair Çağlar Demirel.	Dadgeha Êlihê duhî biryara serbest-berdana bi şertê kontrola edlî ji bo Koncayê da.
Diyarbakır 2nd Heavy Penal Court had ruled that HDP MPs Osman Baydemir, Dirayet Taşdemir, Çağlar Demirel, Selma Irmak, Ahmet Yıldırım, Besime Konca, Alican Önlü and Nadir Yıldırım be brought to court by force.	Dadgeha Amedê jî biryara girtina Çaglar Demîrela cihgira berdevkê HDPyê da. Hejmara parlamenterên HDPyê yên girtî bû 12.

Hizan Co-Mayor İhsan Uğur, Mutki Co-Mayor Özcan Birlik and Yolalan Co-Mayor Felemez Aydın, all from the Democratic Regions Party (DBP), have been detained in an operation launched in Bitlis.	Pêla binçavkirin û girtinan Bedlîsê Hevşaredarê Xizanê Îhsan Ugur, Hevşaredarê Motkan Ozcan Birlik û Hevşaredarê Felemez Aydin hatin binçavkirin.
In its statement, Bitlis Governorship stated that the three figures were arrested on charges of “Being a member of a terror organization”, “Carrying out activities and actions on behalf of a terror organization”, “Aiding and abating a terror organization”.	Derbarê binçavkirina 3 hevşaredaran de Walîtiya Bedlîsê di rûpela xwe de daxuyanî da û got: “Ew 3 kes ji ber “endamên rêxistinê ne”, “bi ser navê rêxistinê çalakî lidar dixin” û “alîkariyê rêxistinê dikin” ve hatine binçavkirin.
Searchers were conducted in their houses, it was stated.	Herwiha duh Hevşaredarê Wêranşarê Emrullah Cin jî hat binçavkirin.
Yesterday, Şırnak’s Kumçatı district Co-Mayor Mehmet Demir, Urfa’s Halfeti Co-Mayor Mustafa Bayram and Mardin’s Artuklu Co-Mayor Emin Irmak were arrested.	Duh jî Hevşaredarê Dêrgulê Mehmet Demir, Hevşaredarê Xelfetiyê Mustafa Bayram û Hevşaredarê Artûklûyê Mehmet Emîn Irmak hatibûn girtin.

An armed attack has been launched on Peoples’ Democratic Party’s (HDP) Headquarters in Ankara.	Êrîşkarekî li Enqereyê bi tifeka xwe êrîşî Navenda Giştî ya HDPyê kir.
Coming to the headquarters at around 10:30 p.m. yesterday (December 15), a person named A.T.G. took four shots at the building with a shotgun.	Kesekê bi navê A.T.G şeva dî di siet 22.30ê hatiye ber deriyê navenda HDPyê û bi tifeka xwe çar fîşek berdane avahiyê.
The attacker was taken to Security Directorate to be questioned after detained by police teams at the scene.	Polîsên li nêzîkî avahiyê êrîşkar desteser kiriye.
As to the attack, HDP in its written statement said:	HDP: Desthilat bûye rêxweşkera êrîşkarî
“Our building has been slightly damaged in the attack in which no one was injured.	HDPyê piştî êrîşê daxuyaniyek belavkir û da zanîn ku rêxweşkera êrîşê dewlet e.
“The perpetrators of the attacks launched on our provincial-district buildings and lastly Headquarters are the government authorities who scream for ‘vengeance’, instructing law enforcers to be ‘merciless’, declare ‘national mobilization’ based on no law and target our party every day.	“Rêxweşkera êrîşên li navendên me, ew desthilat e ku doza “tolhildanê” dike û ji hêzên dewletê re dibêje “bê merhemet bin”
“With this attitude, the government aims to cover its mistakes and flops in domestic and foreign policies. ‘Presidential system or chaos’ approach drags the society and country to a disaster step by step.	“Em ê li hemberî hewildanên teswîyekirina HDPyê, bi hêzeka xurt bisekinin û ji bo sîyaseta demokratîk israr bikin.
“We strongly insist on democratic politics despite the efforts to purge HDP from democratic politics. We are determined to solve our problems through democratic politics, dialogue and negotiation”. (EKN/TK)	“Em ê ji bo çareserkirina kêşeyan dest ji dîyalog, mûzakere û siyaseta demokratîk bernedin.”(EKN/MB)

Maxime Demiralp, director of Fırat News Agency (ANF) has been arrested by Belgian Police on Turkey's demand.	Mudirê Nûçeyan ê Ajansa Nûçeyan a Firatê Maxime Demiralp li ser daxwaza Tirkiyeyê ve ji hêla polîsên  Belgiûmê ve hatin girtin.
ANF in its statement has accused the Government of Turkey of trying to target also the Kurdish journalists with its oppression and terror policy which it wanted to exercise on basis of an INTERPOL order it had issued against Kurdish politicians and added;	“Polîtîkaya zextê û terorê ya Komara Tirkiyeyê, ku bi biryarên ÎNTERPOL'ê li dijî siyasetmedarên Kurd dimeşîne, berfireh bûye û êdî rojnamevanên Kurd jî dike hedef. Girtina midûrê me yê nûçeyan Demîral ji aliyê Belçîkayê ve, encameke vê yekê ye.
"According to the information we obtained, Turkey's application to INTERPOL against Demiralp is directly related to the news made by our agency. Arresting a journalist on ground of the reports she/he has made, is a shameful situation in a European country on terms of the democracy and freedoms.	Li gorî agahiyên gihîştine ber destê me, serlêdana Tirkiyeyê ya li ÎNTERPOL'ê der heqê Demîralp de, ji ber nûçeyên di ajansa me de hatine weşandin e. Li ser navê demokrasî û azadiyê cihê şermê ye, ku li welatekî Yekîtiya Ewropayê rojnamevanek ji ber nûçeyên xwe tê girtin.
"With this practice, Belgium has become a law enforcer in Europe for Turkey's censorship and oppression policies against the press".	Belçîka bi vê pêkanîna xwe bûye hêza bicihanîna polîtîkayên zext û sansurê yên Tirkiyeyê li Ewropayê. Girtina Demîralp, tê wê wateyê ku zextên li Tirkiyeyê li çapemeniyê tên kirin gihîştine Ewropayê.

Prof. Dr. Kıvanç Ersoy standing trial for having signed the declaration of "We will not be a party to this crime" was held today (December 22).	Dadgehê daxwaza bera’etkirinê ya herçar akademîsyenên aştîxwaz, Esra Mungan, Meral Camci, Muzaffer Kaya û Kivanç Ersoyî qebûl nekir.
Attorney: There is no crime, we are waiting for acquittal	Parêzer: Sûc tûne ye em beraetê dixwazin
The academics are being tried on charge of "propagandizing for an [illegal] organization" before 13th Criminal Court of Justice of Istanbul Court in Çağlayan in accordance with the Article 7/2 of the Anti-Terror Law.	Akademîsyen, bi sûce “propagandaya rêxistinê têne dadkirin. Dozgerî xwest, akademîsyen bi qanûna 301. ya “kêmdîtina Tirkîtî, saziyên dewletê û organên wê”  bêne sûcdarkirin.
Taking the floor in the hearing which lasted approximately five minutes, Attorney Meriç Eyüboğlu said;	Akademîsyenên bersûc nehatin dadgehê. Ji Tirkiyeyê û dinyayê sîyasetmedar û akademîsyen
The court has decided to wait for the return of the file with a response from the Ministry of Justice and adjourned the hearing to a future date.	Dadkirina akademîsyenan 5 deqîqeyan dom kir. Parêzera akademîsyenan, Merîç Eyûpoglûyê di dema dadkirinê de got:

On her official Twitter account, Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) İstanbul MP and Parliamentary Deputy Chair Pervin Buldan shared the post that “I have been detained”.	Polîsan, Pervîn Buldana parlamentera Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP) û cihgira serokê parlamentoyê desteser kir.
The HDP announced that Buldan was taken from her house in İstanbul this morning and detained.	HDPyê ragihand ku Buldan vê sibeyê li mala wê hatiye desteserkirin.
About Pervin Buldan	Pervîn Buldan kî ye?
She was born in Hakkâri Province in 1967, and she grew up and went to school there. She graduated from high school and started work as an official in the local government administration department.	Sîyasetmedar e. Di sala 1967ê de li Colemêrgê hatiye dinê.
Yakay-Der grew out of the experience of the ‘Saturday Mothers’, who used civil disobedience to gain publicity and bring attention to the ‘disappearances in custody’ cases. These cases became known to the public in Turkey as well as to the world at large.	Di sala 1999ê de li ser lîsteya HADEPê bû berbijara parlamenteriyê lê ji ber ku partiya wê ji benda hilbijartinê neborî nebû parlamenter.
In 2005, she was nominated as a candidate by a Swiss women initiative for Nobel Peace Prize.	Di sala 2005ê de yek ji jinên karsazên Swêdê ew wek berbijara xelata Nobelî nîşan da.
Buldan is still serving as HDP Group Deputy Chair.	Parlamentera HDPyê ye.

Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Parliamentary Deputy Chair Pervin Buldan has been released after appearing before judge in Bakırköy Courthouse.	Dadgeha Bakirkoyê biryar da Pervîn Buldana parlamentera Partiya Herêman a Demokratîk(HDP) û cihgira parlamenê serbest bê berdan.
Buldan had twitted “I have been detained” on her Twitter account this morning.	Pervîn Buldanê vê sibeyê li ser hesabê xwe yê Twîtterê dabû zanîn ku ew hatiye desteserkirin.
Buldan evaluated the situation to bianet.	Piştî ku Buldan ji dadgehê derket wê ji bianetê re got:
“They brought me to court but I didn’t give a testimony. I stated that 12 of our MPs are under arrest due to political decisions and added that I won’t be a part of this unlawfulness and won’t testify.	“Man ez birim dadgehê û çûm hizûra dîwana dadkirinê. Lê min îfade neda. Min dîyar kir ku ji ber sebebên siyasî 12 parlamenterên me di girtîgehê de ne. Ez ê nebim parçeyeka vê bêhiqûqîyê.
“I am one of the two women who administer the TBMM (Grand National Assembly of Turkey). When AKP’s parliamentary deputy chair Ayşenur Bahçekapılı was detained in German 10 days ago, this country’s president [Recep Tayyip Erdoğan] had said ‘No one can detain my parliamentary deputy chair’. However, I was detained today even though I am a parliamentary deputy chair.	“Ez yek ji du cihgirên jin ên serokê parlamentoyê me. Ji beriya 10 rojan dema cihgira dî ya parlamenê, Ayşenûr Bahçekapili li Almanyayê hat desteserkirin, serokkomarê vî welatî gotibû ‘ti kes nikarin cihgira serokê parlamena min desteser bike’ lê digel ku ez cihgira serokê parlamenê me jî dîsa îro hatim desteserkirin.”
