An investigation has been launched into 433 film workers, who issued a support declaration for Academics for Peace on charge of “promoting crime and criminal”.	433 sînemagerên ku danezane piştgirîdayînê ya ji bo Akademisyenên Aştîxwaz belav kiribûn de lêpirsîn dan destpêkirin.
In their declaration, the film workers had said:	Sînemagerên Aştîxwaz çi gotibûn?
“We as film-makers from Turkey, support the call on government by Academics for Peace Initiative for peace and negotiation on January 11, 2016.	Sînemagerên Aştîxwaz jî ji bo piştgirîdayîn bo wan akademîsyenan danezak belav kiribûn û di wê metna danezanê de jî wiha hatibû gotin:
“We refuse hindering of freedom of expression and thought.	“Em weke sînemagerên Tirkiyeyê,
“We stand by equality and peace.	“Em piştgirî didin banga Akademîsyên Aştî xwaz.
“We advocate right to live.	“Em astengkirina azadiya raman û xweîfadekirinê red dikin.
“We side with free thought and art.	“Em wekhevî û aştiyê diparêzin.
“No ifs, no buts: ‘We will not be a party to this crime!’	“Em bêyî ti şertê dibêjin: Em nabin hevparê vê sûcê!”
MoI Press Centre has issued a statement noting that legal proceedings were launched against 3,710 persons in the last 6 months due to their comments shared in the social media. 	Wezareta Karên Navxweyî diyar kir hezar û 656 kesên ku ji ser malperên civakî propagandaya terorê, li mezinên dewletê heqaret, qastî yekîtiya dewlet û milet kirine, hatin girtin.
MoI has announced the grounds for launching legal proceedings as part of the deliberations of the DG Security, as follows; " Inciting people to breed enmity and animosity, praising the terror organisation, conducting propaganda of the terror organisation, publicly announcing his/her association to terror organisation, insulting the state dignitaries, aiming at the indivisible integrity of the state and security of life of the people."  	Wezareta Karên Hundir daxuyand ku wan bi hinceta ‘nav li gel dikin ku wan kîndar û xwedînefret bikin, pesnê rêxistinê didin, heqaretê li mezinên dewletê dikin’ lêpirsîn, binçavkirin û girtinan pêk anîne.
1,656 arrested, 84 detained	1656 kes hatin girtin, 84 kes jî binçavkirî ne
MoI announced that among 3,710 people detained, 1,656 were arrested, 1,203 were released on probation, 84 were detained, 767 were realised from detention.  	Di vê çarçoveyê da di 6 mehên dawîn da ji bo 3 hezar û 710 kesên ku tevlî sûcên ji ser malperên civakî tên kirin bûne da muameleyên edlî hat kirin. Ji gumanbaran hezar û 656 kes hatin girtin, hezar û 203 kes bi şertê kontrola edlî û 767 kes jî piştî muameleyên li ewlehiyê serbest hatin berdan. 84 kes hê jî binçavkirî ne û derbarê wan de muamaleyên li ewlehiyê dewam dike.
MoI also announced that investigation and legal processes were ongoing against 10,000 people whose open IDs were revealed and referred to Prosecution Offices. 	Daxuyaniyê da hat diyarkirin ku Serdozgeriyên Komarê derbarê 10 hezar kesên nasnameyên wan hatin kifşkirin da jî dest bi pêvajoya edlî û lêpirsînê kirin.
The MoI statement included; "In addition to reinforcement of technical capabilities of our fight against crime units, cooperation with many national and international service providers, institutions and organisations, including Twitter, Facebook, YouTube has been brought to a highest possible level." (BK/TK)	(BK/YO)
A gag order has been issued on coverages about assassination of Andrey Karlov, the Russian Ambassador to Turkey a week after the assassination.	Dadgeha Enqereyê ya Sûlh û Cezayî ya 7. çêkirina nûçeyên li ser kuştina balyozê Rûsyayê yê li Tirkiyeyê, Andrey Karlovî qedexe kir.
The gag order request by Ankara Chief Public Prosecutor’s Office Constitutional Crimes Investigation Bureau was accepted by Ankara 7th Criminal Judgeship of Peace last night (December 26).	Li gor nûçeya Ajansa Anadolûyê, dadgehê eşkere kiriye ku “agahiyên hin kesan ên li medyaya nivîskî û dîmenî beşek ji lêpirsînê ne û ev yek jî nahêle lêpirsîn bi awayekê biserkeftî bê kirin” ji ber wê biryara qedexekirina çêkirina nûçeyan hatiye dayin.
The ground for the gag order was introduced as “protection of national security, public order and safety, and territorial integrity”.	Her dîsa dadgehê eşkere kiriye ev biryar “ji bo parastina rêk-û-pêkîya civakê, ewlehiya wê û yekîtîya axa [welatî]” hatiye îlankirin.
Some news covering statements of girlfriend of assailant Mevlüt Mert Altıntaş took place in media today.	Duhî axiftinên xuşka êrîşkarî (xuşka Mevlüt Mert Altıntaşî) û îro şîroveyên destgirtiya êrîşkarî bûbûn nûçe.
In his statement in the wake of the assassination, President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan had announced that the investigation would be carried out in joint efforts with Russia.	Lêpirsînê heyeteka ji 18 kesan pêk tê ya Rûsyayê digel polîsên Tirkiyeyê bi rê ve dibe.
The investigation is ongoing. (AS/TK)	Ji bo lêpirsînê 13 kes hatine desteserkirin. (AS/MB) 
“I’ve come to Galatasaray for years hoping to meet my son Hüseyin. They wanted to throw us away, coshed and detained us, dragged us on the ground but we haven’t given up”.	“Bi salan e ez bi hêviya dîtina kurê xwe Huseyîn diçim Qada  Galatasarayê. Hewl dan ku berxwedana me bifetisînin, bi copan li me xistin, me bi erdê ve kaşkirin û binçav kirin. Lê me ev dest ji berxwedanê berneda.”
These words belong to Hüseyin Morsümbül’s mother Fatma Morsümbül, a Saturday Mother, who passed away last night (December 26).	Van gotinan diya Huseyîn Morsumbul Dayîka Şemiyê Fatma Morsumbul anîbû ziman û ew duh êvarê (26ê Kanûnê) wefat kir.
Nothing could be heard from high-school student Hüseyin Morsümbül (19), who was detained by police and soldiers during a house raid on September 18, 1980 six days after September 12 coup.	Huseyîn Morsumbul 18ê Îlonê de 6 roj piştî derbeya leşkeriya 1980an li mala xwe di serdegirtina polîs û leşkeran de tê binçavkirin. Morsumbulê 19 salî ku xwendekarê Lîseya Bingolê (Çewlik) bû, piştî binçavkirinê jê ti agahî nehate girtin.
The Human Rights Association announced that Fatma Morsümbül’s body will be interred in Bingöl’s Gözeler village at 11 a.m.	Fatma Morsumbula ku 36 salan aqubeta kurê xwe ji dewletê pirsî bêyî ti encam bigre, duh canê xwe ji dest da. Komîsyona Lêkolîna Kesên Hatine Windakirin ya KMMya Stenbolê daxuyand ku cenazeyê Morsumbul dê îro saet 11:00an de ji Nexweşxaneya Dewletê ya Çewlikê were hilanîn û li gundê Gozelerê ya Çewlikê were definkirin.
“I know the grief of losing a child”	“Ez derd û xema zarokên dê û bavan dizanim, aştî dixwazim”
In a letter she sent on September 27, 2014 to Galatasaray Square where she wasn’t present that day as she was in hospital, Fatma Morsümbül had said:	Fatma Morsumbul di 27ê Îlona 2014an de ji ber nexweş bû û li nexweşxaneyê bû û nikaribû biçe Qada Galatasarayê name şadibû û wiha digot:
“Looking after Galatasaray was looking after Hüseyin. I am in the hospital but my children, grand-children are in Galatasaray.	“Xwedîderketina li Galatasarayê, xwedîderketina li Huseyîn e. Ez li nexweşxaneyê me li zarok û neviyên min li Qada Galatasayê ne.
“We were a harmless family with six children. After the coup, soldiers and police officers raided [our house]. My high-school student son’s eyes and hands were tied. They took him away telling us ‘We will receive his testimony and bring him back in five minutes.’ We never saw him again.	“6 zarokên min hebûn û malbateke di halê xwe de bûn. Piştre polîs û leşkeran avêtin ser mala me. Kurê min xwendekarê lîseyê bû. Dest û çavên wî girêdan, gotin ‘em ê îfadeya wî hildin û 5 deqîqe şûnde berdin” û hildan birin. Me careke din wî nedît.
“Hüseyin was my eldest son. I was always thinking about him. I couldn’t mother my other five children. My children raised each other.	“Huseyîn kurê min ê mezin bû. Mêla min her tim li ser wî bû. Ji xwe piştre min nekarî ku bo 5 zarokên xwe yên din re bibim dayîkeke baş. Zarên min hev du mezin kirin.
“I lost my two sons in this dirty interest war. I know the suffering of losing a child. I want peace so other mothers won’t undergo this suffering”. (AS/TK)	“Dewleta ku derbarê aqûbeta Huseyîn de ti tiştek nekir, di sala 2003an de ji ber ku ew di qeydan de neçûye leşkeriyê, wî ji statuya welatîbûnê derxist.
Vice PM Numan Kurtulmuş has made a statement following Council of Ministers meeting. He responded to journalists’ question on subjects such as Operation Euphrates Shield, Constitutional Commission.	Numan Kurtulmuş piştî Civîna Lijneya Wezîran daxuyanî da ji çapemeniyê re û derbarê Komîsyona Makeqanûnê û operasyona li Sûriyê de pirsan bersivandin.
On her Twitter account, scriptwriter Seray Şahiner has announced that she was dismissed from scriptwriting team of ATV’s new drama called Aşk ve Gurur (Love and Pride).	Senay Şahînera nivîskar ji ber ku ji Bilal Erdoganî re gotibû “yê zêde zana” polîsan ew desteser kiribû.
Another scriptwriter in the team, Yıldırım Türker resigned from his job, Şahiner added on her Twitter announcement.	Şahinerê ji bo Limon Yapimê kar dikir. Wê nivîskariya çîroka rêzefîlmeka bi navê “Aşk ve Gurur” (Evîn û Serbilindî) dikir. Rêzefîlm dê di ATVyê de bê weşandin.
A lawsuit was filed against Seray Şahiner upon Şahiner calling President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan’s son Bilal Erdoğan “genius” in her article published on BirGün daily on August 7, 2014.	Bilal Erdoğan'a ÜSTÜN ZEKALI demem sonucu gözaltına alındığım için @LimonFilm'in çektiği ATV'de yayınlanacak AŞK VE GURUR dizisinden atıldım pic.twitter.com/amChAHj4wt
Şahiner was detained by police storming in her hotel room where she stayed in Bursa province on December 11, 2016.	Me bi telefonê ji avakerê Lîmon Yapimê, Hayrî Aslanî bûyer pirsî. Wî got ew ê niho daxuyaniyekê nede. Wek sazî ew ê paşê daxuyaniyekê bide.
Ağrı Co-Mayor Mukaddes Kubilay was arrested last night (December 27).	Hevşaredara Agirîyê, Mukaddes Kubîlay duhî(27ê Kanûna Pêşiyê) hat girtin.
Kubilay was detained during an operation run by Anti-Terror and riot squad forces into Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) provincial and district executives in İzmir on December 22.	Di 22yê Kanûna Pêşiyê de, li Izmîrê polîsan operasyonek li ser birêvebirên HDPyê kiribû. Mûkaddes Kubîlay jî hingê hatibû desteserkirin.
Detained from her house in İzmir’s Torbalı district, Kubilay’s house was searched by operation units.	Li gor nûçeya CNN Turkê Kubîlay piştî ji bo lêpirsîna Serdozgeriya Agirîyê hat desteserkirin ji bo Agiriyê hatiye şandin.
Kubilay was arrested on charge of “Aiding and abating a terror organization”.	Mukaddes Kubîlay berê bûbû hevseroka birêvebiriya HDPyê ya Agiriyê.
As of December 28, 71 co-mayors from 46 DBP-governed municipalities are under arrest, trustees were appointed to 49 municipalities. (BK/TK)	 Bi girtina Kubîlayê 71 hevşaredarên  46 şaredariyên DBPyî hatin girtin. Ji bo 49 şaredariyan qeyûm hatine şandin. (BK/MB) 
Ankara Security General Directorate has declared that Amedspor fans who are not born in Diyarbakır won’t be permitted to enter the game to be played between Gençlerbirliği-Amedspor at Turkish Ziraat Cup.	Mudiriyeta Emniyeta Enqereyê daxuyand ku di maça Gençlerbirligi û Amedsporê de tenê kesên ku li Amedê ji dayîk bûne wê karibin têkevin tirîbunên Amedsporê.
The ones whose IDs are not registered in Diyarbakır were not be allowed to watch the game in the section spared for Amedspor fans.	Wê alîgirên Gençlerbirligiyê bi kartên Passoligê bikaribin biçin stadê. Ji bo trîbunên alîgirên Amedsporê jî tenê kesên li Amedê ji dayik bûne wê karibin têkevinê.
It was learned that the security directorate increased the level of security due to past incidents that occurred between Ankaragücü and Amedspor, and fans’ social media posts, according to Hürriyet daily.	Di trîbuna protokole de jî ewlehiya taybet wê bergiriyê bigirin. Hat hîn bûn ku Ewlehiya Enqereyê ji ber parvekirinên medyaya civakî yên alîgiran û bûyerên borî yê di navbera Ankaragucu û Amedsporê de ewlehiya maçê derxistin asta herî jor.

Jailed pending trial, charged with “Terror organization membership”, author Aslı Erdoğan, Özgür Gündem newspaper’s Editor-in-Chief Zana Kaya and linguist Necmiye Alpay have been released.	Zimanzan Necmiye Alpay, nivîskar Asli Erdogan û Berpirsê Weşana Giştî ya Ozgur Gundemê Zana Kaya ku bi îdiaya ‘endamê rêxistinê ne’ dihatin dadkirin û nêzî 5 meh in girtî bûn, hatin tehliyekirin.
Özgür Gündem case	Di dozê de ewil destûr li Asli Erdogan hat dayîn ku xwe biparêze
İstanbul 8th Criminal Court of Peace closed Özgür Gündem daily on August 16 on charge of “[illegal] organization propaganda”.	Asli Erdogan di axavtina xwe de diyar kir ku ew ‘li dijî şer e, antîmilîtarîst e û redkara wicdanî ye” û got ku her çiqas ew di lijneya şêwira Ozgur Gundemê de cih girtibe jî, berpirsyariyeke hiqûqî bi vê yekê nîn e.
After a short while of the daily’s closing, Riot Squad Police raided daily’s building in İstanbul’s Beyoğlu district.	Erdogan destnîşan kir ku ew derbarê îxlalkirina mafan, jin û zarokan de dinivîse û got: “Ez bo xweparastina meşrû jî li dijî, tundiyê me”.
Özgür Gündem’s Publishing Consultancy Board Member and author Aslı Erdoğan was arrested on August 19.	Polîsan di 17ê Tebaxê de avêtin ser mala Asli Erdogan û piştî binçavkirina 2 rojan dadgehê derbarê wê de biryara girtinê da.
The Constitutional Commission of the Grand National Assembly of Turkey (TBMM) has passed the constitutional amendment draft.	Lijneya Qanûna Bingehîn a Parlamentoyê, teklîfa guhertina Qanûna Bingehîn a Komara Tirkiyeyê qebûl kir.
The Justice and Development Party (AKP) had submitted the constitutional amendment draft with 316 signatures on December 10, 2016.	Partiya Dad û Geşepêdanê(AKP) teklîfa guhertina Qanûna Bingehîn di 10ê Kanûna Paşiyê de, bi îmzeya 316 parlamenteran dabû parlamentoyê.
The Commission had initiated the negotiations on December 20 and the following nine days had passed amid quarrel and brawl.	Komîsyonê di 20ê Kanûna Paşiyê de dest bi hevdîtinan kiribû.
The draft, which initially consisted of 21 articles when submitted to the commission, was reduced to 18 articles with motions.	Ji bo serokatiya parlamentoyê 25 xalên guhertinê hatibû dayin, bi pêşniyarnameyan ew hejmar guherî û bû 18.
Deadline for statement from opposition is January 2	Mixalefet dikare heta 2yê Kanûna Paşiyê şerhê dane
The President of the Constitutional Commission Mustafa Şentop has set the deadline for the opposition to submit their dissenting opinion as Monday, January 2, 2017, 4 p.m.	Serokê Lijneya Qanûna Bingehîn, Mustafa Şentopî eşkere kiriye ku partiyên mixalefetê dê bikarin heta 2ê Kanûna Paşiyê siet 16.00 şerhê ji bo guhertinê bide.
330 votes needed for approval	Ji bo bê qebûlkirin 330 deng lazim in
In order to hold a referendum on the amendment draft, the draft first needs to be passed by the TBMM Constitutional Commission and consequently be approved by 330 votes in the General Assembly of the Parliament.	Da ku ji bo  guhertina Qanûna Bingehîn referandûm bê kirin. Divê pêşiyê Lijneya Qanûna Bingehîn guhertinan qebûl bike û di parlamentoyê de jî divê ya kêm 330 parlamenter guhertinê erê bike.
What does the draft suggest?	Çi dê biguhere?
The number of the deputies will be raised from 550 to 600.	Hejmara parlamenteran dê ji 550yê bibe 600.
The age limit for deputies will be pulled down to 18 from 25.	Emrê ku berbijar dikerin bikevin di hilbijartinan de dê ji 25ê bibe 18.
The elections will be held in every five years. The Presidential Election will be made on the same day.	Hilbijartin dê di her 5 salan de carekê bê kirin, hilbijartina serokkomarî/ê jî dê di wê rojê de be.
The President of the State	“Dîwana Wezîran” dê nebe
The President will appoint and discharge the vice presidents and the ministers.	Serokkomar dê karmendên pilebilind ên dewletê erkdar bike an jî ji karî biavêje.
The election of the President	Erkên Parlamentoyê
The President will be elected for a period of five years. A person cannot be elected President more than twice.	Parlamento dê qanûnan çêbike, biguhere û rake. Bûtçeyê eşkere bike, biryara çapkirina pereyan, îlana şerî bike.
The power to declare State of Emergency	Parlamento dê bikare bi ji 5ê 3yê dengan afûyê îlan bike.
The regulations in the judiciary	Kî dê bikare bibe serokkomar?
The name of the Supreme Board of Judges and Prosecutors will be changed as the Board of Judges and Prosecutors. The board will have 13 members.	Ew kesên bûyîn 40 salî, dikarin wek parlamenter bêne hilbijartin dê bi dengên welatiyan bêne hilbijartin. (NV/MB)
An armed assault has been launched on the entertainment venue called Reina in Ortaköy district in İstanbul.	Hat eşkerekirin ku di nav miriyan de polîsek jî heye. Ji bo dîyarkirina nasnameyan xebat hatine dest pê kirin.
The minister added that the search to capture the attackers is ongoing.	Serokê Karûbarên Dîyanetê, Mehmet Gormezî li ser hesabê xwe yê Twîtterê êrîş şermezar kir.
President of Religious Affairs condemned the attack	RTUKê çêkirina nûçeyan bi demkî qedexe kir

Vice Prime Minister Numan Kurtulmuş has announced that the State of Emergency would continue, drafts of new statutory would soon be completed and that investigations were launched into 347 social media accounts.	Cihgirê serokwezîrî, Nûman Kurtulmuşî eşkere kir ku Halê Awarte heta ku pêwîst e dê dom bike, dê Biryarnameyên di Hikmê Qanûnan de bêne nivîsîn û lêpirsînek li ser 347 hesabên medyaya civakî hatiye vekirin.
The cabinet meeting led by President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan yesterday (January 2) continued for seven hours and ended at 10 p.m.	Dîwana Wezîran duhî di siet 22.00yê de civîya û civînê 7 sietan dom kir.
State of emergency will continue	“Rewşa Awarte dê dom bike”
"In times, in which Turkey faces so much terrorist attacks and the difficulties in hindering FETÖ's (Fethullahist Terrorist Organization) attempts to infiltrate into the state taken into account, the State of Emergency will continue as long as it is necessary.	*Rewşa Awarte ne hima welê hatiye îlankirin. Heta pêwîst be dê dom bike. Divê dewra ku tehdît dewam dike û FETO hewil dide xwe bike di nav desgehên dewletê de Rewşa Awarte dê dewam bike. Em dixwazin sibeyê Rewşa Awarte bi dawî bê.
"Our preparations in completing the new statutory decree continue, the most of it is completed, we are making the finishing touches. We will share it with the public as soon as possible".	*Me Biryarnameyên di Hikmê Qanûnan de amade kirine. Guhertinên biçûk tê de têne kirin. Em ê di demek kurt de wan eşkere bikin.
Investigation into 347 social media accounts	“Lêpirsîna li ser 347 hesaban”
Deported from Northern Cyprus due to post he had shared on the social media on new year's day, fashion designer Barbaros Şansal has been subjected to a lynch attempt after leaving the plane in Atatürk Airport in İstanbul.	Barbaros Şansalê ku li Bakurê Qibrisê bû ji ber parvekirinên xwe yên di medyaya civakî hat dersînorkirin, duh dema li Balafirgeha Ataturkê peya bû girseyek hewl da ku wî lînc bike.
Brought to İstanbul on the flight of Türkish Airlines (THY) at 8.55 p.m., Şansal was taken into custody by police getting on the plane after landing.	Şansalî duh bi balafirê anîne Stenbolê û dema ji balafirê peya bibe polîsan wî binçav kirin.
Fashion designer Barbaros Şansal had shared a video on social media saying "Are you still celebrating the new year while so many journalists are under arrest, so many children are being harassed and raped, there is so much fraud, bribery and bigots share crap on the streets together with religious annunciators". (EKN/DG)	Modekar Barbaros Şansal di vîdeoya li ser twitterê parve kiribû de wiha digot: “Îro ev qas rojnameger girtî ne, ev qas zarok tên tecawîzkirin û tacîzkirin, ev qas pêkanînên nerêtî û ruşwetê hene û serhişkan li kolanan behsa qirêjiyê dikin. Ka hûn sala nû pîroz dikin gelo?”
Arrested over the books and magazines they had at their house despite having stated that they were illiterate, farmer Ramazan Akdağ and his wife Halime Akdağ have been released.	Halime û Ramazan Akdag du cotkar in ku li navçeya Izmîrê ya Menderesê dijîn. Polîsan ji ber ku kovar û kitêb li mala wan dîtine ew desteser kiribûn.
CLICK - ILLITERATE FARMER ARRESTED OVER PROPAGANDA VIA BOOKS	Di 22yê Kanûna Pêşiyê de herdu cotkar hatibûn girtin.
The investigation, which ended up with a house raid, had started with their daughter's social media posts "being reported".	“Ji ber Twîtên keça wan polîsan bi ser mala wan de girtine”

Attorney Akdoğdu in the petition of objection stated that his client was living in a village, they lived off farming and that their monthly income was around 134 euro.	“Kovarên salên 2000ê û kitêbên Abdullah Ocalanî li mala wan hatine dîtin.

Prime Ministerial Memorandum as to extending of State of Emergency (OHAL) has been approved at Grand National Assembly of Turkey (TBMM) General Assembly.	Rewşa Awarte ji 19ê Kanûna Paşiyê ve sê mehan hat dirêjkirin. Serokwezîrîyê bi tezkereyekê daxwaza dirêjkirina dema Rewşa Awarte kir û Lijneya Giştî ya Parlamenê qebûl kir.
In the ballot organized on July 21 following July 15 coup attempt, the OHAL was approved with 346 aye votes against 115 nay votes.	Piştî Hewildana Derbekirinê ya di 21ê Tîrmehê de Rewşa Awarte hatibû îlankirin. Ji bo îlankirina Rewşa Awarte ji 461 parlamenteran 346 parlamenteraan dengê erê û 115 parlamenteran dengê na bi kar anibû.
The OHAL decision was renewed and extended on October 19.	Di 19ê Çiriya Pêşiyê de dema Rewşa Awarte ya sê mehane xelas bûbû û ji nû ve ji bo sê mehan hatibû îlankirin.
Ending on January 19, the OHAL was extended second time. It will end on April 19 in case it is not extended again.	Dema Rewşa Awarte dê di 19ê Kanûna Paşiyê de xelas bibûya lê sê mehan hat dirêjkirin. Heke dîsa neyê dirêjkirin dê di 19ê Nîsanê de biqede.
Vice Prime Minister Numan Kurtulmuş said extending of the OHAL didn’t come up at Council of Ministers meeting, however, it was stated in the OHAL memorandum submitted to Assembly General Council that the decision was taken at the Council of Ministers, Bilgen added. Another CHP MP Sezgin Tanrıkulu made a statement via Periscope in front of the Parliament:	Parlamneterê dî yê CHPyê, Sezgîn Tanrikûlûyî li ber deriyê parlamentoyê bi weşana Perîskopê gotiye:
“No one has weapons, no one is a suicide bomber here.	“Di destên ti kesên li vê derê de çek nînin. Ti kes ne êrîşkarên xwekuj in.
“Opinion leaders, bars, engineer chambers known by everyone are here.	“Ew kes li vê derê ne ku her kes wan dinasin. Rêber, BARO û Jorên Endazyaran li vê derê ne...
“Who will express their opinion if not them? Constitution cannot be made in this climate”.	“ Heke ev kes fikra xwe nebêjin kî dê bibêjin? Di van şertan de Qanûna Bingehîn nayê çêkirin.
Some CHP MPs were injured	Parlamenterên CHPyê birîndar bûne
338 voted in favor of initiating the negotiations on the articles of the draft and 134 deputies voted against. There were five blank and two abstention votes. One vote was considered invalid.	338 parlamenteran dengê erê û 134 parlamenteran jî dengê na da.
 	 
Governorship of Ankara, the Turkey's capital city, has banned all demonstrations, protests and other similar activities in public places in Ankara for 30 days due to information related to terrorism.	Walîtiya Enqereyê heta 30 rojan hemû çalakî, meş, lîstik,  raxistek û daxuyanîdayîn li her derê bajêr qedexe kirin.
The governorship has announced that all demonstrations, presentations, plays and other shows, press statements and opening stands were banned in all public spaces in Ankara for 30 days in accordance with Article 11 of the State of Emergency Law No. 2935. (NV/DG)	Walîtiyê îdia kir ku wan ji ber îstîxbarata ‘êrişa terorî’ biryara qedexekirinê girtiye.
 	(NV/YO)
The European Federation of Journalists (EFJ) and International Federation of Journalists (IFJ) have asked Minister of Justice Bekir Bozdağ about the situation of journalists Tunca Öğreten, Mahir Kanaat, Ömer Çelik, Metin Yoksu, Eray Saygın, Derya Okatan, who have been in custody for 17 days.	Federasyona Rojnamegerên Navneteweyî (IFJ) û Federasyona Rojnamegerên Ewropayê (EFJ) ji Wezîrê Dadê Bekir Bozdag pirsî ku rojnamegerên bi navên Tunca Ogreten, Mahir Kanaat, Omer Çelik, Metin Yoksu, Eray Saygin û Derya Okatan bo çi 17 roj in binçavkirî ne.
Highlighting that no official statement has been made as to why the journalists are being kept in detention, the IFJ and EFJ have asked Minister of Justice Bozdağ why the journalists who were detained on December 25 are in custody and have demanded release of them.	EFJ û IFJê diyar kir ku derbarê binçavkirina 6 rojnamegeran de heta niha ti daxuyaniyekê fermî nehatiye dayîn û ji Wezîrê Dadê Bekir Bozdag pirsin ku ka sedema binçavkirina wan çiye û xwestin ku ew rojnamegeran demildest serbest werin berdan.
The IFJ and EFJ also added that these right violations would be reported to the European Council's journalism safety platform and Mapping Media Freedom Platform.	IFJ û EFJê her wiha destnîşan kirin ku yê ku pêk tînin binpêkirina mafê mirovan e û ew dê vê yekê ragihînin ji Platforma Parastina Rojnamegeran a Konseya Ewropayê û Platforma Nexşekirina Azadiya Medyayê (Mapping Media Freedom Platform) re.
What had happened?	Çi bûbû?
Confidentiality order was issued on the case.	Di dosyeyê de biryara veşartinê heye.
According to a report by pro-government Sabah daily newspaper, İstanbul Chief Public Prosecutor's Office launched the investigation on charges of "being affiliated with and propagandizing for Redhack hacker group".	Rojnameya Sabahê îdia kiribû ku Serdozgeriya Stenbolê derbarê wan rojnamegeran de bi îdiyên “bi Redhacaka koma heckerê têkşiliyên wan hene, li ser medyaya civakî propagandaya wan kirine” ve lêpirsîn daye destpêkirin.
Antep Governorship has announced that a gun attack was launched on Antep Security Directorate and one person was killed.	Walîtîya Dîlokê eşkere kir ku êrş li Emniyeta Dîlokê hatiye kirin û kesek hatiye kuştin.
Reuters citing Security sources claimed that the assailant was a suicide bomber.	Reutersê ji berpirsekê emniyetê ragihand ku ew êrîşkarê hatî kuştin xwekuj bûye.
Reinforcements and medical units were dispatched to the scene when gunshots started at around 3:23 p.m. in front of the directorate building.	Gelek tîmên saxlemiyê, tîmên hêza taybet û polîsên fermî li cihê bûyerê kom bûne.
An operation has been commenced in order to to capture the one who escaped.	Walîtîya Dîlokê ev daxuyanî da
Vice Prime Minister Numan Kurtulmuş said the incident was similar to the one in İzmir. (NV/TK)	“Êrîş bi ser êrîşa li Izmîrê ve diçe. Li gor agahiyan yek ji terorîstan reviyaye.” (NV/MB)
Photo: Ensar Özdemir - Antep/AA	Wêne: Ensar Ozdemîr – Dîlok / AA 
Men have killed 19, raped three, sexually harassed nine women in December. They sexually abused 30 girls and wounded 25 women.	Li gor nûçeyên bianetê ji rojnameyên herêmî û neteweyî, ji malper û ajansan berhev kirîn, mêran di Kanûna Pêşiyê de 19 jin kuştine, tecawiz li neh jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li neh jinan kiriye, 25 jin birîndar kirine.
In 2016 men killed at least 260, raped 75 women in 2016; harassed 129 women, sexually abused 417 girls, inflicted violence on 329 women.	Di sala 2016ê de mêran ya kêm 260 jin kuştine, tecawiz li 75 jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 120 jinan kiriye, îstismar li 417 keçên zarok kiriye û tûndkarî li 329 jinan kiriye.
Murder	Kuştin
Men killed 19 women and two men next to them in December.	Mêran di Kanûna Pêşiyê de 19 jin û du mêrên li nik wan jinan bûn, kuştine.
57% of the women were killed for seeking divorce/break up or rejecting the proposal to reconcile.	Ji sedî 47ê jinan ji ber ku xwestine ji mêran cida bibin an jî nexwestine bi wan re li hev bên hatine kuştin. Ji sedî 26ê jinên hatîn kuştin li cihên civakî hatine kuştin.
16% of the women were killed despite protection orders; 26% of them were being subjected to systematic violence.	Ji sedî 26ê jinên hatîn kuştin bi awayekê sîstematîk tûndkarî lê hatiye kirin. Partner an jî partnerê berê yê ji sedî 68ê jinan ew kuştine.
68% of the women were killed by their partners or ex-partners: two women were killed by their husbands, two by their ex-lovers, 10 by their husbands, one by her husband and his family, one by her son, one by a man whom she rejected his offer to be together, one by thieves breaking into her apartment, one by a man she didn’t know.	Zavayê du jinan ew kuştine. Mêrê 10 jinan ew kuştine. Jinekê daxwaza seksê ya mêrekî qebûl nekiriye û wî ew kuştiye.
58% of the murders were committed by firearms: Three women were killed by knife, one by being choked dead, two by torture, five by rifle, six by pistol.	Ji sedî 58ê jinên hatîn kuştin bi çekan hatine kuştin. Sê jin bi kêran hatine kuştin. Jinek hatiye xeniqandin. Pênc jin bi tifekan hatine kuştin.
The age of murderers ranged between 18 and 48 and the age of the murdered women ranged between 20 and 86.	Piştî kuştina jinan du mêran xwe kuştine. Du mêran jî piştî kuştina jinan hewil daye xwe bikuje.
Two men committed suicide, two others attempted to commit suicide following the murders.	Bajarên ku di meha Kanûna Pêşiyê de li wan deran tecawiz li jinan hatiye kirin ev in:
The cities in which the murders took place in December are Adana (2), Antalya (1), Bolu (1), Bursa (1), Diyarbakır (1), Elazığ (1), Eskişehir (1), İstanbul (1), İzmir (2), Kayseri (1), Kırklareli (1), Kütahya (1), Mersin (2), Van (1), Yalova (2).	Edene (2), Antalya (1), Bolu (1), Bursa (1), Amed (1), Elazığ (1), Eskişehir (1), Stenbol (1), Izmîr (2), Kayseri (1), Kırklareli (1), Kûtahya (1), Mersîn (2), Wan (1), Yalova (2).
Rape	Tecawiz
Three rape incidents were covered by media in December.	Di Kanûna Pêşiyê de, li gor nûçeyan sê caran tecawiz hatiye kirin.
One woman was raped by her lover and his friends, one by a man she knew and one by a man unknown to her.	Destgirtî û hevalên jinekê tecawiz li wê kiriye. Nasê jinekê tecawiz lê kiriye. Mêrekê ne nasê jinekê tecawiz li wê kiriye.
A university student woman was raped on her way to dormitory. A woman raped by her lover and his friends was left in front of a hospital by the rapists but she lost her life.	Xwendekareka zanîngehê dema vedigere warê xwendekaran di rê de tecawiz li wê hatiye kirin. Destgirtiyê jinekê û hevalên wê tecawiz li wê kiriye û paşê ewweke birînadar daniye ber nexweşxaneyê lê ew miriye.
Two of the rapists were arrested.	Du ji tecawizkaran hatine girtin.  
The age of the perpetrators ranged between 23 and 35 while the age of the victims ranged between 18 and 22.	Emrê tecawizkaran di navbera 23 û 35ê de ye û emrê wan kesên tecawiz lê hatiye kirin jî di navbera 18 û 22yê de ye.
The cities in which the rape incidents took place are Adıyaman (1) and İstanbul (2).	Li bajarên Adiyaman(1) û Stenbolê(2) mêran tecawiz li jinan kiriye.  
Sex work by force	Karkerîya seksê ya bi zorê
The cities in which these incidents took place were Kırklareli (2), Mersin (12), Muğla (3).	Cihên ku bi zorê jin bûne karkerên seksê: Kirklarelî(2), Mêrsîn (12) û Mûgla(3)
Harassment	Destdirêjî
Nine sexual harassment cases against women were covered by media in December.	Li gor nûçeyên hatîn nivîsîn di meha Kanûna Paşiyê de, destdirêjî li 9 jinan hatiye kirin.
A woman who lightly injured the harasser was detained instead of the harasser in one incident. Lawsuit was filed against a woman who was subjected to harassment on a metrobus.	 Di bûyerekê de ne ew kesê destdirêjî li jinekê kirî lê ew jina ew mêr birîndar kirî hatiye desteserkirin. Di metrobûsekê de, destdirêjî li jinekê hatiye kirin û paşê doz li wê hatiye vekirin.
 A woman went to a police station after persistent verbal harassment of a man she didn’t know. At the station, the woman was harassed by some police officers saying “What were you doing in the street at 6:30 a.m.? Furthermore, you smiled at him”.	Mêrekî jinek teqîb kiriye ew jî ji bo xwe ji wî xelas bike çûye navendeka polîsan lê polîsan jê re gotiye di siet 6.30ê sibeyê de çi karê te li derve heye. Dibe ku tu li wî keniyayî bî.
One woman was harassed by her imprisoned husband via phone, three handicapped women were subjected to verbal harassment by their teachers, three women by men they didn’t know, one by a man she just met. Identity of the perpetrator didn’t take place in media in one incident.	Du kesên destdirêjî kirîn hatine girtin. Du kesên destdirêjî kirîn jî serbest hatine berdan. Kesekê ji girtîgehê bi destûrê derdiket destdirêjî kiriye û derketina wî ya derve hatiye qedexekirin.
Three of the harassment cases took place at school, three on the street, one on metrobus, one at workplace, one at a law office, one by phone.	Sê caran bûyerên destdirêjiyê li dibistanan, du caran li kolanan, carekê li metrobûsekê carekê jî li ofîsa parêzeriyê çêbûne.
The age of the perpetrators ranged between 25 and 61 and the age of the victims ranged between 18 and 39.	Di meha Kanûna Pêşiyê de, emrê wan kesên destdirêjî kirîn di navbera 25 û 61ê de bûye. Emrê wan kesên destdirêjî lê hatî kirin jî di navbera 18 û 36ê de bûye.
The cities in which the harassment incidents took place were Adana (1), Antalya (1), Denizli (1), İstanbul (1), İzmir (4), Isparta (1).	Bajarên ku bûyerên destdirêjiyê lê bûne ev in: edene (1), Antalya (1), Denizli (1), Stenbol (1), Izmîr (4), Isparta (1).
Child abuse	Îstîsmarkirina Zarokan
37% of the sexual abuse cases took place at schools: One girl was subjected to sexual abuse in an apartment building, four in their houses, one on a vehicle she was gotten on by force, two at the market, 11 at school, one on the street, one in a deserted building she brought to by force.	%37 bûyerên îstîsmarkirinê li dibistanan pêk hatin. Zarokek li tenxaya apartmanê, 4 zarok li malên xwe, yek li wesayîta bi xapandinê lê siyar bûbû de, 2 zarok li marketê, 11 zarok li dibistanê, yek derve, yek jî li bînayeke vala ku bi zorê hatibû birin de rastî îstîsmarkirina cinsî hatin.
24 men were arrested, two men were released on probation, one man was ruled to be tried without arrest, legal proceedings about one perpetrator didn’t take place in media.	24 mêrên îstîsmarkar hatin girtin, 2 bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest hatin berdan û yek jî bêyî girtinê tê dadkirin.
Following the incident that an 8-year-old girl was abused by her relative for a year, the girl’s father saying that he didn’t believe in the abuse didn’t file a lawsuit against the relative.	Zarokeke 8 salî derketibû holê ku yek salek ji hêla xizmeke xwe ve hatibû îstîsmarkirin. Lêbelê bavê wê zarokê got ku baweriya wî bi îstîsmarkirinê nîn e û gilîname neda emniyetê.
The age of the abusers ranged between 16 and 60 and the age of the abused girls ranged between 5 and 17.	Temenên îstîsmarkarên di meha Kanûnê navbera 16-60an e, temenê zarokên rastî îstîsmarê hatiner jî  navbera 5-17 ye.
Violence-injury	Tûndî-Birîndarkirin
Men injured/inflicted violence on 25 women in December.	Mêran di meha Kanûnê de tundî li 25 jinan kirin û wan birîndar kirin.
28% of the violence-injury cases took place in public areas such as street, coffeeshop, bus.	%28ê bûyerên tundî/birîndarkirinê li kolan, kafe, otobusan de li ber çavên her kesî pêk hatin.
61.5% of the women were subjected to violence by their partners or ex-partners: One woman was subjected to violence by her friend’s lover, two by their husbands of religious marriage, two by their ex-husbands, two by thieves breaking into their houses, seven by their husbands, one by her fiancée, one by her student, two by their sons, four by their lovers, two by men they didn’t know. Identity of the perpetrators in two incidents weren’t covered by media.	%61ê bûyerên tundî/birîndarkirinê ji hêla partner/partnerên berê yên jinan ve hatin kirin: Yek ji hêla destgirtiyê hevala xwe ve, 2 ji hêla mêrên xwe yên nefermî (mera dînî), 2 ji hêla dizên ketine malan wan ve, 7 ji hêla mêrên xwe ve, yek ji hêla destgirtiyê xwe ve, yek ji hêla xwendekarê xwe ve, du ji hêla kurên xwe ve, 4 ji hêla dildarên xwe ve 2 jî ji hêla mêrn xerîb ve hatin derbkirin/birîndarkirin.
12% of the women were subjected to violence for seeking divorce/break up or rejecting the proposal to reconcile.	Li %12ê wan jinan ji ber hevberdan/cihêbûn/redkirina lihevhatinê ve tundî hat kirin.
Among the men’s excuses for violence, there are reasons such as doing sport in the park and jealousy in addition to women seeking break up.	Mêrekî ku tundî li jinikê kiribû întîxar kir.
A 16-year-old girl was subjected to violence by her husband with whom she was forced to get married at the age of 14.	2 jin ji hêla herserên wan ên ku tundî li wan dikin ve hatin kuştin, mêrek jî bavê xwe yê ku tundî li diya wî dikir kuşt.
Two women murdered their husband/ex-husband who inflicted violence on the women; one man killed his father who inflicted violence on his mother.	Temenên mêrên ku tundî pêk anîne navbera 19-66 de bû. Temenê jin/zarokên ku rastî tundiyê hatine jî navbera 16-55 de bû.
The age of men who inflicted violence ranged between 19 and 66 and the age of the victims ranged between 16 and 65 in December.	Bajarên ku lê bûyerên tundî/birîndarkirinê pêk hatiye:
The cities in which violence incidents took place were Adana (1), Antalya (2), Bartın (1), Çorum (2), Eskişehir (1), İstanbul (5), İzmir (3), Kastamonu (1), Kayseri (1), Kilis (1), Kocaeli (1), Manisa (2), Muğla (1), Niğde (1) and Zonguldak (1).	Edene (1), Antalya (2), Bartin (1), Çorum (2), Eskişehir (1), Stenbol (5), Îzmîr (3), Kastamonu (1), Kayseri (1), Kilis (1), Kocaeli (1), Manisa (2), Mugla (1), Nigde (1) û Zonguldak (1).
Distribution by regions	Li gorî herêman
In total 103 incidents of violence, murder, attempted murder, harassment, sexual violence, rape, forcing to sex work and injury were covered by media in December.	Di meha Kanûnê de 103 bûyerên tundî, cînayet, destdirêjî, tundiya cinsî, tecawuzkirin, zorlêkirina bo karkeriya sexê û birîndarkirine di medyayê de cih girtin.
The Kurdistan Freedom Falcons (TAK) has claimed responsibility for the car bomb attack launched in front of İzmir Courthouse Door C on January 5.	Teyrebazên Azadiya Kurdistanê (TAK) daxuyand ku êrişa ku di 5ê Çileyê de li Îzmîrê hatibû kirin û di encamê de 2 kes hatibûn kuştin, ji hêla hêzên wan ve hatiye kirin. Her wiha nasnameya her dı kesên ku êriş kirine jî diyar kirin.
Traffic police Fethi Sekin and beadle Musa Can had lost their lives in the car bomb attack.	Di encama wê êrişa li ber Dadgeha Îzmîrê de karmendê bi navê Mûsa Can û polîsê bi navê Fethi Sekin canê xwe ji dest dabûn.
Two assailants were killed following the incident.	2 kesên ku êriş pêk anîbûn jî li cihê bûyerê hatin kuştin.
According to a report by Fırat News Agency (ANF) today (January 11), identities of the two assailants were announced: Born in 1987 in Maraş, Mustafa Çoban codenamed Zerdeşt Rüstem Erdal and born in 1991 in Ağrı, Enes Yıldırım codenamed Pirdoğan Ararat.	Li gorî daxuyaniya ku di Ajansa Nûçeyan a Firatê de hatiye weşandin, nasnameyên her du êrişakaran wiha ne: Mustafa Çoban (Zerdeşt Rustem Erdal) 1987/Elbistan-Gurgum û Enes Yildirim (Pîrdogan Ararat) 1991/Patnos-Agirî.
What had happened?	Çalakiyên TAKê
- The explosion in Anafartalar bazaar in Ulus district of Ankara which killed seven people, and wounded 102 on May 23, 2007.	23ê Gulana 2007an de li Enqere Ulusê teqîna pêk hat de 7 kes hatin kuştin, 102 kse jî birîndar bûn.
- Explosion in Bakırköy district of İstanbul which wounded 31 people on June 10, 2007.	10ê Hezîrana 2007an de li Stenbol Bakirkoyê teqîn pêk hat û di encamê de 31 kes birîndar bûn.
- Bomb attack which left 15 police officers wounded in Küçükçekmece district of İstanbul on June 8, 2007.	8ê Hezîrana 2007an de li Stenbol Kuçukçekmeceyê teqîna pêk hat de 15 polês birîndar bûn.
- Attack on Konyaaltı beach in Antalya on August 26, 2011 and the attack on Kemer public beach leaving 6 wounded on August 28.	26ê Tebaxa 2011an de li Antalya Konyaaltiyê, di 28ê Tebaxê de jî li Antalya Kemerê êrişên bi bombeyan pêk hatibûn û di encamê de 6 kesan bîrîndar bûbûn.
- The attack launched against military vehicle killing 28 on Merasim street in Ankara on February 17, 2016.	17 Sibata 2016an de li Enqereyê li dijî servîsa leşkeran bi bombeyan êriş hat kirin û di encamê de 28 kesan canên xwe ji dest dan.
- The attack launched in Kızılay, the Ankara's one of most crowded district claiming lives of 37 on March 13, 2016.	Êrişa 13ê Adara 2016an a li Enqere Guvenparkê ku di encamê de 37 kes hatibûn kuştin,
- The bomb attack carried out against police bus killing 11 people including six police officers in İstanbul's Vezneciler district on June 7, 2016.	Êrişa 7ê Hezîrana 2016an ya li Stenbol Veznecilerê ku di encamê de 6 jê polîs 11 kes hatib3un kuştin,
- The attack that took place at the western door of Grand Mosque in Bursa wounding 20 people on April 28, 2016.	Êrişa 28ê Nîsana 2016an ya li Bursayê ku di encamê de çalakvan miribû û 20 kes birîndar bûbûn,
- The attack that wounded 10 people in İstanbul's Bahçelievler district on October 6, 2016.	Êrişa 6ê Cotmeha 2016an ku li Stenbol Yenibosnayê ku di encamê de 10 kes birîndar bûbûn,
- The bomb attack in which 11 people including two police officers had lost their lives launched near outbuilding of Anti-Terror and Riot Squad branch directorates in Diyarbakır's Bağlar district on November 4. (Reuters had announced that ISIS claimed responsibility for the attack)	Êrişa 4ê Mijdara 2016an ku li Amed Rêzanê li dijî avahiya Mudiriyeta Emniyetê pêk hatibû û di encamê de 2 jê polîs 11 kes hatibûn kuştin girt ser xwe.
- On November 24, the TAK claimed responsibility for the attack killing two people, wounding 33 others.	Êrişa di 24ê Miijdara 2016an ku li Edeneyê pêk hatibû û di encamê de 2 kes miribûn û 33 kes jî birîndar bibûn.
- On December 10, The TAK claimed responsibility for the twin bombings around Vodafone Arena Stadium killing 44 people including 36 police officers.	Êrişa di 10ê Kanûna 2016an ku li Stenbol Beşiktaşê pêk hatibû û di encamê de 36 jê polîs 44 kesan canê xwe ji dest dabûn.
3rd Article that proposes to reduce eligible age to be chosen MP to 18 from 25 was passed yesterday (January 11) at the parliament.	Parlementera Kocaeliyê ya CHPê Fatma Kaplan ku di aloziya li meclisê de hat derbkirin, mafê axavtinê hilda û di Lijneya Giştî de axivî.
On the parliamentary rostrum, Kaplan saying “Physical intervention by a Group Deputy Chair against a woman is not appropriate at all. I condemn you from here once again” declared that she was beaten.	Kaplan di axavtina xwe de behsa êrişa li dijî wê kir û wiha got: “Ji cîgirê koma partiyekê re şerm e ku êrişî jinekê dike. Ez careke din we ji vir şermezar dikim Birêz Elîtaş.”
Kaplan condemned Parliamentary Administrative Chief as well and said the administrative chief Ahmet Gündoğdu from the AKP seized her phone:	Kaplan got ku Amîrê Îdareya Meclisê Mehmet Gundogdu jî telefona wê ji destê wê qesp kiriye û wî şermezar kir û wiha got:
“You physically intervened, don’t you see my neck?”	“We mudaxeleya fizikî li min kir. Hûn situyê min dibîn ka di çi halê de ye?
The General Assembly of the Grand National Assembly of Turkey (TBMM) has passed the third, fourth and fifth articles of the Constitutional Amendment Draft.	Di roja sêyemîn de axavtin û dengdanên li ser pêşniyara guhertina makeqanûnê ya AKPê li meclisê dewam kir. Rûniştina duh di saet 14an de destpê kir.
Article 3	Qanûna 3.
The General assembly passed the third article with 341 affirmative, 139 no, three blank and two invalid votes.	Qanûna 4. jî bi 341 dengan ve hat qebûlkirin û ji meclisê derbas bû.
Article 4	Qanûna 5.
The fourth article of the amendment draft requires that the parliamentary and presidential elections be held every five years on the same day.	Dema hewl hat dayîm ku dengdan were kirin Cîgirê Koma CHPê Levent Gok daxwaz kir ku bila navber li rûniştinê were dayîn ku gel jî bikaribe bişopîne.
The Parliament has passed the article with 343 yes, 139 no, two blank and two invalid votes.	Li ser vê yekê gelek parlementer nava hev ketin û kulm û peniyan li hev xistin.
Article 5	Encamên 5 dengdanên hatine kirin wiha ne:
Roboski monument in a park on Dicle Provincial boulevard was removed four days ago.	Birêvebiriya Komeleyan a Walitiya Şirnexê, karên Komeleya Edaleta ji bo Robozikê Aştiya ji bo Cîhanê(Roboski-Der) sekinand.
