Following turning its back on democratic standards, especially freedom of the press and expression, Turkey has entered a deep crisis with its strategic partner the European Union.	Tirkiyeyê guh neda standardên medyayê, mafê azadiya medyayê û azadiya xwe-îfadekirinê.
Covering the period of October-November-December 2016, BİA Media Monitoring Report demonstrates that despite all objections raised by international and national journalism organizations, the European Union, Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe (OSCE), the government overlooks the fact that 131 journalists are in prison and journalism has been silenced with 12 gag orders in three months.	
The lawsuits against the journalists continued during these three months.	Rapor nîşan dide ku hikûmet bi polîtîkayên ewlehiyê denqê mixalif tine dike.
The charges “being a member of an armed organization”, “aiding an [illegal] organization” or “founding, managing an [illegal] organization” pressed against the journalists went on.	Rapor nîşan dide Dadgeha Makeqanûnê,  Xala 229ê ya Qanûna Cezayan a Tirkan ya Heqareta li Serokkomarî, meşrû dike. ev yek Tirkiyeyê dike “Mezintirîn Girtîgeha Rojnamegeran a Dinyayê” mafên mirovan tê binpêkirin û ji bo parastina mafên rojnamegeran ti kar nayên kirin.
Imprisoned journalists: They are claimed to be predominantly from the Gülen Community	131 rojnameger di girtîgehan de ne
131 journalists entered the new year, 2017 in prison. Of the arrested journalists, 81 were allegedly from the Gülen Community and 31 from the pro-Kurdish media.	Di 1ê Kanûna Paşiyê ya 2017 de, bi  lêpirsîna “Rêxistina Terorî ya Ferthûllahgir(FETO)” 81 û 31 rojnamegerên medyaya kurdan hatine girtin.
Furthermore, 11 journalists from Cumhuriyet newspaper were arrested on charge of “aiding or propagandizing for FETÖ/PKK (Fethullahist Terror Organization/Kurdistan Workers’ Party)”. These people are in prison over “illegal organization”, “terrorism” or “defaming state authorities” charges.	Herweha 11 nivîskar, rayedar û nûçegihanên Cumhuriyetê bi sûcê “alîkariya FETO/PKKyê an jî propagandaya wan” hatin girtin. Ev kes li gor qanûnan bi sebebên “rêxistin” “teror” û “heqareta li mezinên dewletê” hatine girtin.
Five journalists are kept in prison on charge of “being a member of illegal organizations” ” (MLKP, DHKP-C, TKEP/L, Resistance Movement), and one other is kept in prison for being a member of three organizations (Ergenekon Organization, Mersin Organization, and Turkish Vengeance Union Organization and Internal Organization.	Pênc rojnameger bi endambûna “hin rêxistinên neqanûnî” (MLKP, DHKP-C, TKEP/L, Tevgera Têkoşînê) hatine girtin. Rojnamegerek jî bi sûcê endambûna sê rêxistinan li girtîgehê ye.
One journalist was a former AA worker and another one was arrested on charges of “defaming the president” and “defaming the state authorities”.	Xebatkarekê AAyê û xebatkarekê Rojnameya Yûrtê ji ber “Heqareta li Serokkomarî” hatine girtin.
Of the 131 journalists, 18 have been convicted, seven tried and 106 have undergone investigations.	Ji 131 rojnamegeran ji bo 18 rojnamegeran biryara girtinê hatiye dayin, 7 rojnameger hê têne dadkirin, lêpirsîna 106 rojnamegeran jî dom dike.
Year-on-year, 31 journalists were in prison; 17 of them were from pro-Kurdish media. Of them, 19 were convicted, nine underwent investigations and three were still being tried.	Di heman dema sala 2015ê 31 rojnameger di girtîgehê de bûn, 17 ji wan ji medyaya kurdan bûn. Biryar ji bo 19 ji wan hatibû dayin, lêpirsîna 9 ji wan dom dikir û 3 ji wan dihat dadkirin.
Attack on eight journalists and one newspaper	Êrîş li 8 rojnamegeran û rojnameyekê hat kirin
At least eight journalists and one newspaper center were attack during the period of October-November-December 2016. Besides, 105 journalists and one media organ were threatened directly or via social media users who were predominantly from pro-government circles. Furthermore, two journalists and one news site were subjected to verbal attack. Social media accounts of two journalists were attacked.	Di mehên Çiriya Pêşiyê, Çiriya Paşiyê û Kanûna Pêşiyê de ya kêm êrîş li 8 rojnamegeran û rojnameyekê hatiye kirin. Bi fiîlî 105 rojnameger hatin tehdîtkirin. Li medyaya civakî kesên ku piraniya wan nêzîkî desthilatê ne rojnameger tehdît kirin.
Year-on-year, three Syrian journalists were killed in Antep. 15 journalists, one media group and one media organ were attacked. Four journalists and five media organs were threatened.	Di heman dewra 2015ê de sê rojnamegerên ji Sûriyeyê hatibûn kuştin. Êrîş li 15 rojnameger, grubeka medyayê û organekê medyayê hatibû kirin. 4 rojnameger û 5 organên medyayê hatibûn tehdîtkirin.
In the whole 2015, three Syrian journalists and one columnist were killed, 64 journalists, four media organs and one columnist were attacked. Last year, 38 journalists and 21 media organs were subjected to threats.	Di hemiya sala 2015ê de, qunciknivîskarê rojnameyekê û sê rojnamegerên ji Sûriyeyê hatibûn kuştin. Êrîş li 64 rojnameger, 4 organên medyayê û nivîskarekê hatibû kirin. Sala ji pêşiya wê 38 rojnameger û 21 organên medyayê hatibûn tehdîtkirin.
State of Emergency: 41 journalists four whom were foreigners detained	Rewşa Awarte: 41 rojnameger hatin destserkirin 4 ji wan bîyanî bûn
In total 41 journalists including 21 from media organs shut down by Statutory Decrees and four international media representatives were detained.	Di Çiriya Pêşiyê, Çiriya Paşiyê û Kanûna Pêşiyê ya 2016ê de, piştî bi Biryarnameyê di Hikmê Qanûnan de organên medyayê hatin girtin û 21 xebatkarên wan cihan hatin destserkirin. 4 nûnerên medyaya navneteweyî hatin desteserkirin. Li ser hev 41 rojnameger hatine desteserkirin.
Year-on-year, 34 journalists and media workers were taken into custody, one was handcuffed from behind and tried to be detained. The figure in the entire 2015 was 120.	Di sala borî de di heman dewrê de, 34 medyakar hatibûn desteserkirin, rojnamegerek ji piştê ve hat kelepçekirin. Di hemîya 2015ê de 120 medyakar hatin desteserkirin.
Impunity: Mumcu, Kışlalı, Anter, Agos…	Cezanedan: Mûmcû, Kişlali, Anter, Agos...
28 “Erdoğan” suspects including seven journalists	28 kes ji ber “Erdoganî” bersûc in, 7 ji wan rojnameger in
21 protesters and seven journalists were being tried on charge of “defaming the president “. A lawsuit was lodged against a judge on the same charge. Eight journalists were acquitted of this charge.	Di Çiriya Pêşiyê, Çiriya Paşiyê û Kanûna Pêşiyê de ti rojnamegerên ji ber xala 299. a Qanûna Cezayan a Tirkan ya “heqareta li serokkomarî” hatîn girtin nehatin tespîtkirin. 28 kesên ku 7 ji wan rojnameger in bi tometa wan heqaret li serokkomarê Erdogan kiriye têne dadkirin. Herweha heman doz li dadgerekî jî hatiye vekirin. Heşt rojnamegeran ji vê dozê beraet kiriye.
From October-December 2016, no new investigation was launched on charge of defaming the president. Furthermore, no suit for damages on ground of attack on personal rights of Erdoğan was filed.	Di Çiriya Pêşiyê, Çiriya Paşiyê û Kanûna Pêşiyê de ti dozên nû bi xala 299. a heqareta li serokkomaran nehatiye vekirin. Her dîsa di vê dewrê de ti doz ji bo heqareta li serokkomarê Erdogan nehatine vekirin.
Year-on-year, legal actions were taken against 93 people including 42 journalists on charge of attacking personal rights of then Prime Minister and President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. For instance, four journalists and one politician were in total sentenced to 2 years, 10 months and 27 days in prison. New lawsuits were brought against eight journalists and one former deputy on charge of defaming the president. The trial was still going on about eight journalists and two political party members. Furthermore, one journalists, one newspaper and one website were sentenced to pay fine of 28,000 TL for attacking personal rights of Erdoğan.	Par di heman dewrê debi sûcê heqareta li serokwezîrê berê û serokkomarê nû Recep Tayyîp Erdoganî doz, lêpirsîn, desteserkirin hwd... li 93 kesan hatiye vekirin, 42 ji wan rojnameger in.Ji bo nimûne ji bo 4 rojnamegeran û sîyasetmedarek 2 sal 10 meh û 27 rojan cezayê girtinê stand. (Ceza 11 meh û 20 rojan hat paşdedan). 28 hezar Lîre wek ceza ji bo rojnamegerek, rojnameyek û malperekê hat dayin.
12 gag orders, 24 shut downs, Internet cuts…	12 caran qedexeya weşanê, 24 caran girtin, astengkirina înternetê...
During the period of October-November-December 2016, at least 12 gag orders or temporary gag orders were issued. Eight news sites were censored. 24 media organs were shut down by Statutory Decrees, properties of 54 journalists were confiscated.	Di Çiriya Pêşiyê, Çiriya Paşiyê û Kanûna Pêşiyê ya 2016ê de ya kêm 12 caran weşana nûçeyan hat qedexekirin. Weşana 8 malperan hat qedexekirin. Bi Biryarnameyên di Hikmê Qanûnan de 24 organên medyayê hatine girtin. Dewletê dest danî sed mal û milkê 54 rojnamegeran.
Year-on-year, 18 TV channels were excluded from digital platforms such as Tivibu, Digiturk and TURKSAT, 13 news sites, four books, two magazines, two humor magazines, one newspaper coverage, one brochure, one panel, one commemoration were censored, four confidentiality orders and three gag orders were issued and accreditation discrimination occurred in at least two incidents.	Par di heman dewrê de, 18 TV ji platformên dîjîtal yên wek Tîvîbû, DîjîTurk û TURKSATê hatin derêxistin. 13 malper, kitêbên 4 nivîskaran, 2 kovar, 2 kovarên qerf û henekan, nûçeyeka rojnameyekê, broşûrek û yadkirinek hatibû astengkirin.
Defaming: One journalist was convicted, 62 years in prison demanded in total for seven others	Heqaret: Rojnamegerek mehkûm bû, ji bo 7 rojnamgeran jî 62 sal ceza tê xwestin
During the period of October-November-December 2016, one local journalist was sentenced to pay fine of 7,300 TL over defaming, and to pay fine of 10,000 TL over attacking personal rights. There are still seven journalists facing trials in which 62 years and 4 months in prison demanded for them.	Di serdema Cotmeh-Mijdar-Kanûn 2016an de di çarçoveya doza heqaretê ku derbarê rojnamgerek de hatibû vekirin de 7 hezar û 300 TL cezayê peredayînê hat dayîn. Derbarê heman kesê de bi hinceta êrişî mafê kesayetê kiriye ve jî 10 hezar TL cezayeke din jî hat dayîn. Di çarçoveya dozên dewam dike de derbarê 7 rojnamegeran de bi temamî 62 sal û 4 meh cezayê hepiskirinê û 100 hezar TL cezayê peredayînê tê xwestin. 
Year-on-year, seven journalists were in total sentenced to 2 years, 2 months and 7 days in prison and to pay fine of 19,850 TL. Lawsuits against 13 journalists were ongoing and additional lawsuits were lodged against five of them. Two journalists acquitted. Two journalists were sentenced to pay fine of 9,000 TL on charge of attacking personal rights.	Di heman serdema sala borî derbarê 7 rojnamegeran de bi temamî 2 sal û 2 meh û 7 roj cezayê hepiskirinê û 19 hezar û 890 TL cezayê peredayînê ve hatibûn mehkûmkirin. Dozên derbarê 13 rojnamegeran de hatibûn vekirin hêjî dewam dikirin û derbarê 5 rojnamegeran de dozên nû hatibûn vekirin. 2 rojnamger jî beraet bûbûn. 2 rojnameger bi îdiaya êrişî mafên kesayetê kirine ve vi dayîna tamînata 9 hezar TL ve hatibûn mehkûmkirin. 4 rojnameger bi temamî 1 milyon û 40 hezar TL û 2 saziyên rojnameyê de jî bi 100 hezar TL tazmînatdayînê ve dihatin dadkirin. Doza tazmînatdayînê ya derbarê rojnamegerek de hatibû vekirin jî hatibû redkirin.
During 2015, 15 journalists and one website were in total sentenced to 5 years, 8 months and 17 days in prison and to pay fine of 49,940 TL. Three journalists were sentenced to pay fine of 14,000 TL on charge of attacking personal rights.	Di temamiya sala 2015an de derbarê 15 rojnamegeran û sîteyek de bi sûckirina ‘heqaretê’ ve 5 sal û 8 meh û 17 roj cezayê hepiskirinê û 48 hezar û 940 TL cezayê pereyê hat dayîn. 3 rojnameger jî bi hinceta êrişî mefê kesayetê kirine ve bi 14 hezar TL tazmînatdayînê hatin mehkûmkirin.
11 lifetime imprisonments, threat of 2,500 years in prison	TMK/TCK: Gefxwarina 11 muebet, 2 hezar û 500 sal cezayê girtinê
In the period of October-November-December 2016, 73 journalists were tried in accordance with the Anti-Terror Law (TMK). In total, 547 years and 6 months in prison was demanded for the journalists. Five journalists were sentenced in total to 15 years 2 months and 3 days in prison, five journalists acquitted, one journalist’s case dropped due to prescription.	Di serdema Cotmeh-Mijdar-Kanûn 2016an de 73 rojnameger di çarçoveya TMKê (qanûna terorê) de bi daxwaza bi temamî 547 sal û 6 meh ceazeyê hepirskirinê ve hatin hatin dadkirin. 5 rojnameger bi temamî 15 sal û 2 meh û 3 roj ve hatin mehkûmkirin. 5 rojnameger beraet bûn û dosyeya rojnameger jî ji ber demboriyê betal bû.
38 of the 73 journalists had attended “Editors-in-Chief on Watch” campaign launched by Özgür Gündem newspaper. No decision was issued on January  as part of these investigations as of January 1, 2017.	Ji 73 rojnamegerên ku di vê demê de hatin dadkirin 38 ji wan ji bo balkişandina zextên li ser Ozgur Gundemê beşdarê kampanyaya “Nobedariya Weşanê” bûbûn ji ber vê yekê hatin dadkirin. Di van dozên ku derbarê wan 38 rojnamegeran de hatiye vekirin de heta 1ê Çileya 2017an ti biryar nehatibû dayîn.
99 journalists faced trials in which 1,606 years and 6 months in prison demanded on charges of “being a member of an [illegal] organization” and “aiding [illegal] organization”. 10 times aggravated life imprisonment, one life imprisonment and 257 years in prison were demanded for 16 journalists on charges of “disrupting unity and integrity of the state”, “espionage”, “damaging, obtaining or releasing the documents that are related to state security”.	99 rojnameger bi hincetên ‘rêvebirê rêxistinê ye’, ‘endamê rêxistinê ye’, ‘alîkariyê rêxistinê kiriye’ hatin dadkirin derbarê wan de bi temamî 1606 sal û 6 meh cezayê hepiskirinê hat xwestin. 16 rojnameger bi hincetên ‘yekîtiya dewletê xira dike’, ‘sixûrî kiriye’ û ‘belgeyên ku ewlehiya dewletê dixe xetereyê temîn kirine û weşandine’ ve bi daxwaza 10 caran muebeta girankirî, yek muebet û 257 sal cezayê hepiskirinê ve hatin dadkirin.
18 journalists were tried on charge of “promoting crime and criminal”, five on charge of “insulting Turkishness”, two on charge of “inciting people to animosity and hostility”, one on charge of “insulting religious values”, one on charge of “insulting memory of Atatürk”. In total 79 years were demanded for the journalists. Two of these journalists acquitted of charge of “inciting people to animosity and hatred”. One journalist was tried over “violating confidentiality” and sentenced to pay fine of 2,100 TL; a lawsuit demanding 4.5 years in prison was brought against a journalist.	18 rojnameger bi hinceta ‘pesna sûc û sûcdaran kirine’, 5 ‘miletê tirk bêrûmet kiriye’, 2 ‘gel tehrîkê kîn û dijmitayiyê kiriye’, yek ‘nirxên olî bêrûmet kiriye’, yek jî bi hinceta ‘heqaretê li bîranînên Ataturk kiriye’ ve hatin dadkirin û derbarê wan de 79 sal ceza hate xwestin.2 ji wan rojnamegerên ji ber ‘gel tehrîkê kîn û dijmitayiyê kirine’ dihatin dadkirin beraet bûn. Rojnameger jî bi hinceta ‘îxlalkirina veşartinê’ hat dadkirin û bi 2 hezar û 100 TL cezayê peredayînê ve hat mehkûmkirin. Derbarê rojnamegerek de jî bi hinceta ‘biryara qedexeya weşanê îxlal kiriye’ ve doz hat vekirin.
The sum of the penalties demanded for all these accusations make 10 aggravated life imprisonments, one life imprisonment, and 2,494 years and 6 months in prison.	Ji ber van hemû sûckirinan derbarê wan rojnamegeran de bi temamî 10 caran muebetên girankirî, yek muebet û 2 hezar û 494 sal û 6 meh cezayê hepiskirnê hat xwestin.
During 2015, three journalists were sentenced to 6 years 3 months and 22 days in prison in accordance with the Anti-Terror Law, and to pay fine of 24,000 TL. The trial demanding 337 years and 6 months in prison for 26 journalists was ongoing. While two acquitted, lawsuits were brought against two others. Trials demanding 135 years in prison for 18 journalists had dropped due to prescription.	Di temamiya 2015an de 3 rojnameger di encama dadkirina ji TMKê ve bi 6 sal û 3 meh û 22 roj cezayê hepiskirinê û 24 hezar TL cezayê peredayînê ve hatibûn mehkûmkirin. Derbarê 2 rojnamegeran de dozên nû hatibûn vekirin û 2 rojnameger jî beraet bûbûn. Doza 18 rojnamegerên ku derbarê wan de 135 sal cazeyê hepiskirinê dihat xwestin ji ber demboriyê betal bû.
No decision was issued by the Constitutional Court in six months	DMê di nav 6 mehan de ti biryar neda!
The Constitutional Court didn’t issue any decision in the last three months as in the period of July-September. The court also didn’t find Turkish Penal Code Article 299 contrary to the Constitution with respect to the act of “defaming the president”.	Wekê serdema Tîrmeh-Îlonê, di sê mehên dawî de Dadgeha Makeqanûnê (DM) ji bo serlêdanên derbarê azadiya xwe-îfadekirinê de ti biryar neda. Lêbelê heman dadgeh, sûckirin-fiîla ‘li serokomar heqaret kirine’ li gorî qanûna 299. betal nekir û ji ber vê yekê gelek alî dadgehê rexnekirin û bertek nîşandan.
During this period, applications to the Constitutional Court continued: When Cumhuriyet newspaper couldn’t get a positive result from its objection as to its 10 employees being arrested as part of “FETÖ investigation”, it appealed to the Constitutional Court. The case will be brought to the European Court of the Human Rights (ECtHR) if they cannot receive a positive conclusion. Furthermore, Diyarbakır Bar Association applied to the court due to the Internet cuts that occured in this region.	Di vê serdemê de jî serlêdanên li DMê dewam kirin: Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê li ser îdiya ’10 xebatkarên wan alîkarê FETOyê kirine’ îtiraz kiribû serî li DMê dabû. Eger ji serlêdana Cumhuriyetê ti encam dernekeve ew dê serî li DMMEyê bidin. Her wiha Baroya Amedê derbarê qutkirina înternetê de serî li DMê dabû.
Year-on-year, the Constitutional Court had ruled violation of freedom of expression and communication occurred in individual applications of one writer, one radio outlet and one news site and fine of 5,094 TL be paid.	DMê di heman serdema sala borî de serlêdanên fermî yên nivîskarek, saziyeke radyoyê û siteyeke înternetê nirxand û biryar da ku azadbûna ragihandin û xwe-îfadekirinê hatiye îxlalkirin û mesrefên dadgehê jî tê de 5 hezar û 94 TL cezayê tazmînatê da dewletê.
During 2015, within the scope of 12 verdicts issued in response to the applications of six journalists, four politicians or local authority, one writer, one radio channel and one website, the court had ruled fine of 42,990 TL be paid. Besides, it ruled that a journalist be paid fine of 55,000 TL over “torture in custody”, and another one be tried again due to the fact that he wasn’t previously justly tried.	Dadgeha Makeqanûnê di temamiya sala 2015an de di çarçoveya serlêdanên 6 rojnamger, 4 sîyasetmedar, nivîskarek, saziyeke radyoyê û sîteyeke înternetê de 12 biryar dan ku dewlet bi temamî 42 hezar û 990 TL cezayê tazmînatê bide wan kesan. Her wiha DMê biryar da ku bi hinceta ‘îşekenceya dema binçavkirinê de’ 55 hezar TL tazmînat li rojnamegerek were dayîn. Derbarê rojnamegereke din de jî bi hinceta bi awayekî adil nehatiye dadkirin ve biryar da ku ji nû ve were dadkirin.
Turkey was convicted by the ECtHR of three cases	DMMEyê di 3 dozan de Tirkiyeyê mehkûm kir
During the period of October-November-December 2016, the ECtHR sentenced Turkey to pay fine of 8,500 Euros for “violating freedom of expression” in applications submitted by a journalist, a conscientious objector and a party representative. Journalists Murat Aksoy and Atilla Taş, who were arrested on September 2, 2016 as part of “FETÖ” investigation, applied to the ECtHR when no progress was made in domestic law.	Dadgeha Mafê Mirovan a Ewropayê (DMME) di serdema Cotmeh-Mijdar-Kanûn 2016an de serlêdanên rojnamegerek, redkareke wicdanî û nûnerê partiyekê biryar da ku ‘mafê xwe-îfadekirinê hatiye îxlalkirin’ û 8 heza û 500 avro cazeyê tazmînatê dan Tirkiyeyê. Rojnamegerên bi navê Mûrat Aksoy û Atilla Taş di lêpirsîna ‘FETO’yê de 2ê Îlona 2016an de hatibûn girtin, piştî ku hemû riyên hiqûqan navxweyî qediyan serî li DMMEyê dan.
Year-on-year, Turkey was condemned to pay fine of 19,060 Euros in the lawsuits filed by three legists, two journalists and one politician again for violating freedom of expression.	Di heman serdema sala borî de di serlêdanên 3 hiqûqnas, 2 rojnameger û siyasetmedarek de DMMEyê bi heman hincetê 19 hezar û 60 avro cezayê tazmînatê dabû Tirkiyeyê.
During 2015, the ECtHR had condemned Turkey to pay fine of 42,043 Euros on the same charge in lawsuits filed by 26 people including five journalists, three legists, one politician and one retired soldier.	Di temamiya sala 2015an de DMMEyê serlêdanên 26 kesan nirxand û Tirkiyeyê neheq dît û bi temamî 42 hezar 043 avro ceza dayê.
2,500 media workers were left unemployed	Kedkar nemane ku ji kar werin avêtin
Year-on-year, at least 213 journalists and media workers were either discharged or forced to quit the job. This figure was 348 for the year of 2015.	Di heman serdema sala borî de herî kêm 213 rojnameger û xebatkarên medyayê yan ji kar hatin derxistin yan jî neçar man hiştin ku îstîfa bikin. Di temamiya sala 2015an de jî ev hejmar 348 bû.
RTÜK: Heavy penalties were imposed on “insulting” broadcastings	RTUK: Ji weşanên ‘bêrûmet dike re’ cezayê giran
The RTÜK issued six warnings, 11 fines against TV establishments; imposed five fines and one warning against radio establishments. The council imposed a fine of 1,559,955 TL in total on radio and TV channels. During this period, the heavies penalties were imposed on “using Turkish gauchely” and “insulting broadcastings”.	RTUKê di serdema Cotmeh-Mijdar-Kanûn 2016an de ji ber film, nûçe 3u bernameyên weşandî li kanalên TVyan 6 cezayê hişyarkirinê, 11 cezayê peredayînê; li radyoyan jî cezayeke hişyarkirinê û 5 cezayên peredayînê dan. RTUKê di sala 2015an de bi temamî 1.559.955 TL cezayê peredayînê da li radyo û kanalên TVyê.
The Ministry of Interior has made a press statement about a report titled “Those who have been displaced and dispossessed: Sur residents’ rights to return home” prepared by the Amnesty on December 6, 2016.	Wezareta Karên Navxweyî li ser raporê nivîsî ku “tiştên di raporê de hatine nivîsîn ne rast in, tedbîrên li Sûrê meşrû û li gor pîvanan bûn.”
The Ministry in its statement remarked that the report “doesn’t reflect the truth”.	Di 2yê Kanûna Pêşiyê ya 2015ê de li Navçeya Sûrê ya Amedê derketina derve hatibû qedexekirin û hê jî qedexe dewam dike.
The Amnesty’s report had said that “Estimated 500,000 people including tens of thousands of Sur residents were displaced as a result of Turkey’s authorities’ merciless crackdowns that lead to mass punishment”.	Amnestyê red kir ku ji ber ewlehiyê derketina derve hatiye qedexekirin. Rêxistinê dîyar kir ji xwe ji beriya heşt mehan şer sekinîbûn.
Ozguruz.org news portal has started its broadcasting life.	Malpera nûçeyan a OZGURUZê dest bi weşanê kir. Berpirsê weşana giştî Can Dûndar e.
The portal will broadcast in German and Turkish. Translations of some of the contents broadcasted in Germany can be read on the website.	Malper bi zimanên Almanî û Tirkî weşanê dike. Hinek nivîs û nûçeyên li Almanyayê jî hatîn nivîsîn dê bê wergerandin û li malperê bêne belavkirin.
Calling for solidarity to audience, Özgürüz also aims to cooperate with correspondents and those who want to share information via secure connections.	Ozguruzê piştgirî ji welatiyan xwest. Herweha da zanîn ku ew dixwaze digel nûçegihanan jî bi rêyên ewle bikeve peywendiyê.(EA/MB) 
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Iğdır MP Mehmet Emin Adıyaman was taken to prosecutor’s office by police officers coming to his home this morning (January 25).	Parlementerê Îdirê yê HDPê Mehmet Emîn Adiyaman îro destê sibehê ji mala xwe yê li Stenbolê hat binçavkirin û polîsan wî bi zorê birine dozgeriyê ku îfade bide.
“I was now taken from my house in İstanbul by a warrant of taking by force. I am being taken into Çağlayan Courthouse”, Adıyaman said on his Twitter account.	Adiyaman di hesabê xwe yê twitterê de wiha got: “Bi biryara anîna bi zorê min li Stenbolê ji malê hilanîn û niha dibin Dadgeha Çaglayanê.”
Detained in Antep province on December 19, 2016, Adıyaman had given testimony at Ankara 8th Heavy Penal Court as part of an investigation launched on charge of “propagandizing for an [illegal] organization”.	Mehmet Emîn Adiyaman daxuyand ku ji bo kontrola tenduristiyê wî birine nexweşxaneyê û piştre jî wî birine Dadgeha Çaglayanê ku bi riya SESGISê li 4. Dadgeha Cezayê Giran îfadeya bide.
About Mehmet Emin Adıyaman	Mehmet Emîn Adiyaman kî ye?
Born in Iğdır province in 1961, Adıyaman graduated from Dicle University, Faculty of Law. He was working as a lawyer.	Di sala 1961ê de li Îdirê hatiye dinê. Li Zanîngeha Dicleyê beşa hiqûqê xwendiye.
He is married with five children.	Zewicî ye û 5 zarokên wî hene.
HDP Iğdır MP Adıyaman is a Parliamentary Justice Commission member.	Parlementerê Îdirê Mehmet Emîn Adiyaman Endamê Komîsyona Edaletê ya Meclisê ye.
11 of 59 HDP MPs arrested	11 parlementerên HDPê girtî ne
Pir, Taşçıer and Önder were released on probation.	Parlementerê Colemêrgê Nihat Akdogan jî di 7ê Mijdarê de hatibû girtin.
HDP Group Deputy Chair Çağlar Demirel and HDP Siirt MP Besime Konca were arrested on December 13, which increased the number of arrested HDP MPs to 12.	Derbarêr Parlementerê Şirnexê Faysal Sariyildiz û Parlementera Wanê Tuba Hezer de jî biryara girtinê hatiye dayîn.
HDP İstanbul MP Filiz Kerestecioğlu and HDP Muş MP Ahmet Yıldırım were replaced for the arrested group deputy chairs.	Cîgira Koma HDPê Çaglar Demirel û Parlementera Sêrtê Besîme Konca jî di 13ê Kanûnê de hatibûn girtin.
Şırnak MP Leyla Birlik was released on January 4.	Parlementera Şirnexê Leyla Birlik di 4ê Çileyê de hatibû tehliyekirin.
The Amnesty has initiated an urgent action for Sibel Çapraz, who was shot in Turkey’s southeastern Yüksekova district of Hakkari province in 2015 and now kept in Bakırköy Women Prison.	Sîbel Çapraz di sala 2015ê de li Geverê hatibû birîndarkirin û girtin. Çapraz ji wê demê ve di girtîgehan de ye û niho li Girtîgeha Bakirkoyê ye.
“Access of Çapraz to a vital and urgent operation and sufficient medical care has been obstructed by the authorities”, said the statement issued as part of the urgent action.	 Rêxistina Navneteweyî ya Bexişînê eşkere kir ku divê du emeliyatên TIBî li Sîbel Çaprazê bêne kirin û rêxistinê ji bo vê yekê tevgerek daye dest pê kirin.
“We demand that operation of closing colostomy and inversion be performed in an equipped medical center and access to other medical care be provided for Sibel Çapraz without any further delay”, the statement stated.	Rêxistinê da zanîn “rayedar ji bo wan emeliyatên TIBî dibin asteng ku heke neyê kirin Sîbel Çapraz dikeve di xetera mirinê de.”
Çapraz firstly stayed in Bakırköy Closed Women Prison, then transferred to İzmir Menemen Type R Prison on June 30. She was transferred to Bakırköy Prison in İstanbul on June 30.	Cihgira serokê giştî yê Dîwana birêvebiriya Colemêrgê, Sîbel Çapraz di meha Ciriya Paşiyê de beşdarî xwenîşandana derêxistina dengan bûbû.
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Group Vice Chair Ahmet Yıldırım and Urfa MP Osman Baydemir were detained today (January 25) in accordance with a warrant of taking by force in Diyarbakır Courthouse where they went to watch trial.	Cihgirê berdevkê koma Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP) yê li parlamentoyê Ahmet Yildirim, û Parlamenterê Rûhayê Osman Baydemîr, dema ku ji bo li dadkirinê temaşe bikin çûbûn Dadgeha Amedê polîsan ew desteser kirine.
Same action was taken against HDP Diyarbakır MP İmam Taşçıer a few hours before that.	Polîsan dane zanîn ku biryar hatiye dayin ji bo îfadedanê divê ew bi zorê wan bibin.
HDP Iğdır MP Mehmet Emin Adıyaman as well was taken to prosecutor’s office by police in accordance with the warrant of taking by force this morning.	Çend sietekê ji beriya Baydemîr û Yildirimî heman kiriyar ji bo parlamenterê Amedê, Îmam Taşçierî jî hatibû kirin.
Pir, Taşçıer and Önder were released on probation.	Her çar parlamenter jî serbest hatin berdan.
Yüksekdağ, Demirtaş, Baluken, Birlik, Irmak, Aydoğan, Yıldırım, Zeydan and Encü were arrested on the same day.	Ji bo parlamenterê Îdirê, Adiyamanî derketina derve hat qedexekirin.
HDP Hakkari MP Akdoğan was arrested on November 7. 	Ji 59 parlamenterên HDPyê 11 parlamenter girtî ne
HDP Group Deputy Chair Çağlar Demirel and HDP Siirt MP Besime Konca were arrested on December 13, which increased the number of arrested HDP MPs to 12.	Herdu hevserokên HDPyê Selahattîn Demîrtaş û Fîgen Yûksekdag parlamenterên Şirnexê Ferhat Encû û Leyla Bîrlîk, parlamenterên Colemêrgê Selma Irmak û Abdullah Zeydan, parlamenterên Amedê Zîya Pîr, Idrîs Balûken, Nûrsel Aydogan û Îmam Taşçier, parlamenterê Enqereyê Sirri Sûreyya Onder û parlamentera Mêrdînê Gulser Yildirim di 4ê Çiriya Paşiyê de hatibûn desteserkirin.
With the release of Birlik, the number of arrested HDP MPs has dropped to 11. (AS/TK)	Parlamenterê HDPyê yê Colemêrgê, Nîhat Akdogan di 7ê Çiriya Paşiyê de hat girtin.(AS/MB) 
Van’s Muradiye district’s Co-Mayor Mehmet Ali Tunç from the Democratic Regions Party (DBP) has been arrested.	Piştî ku li Şaredariya Bêgiriyê qayûm hat tayînkirin, Hevşaredar Mehmet Ali Tunç jî hat girtin.
Tunç was detained during a police raid on the municipality building on January 16. District’s sub-Governor Mehmet Fatih Çelikel was appointed as a trustee to the municipality.	Polîsan di 16ê Çileyê de avêtibûne ser avahiya Şaredariya Bêgiriyê û Hevşaredar Mehmet Ali Tunçî binçav kiribûn. Rojev piştî binçavkirina Tunç, qaymeqamê navçeyê Mehmet Fatih Çelikel weke qayûm li şaredariyê hatibû tayînkirin.
According to a report by Fırat News Agency, 17 people detained along with Tunç were referred to court for arrest yesterday (January 25).	Li gorî nûçeya Ajansa Nûçeyan a Firatê Hevşaredar Tunç jî tê de 17 kesên ku 9 roj in binçavkirî bûn duh bi daxwaza girtinê sewqî dadgehê hatin kirin.
While 10 people were released on probation, Bahattin Karagüle, Doğan Başak, Halil İbrahim Güler, municipality staff Yemlihan Akkış and Ercan Dilmaç, DBP District Co-Chair Mehmet Kaplan were arrested along with Tunç.	Rûniştina dozan hetanî derengê şevê dewam kir û di encamê de 10 kes bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest hatin berdan, lê Hevşaredar Tunç jî tê de derbarê 7 kesan de biryara girtinê hat dayîn û wan şandin zindanê. Navên kesên ku hatine girtin wiha ne: Bahattin Karagule, Dogan Başak, Halil Ibrahim Guler, xebatkarên şaredariyê Yemlihan Akkuş û Ercan Dilmaç, Hevserokê DBPê ya Rêxistina Navçeyê Mehmet Kaplan.
Journalist Arzu Demir has been sentenced in total to 6 years in prison because of her books titled “Dağın Kadın Hali (Womanly State of the Mountain)” and “Devrimin Rojava Hali (Revolution’s State of Rojava)”.	Doza derbarê Arzû Demir ku ji ber pirtûkên wê yên “Dagin Kadin Hali” û “Devrimin Rojava Hali” hatibû vekirin de dadgehê biryara xwe da û 6 sal ceza li Demir hat dayîn.
Speaking to bianet, Demir remarked that the trial is a “cyclical political trial”, said “This verdict is a proof that the trials are political. I've just practiced journalism. The state is fighting an organization which it calls 'terrorist', the people have right to know about this organization".	Arzû Demir di axavtina xwe ya ji bianetê re diyar kir ku dadgirina hatiye kirin konjukturî û siyasî ye û got: “Ev biryar delîl e ku dadkirinên tê kirin siyasî ye.”
“The prosecutor imposed the penalty from upper limit. I was expecting this. My response is: I am glad I wrote, I am still writing”.	Di doza li 13. Dadgeha Cezayê Giran hat dîtin de derbarê Demir de ji ber 2 pirtûkên wê bi temamî 6 sal cezayê girtinê hat dayîn.
Demir was sentenced to 3 years in prison for each of her two books by İstanbul 13th Heavy Penal Court.	Demir ji bianet’ê re axivî û wiha got:
"No remorse expressed"	“Ez ji destpêkê heta niha dibêjim ku dadgirinên tê kirin konjukturî û siyasî ye. Ev biryar jî îspata gotina min e. Weke ku min di paraznameya xwe de jî got ku min rojnamgerî kiriye. Dewlet bi rêxistina ku jê re dibêje ‘terorîst’ re şer dike. Mafê gel heye ku wê rêxistinê nas bike û pê bizanibe. Rojava dîsa wisa.
The court also didn't exercise remission on the ground that the journalist "didn't express remorse".	“Ji bo gel mafê zanebûnê pîroz e. Weke rojnamegerek peywîra min e ku ez vê mafê gel biparêzim.
What had happened?	Çi bûbû?
Besides the claims of “propagandising for the PKK”, the bill of indictment also included remarks that the respective interviews in the book were not current news and did not concern the public opinion.	Di dema lêpirsînê de parastina Demir nehatibû girtin û yekser doz lê hatibû vekirin. Lewma, Demir wê di rûniştina sibe de cara yekem xwe biparêze.
The book addresses the creation and development of the roles of womanhood and manhood in the mountains based on personal experiences of guerilla women. While seeking for an answer to the question, why women take it to the mountains, Demir also expresses her personal opinions regarding “arms, mountain, death, love and sexuality”.	15ê Adara 2016an de 3. Dadgeha Sulh Cezayê derbarê pirtûkê di biryara hevdanê dabû û piştî çapa 7. pirtûk hatibû hevdan.
About Arzu Demir	Arzû Demir kî ye?
Broadcasting ban has been imposed on news website www.ozguruz.org whose Editor-in-Chief is Can Dündar before it started to publish any news.	Malpera ku Can Dûndar berpirsê weşana wê ye, hêj dest bi weşandina nûçeyan nekirî BTKyê ew asteng kir.
Can Dündar announced the website on 24th anniversary of killing of journalist Uğur Mumuc, January 24, 2017.	Can Dûndarî di 24ê Kanûna Paşiyê ya 2017ê de, di roja salvegera 24. a kuştina Ûgûr Mûmcûyî de, dabû zanîn ku malperê dest bi weşanê kiriye.
Information Technologies and Communication Authority (BTK) imposed administrative measure and blocked access to the website.	Saziya Ragihandinê ya Teknolojiyên Zanyariyan(BTK) hêj malperê dest bi belavkirina nûçeyan nekirî şeva dî malper asteng kir.
Following the ban, Can Dündar tweeted:	Can Dûndarî piştî biryarê li ser Twîtterê, ew Twît belav kir:
The most crowded delegation of the International PEN, which dates back to a 100 years, went in front of Silivri Closed Prison to act in solidarity with imprisoned journalists and writers.	Rêxistina PENa Navneteweyî ku zêdetirî 100 sal in xebatên xwe pêk tîne, di dîroka xwe de cara yekem bi heyeteke ev qas mezin ve ji bo hevgiriya bi rojnameger û nivîskarên girtî re çûn derê Girtîgeha Silivriyê.
According to a report by Cumhuriyet newspaper, the group wasn’t hindered at any check points on the way to the prison. The delegation was stopped by the gendarmerie forces as they reached the waiting area in front of the prison.	Li gorî nûçeya Cumhuriyetê heyet di riya girtîgehê de ji bo kontrolê nehatine sekinandin. Lêbelê piştî heyet gihişte Girtîgeha Silivriyê û li wir kombûn, leşkeran berê wan girtin.
Armed gendarmerie forces waited by the PEN members and deleted all the pictures taken. In response to journalists asking of the obstruction against taking photos, the gendarmerie forces said “Taking photos is illegal within the scope of the State of Emergency”.	Leşkeran endamên PENê siyarê wesayîtên wan kirin, bi çekan li ber wesayîn wan sekinîn. Leşkeran gotin “Dema OHALê de dîmen û wêne kişandin li vir qedexe ye” û piştre re dîmenên hatine kişandin jî jê birin.
The gendarmerie forces also broke in the press statement planned to be issued under spokespersonship of International PEN President Jennifer Clement.	Dema ku Seroka PENê Jennifer Clement dest bi xwendina metna daxuyaniyê dixwend, leşkeran mudaxele kirin û nehiştin daxuyanî bi dawî bibe.
“We are here today. We stand in front of these walls. In order to honor and act in solidarity with our friends who we want to see by our side as soon as possible…”, Clement could say before the gendarmerie broke in.	“Dema navbera heyetê û leşkeran de gengeşî derket Clement wiha got: “Em li ber va dîwaran e. Em dixwazin ku dostên me yên li hundir demildest werin cem me û ji bo rûmeta wan, ji bo hevgiriya bi wan re em li vir in.”
Furthermore, the International PEN sent a letter of solidarity to writers and journalists saying “We are writing to remind you that you are not alone. In this period in which your human rights are violated, we will not remain silent. We will raise our voice on a global scale against those who want to silence you”.	Her wiha heyeta PENê ji nivîskar û rojnamegeran re name şandin. Di wê nameyê de wiha hat gotin: “Hûn ne tenê ne û em ji bo vê yekê bînin bîra we vê nameyê dişînin. Em di vê pêvajoya ku mafên we yên mirovî hatiye binpêkirin de, bêdeng namînin. Em ê li dijî pêkanînên ji bo bêdengkirina we di qada navneteweyî de dengê xwe bilind bikin.”
Signatories	Kesên ku name îmzekirine wiha ne:
The Ministry of Interior has announced that a total of 986 people were detained and 84 others were arrested from January 23-30.	Wezareta Karên Navxweyî eşkere kir ku di navbera 23 û 30ê Kanûna Paşiyê de 986 kes hatine desteserkirin, 84 kes hatine girtin.
202 operations have been launched by Gendarmerie Special Forces (JÖH), Gendarmerie Commando Units, Police Special Operation (PÖH) and Turkish Armed Forces’ Land and Air units. 	Li gor daxuyaniya wezaretê, “hêzên ewlehiyê 202 operasyon kirine.”
328 people have been detained and 41 others arrested “as part of combat against separatist terror organizations”.	328 kes bi tometa têkiliya bi rêxistina re hatine desteserkirin 41 ji wan hatine girtin.
26 people suspected of being “affiliated with ISIS (Islamic State of Iraq and Syria)” have been detained and one of them has been arrested.	26 kesên tê hizirîn ku têkiliya wan bi DAIŞê re heye, hatine desteserkirin, yek ji wan hatiye girtin.
625 people have been detained and 42 others arrested due to suspected ties with “FETÖ/PDY (Fethullahist Terror Organization/Parallel State Structure)”	Di Operasyona FETOyê(Rêxistina Terorî ya Fethûllahgir)  de 625 kes hatine desteserkirin, 42 ji wan hatine girtin.
Seven people with alleged “link[s] with leftist organizations” have been detained.	Heft kesên tê fikirîn ku têkiliya wan bi rêxistinên çepgir re heye haatine desteserkirin. (BK/MB)
“Four terrorists, one of whom surrendered and three others who were captured alive, have been neutralized”, the statement said. (BK/TK)	 
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Group Deputy Chair and the party’s Diyarbakır MP İdris Baluken was released after a trial today (January 30). Baluken had been in custody since November 4, 2016.	Serokwekîlê Koma HDPê û Parlementerê HDPê Îdrîs Baluken serbest hat berdan. Îdrîs Baluken ji 4ê Mijdarê vir ve girtî bû.
HDP Van MP Nadir Yıldırım was detained while observing the hearing in the Diyarbakır 8th Heavy Penal Court. Yıldırım was later released.	Rûniştina doza derbarê Îdrîs Baluken de îro li 8. Dadgeha Cezayê Giran ya Amedê hat dîtin û Parlementerê Wanê Nadir Yildirim dema beşdarê rûniştina dozê bû hat binçavkirin û piştî îfadedayînê ew jî serbest hatibû berdan.
10 of 59 HDP MPs arrested	10 parlementerên HDPê girtî ne
HDP Co-Chairs Selahattin Demirtaş and Figen Yüksekdağ, Şırnak MPs Ferhat Encü, Leyla Birlik, Hakkari MPs Selma Irmak, Abdullah Zeydan, Diyarbakır MPs İdris Baluken, Nursel Aydoğan, Ziya Pir, İmam Taşçıer, Ankara MP Sırrı Süreyya Önder and Mardin MP Gülser Yıldırım were taken into custody on November 4. Yüksekdağ, Demirtaş, Baluken, Birlik, Irmak, Aydoğan, Yıldırım, Zeydan and Encü were arrested on the same day.	Hevserokên Giştî yên HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş û Figen Yuksekdag, Cîgirê Koma HDPê û Parlementerê Amedê Îdrîs Baluken, parlementerên bi navê Leyla Birlik, Selma Irmak, Nûrsel Aydogan, Gulser Yildirim, Ferhat Encu û Abdullah Zeydan di 4ê Mijdara 2016an de hatibûn girtin.

'There must be a Democratic Republic Constitution'	“Divê Makeqanûna Komara Demokratîk be”
The declaration also underlined that the constitution draft was one imposed by the Justice and Development Party (AKP) and Nationalist Movement Party (MHP), did not include other political bodies and was monistic, centrist, sexist and nationalist.	Di vê Makeqanûnê de divê hemî dîn, bawerî, çîn, gel bi birêvebiriyên siyasî/civakî bêne naskirin.
"There must be a negotiating table again"	Divê bingeh birêvebirîyek be ku civak ji aliyê sîyasî/civakî beşdar be.
Noting that a "no" result would be the best for the whole society, the declaration argued that establishing a monistic, centrist, sexist and nationalist constitution based on the AKP-MHP partnership would be hindered this way and that the new phase to follow should include seeking for solutions on the negotiating table. (NV/DG)	Bi danezanê hat eşkerekirin ku ev Makeqanûn di serî de ji bo kêşeya kurdan ji bo ti kêşeyan çareseriyan çênake. (NV/MB) 
Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) Kars MP and the party's Spokesperson Ayhan Bilgen has been arrested.	Berdevkê Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP) û parlamenterê Qersê, Ayhan Bîlgen hat girtin.
Upon opposition by Diyarbakır Chief Public Prosecutor's Office, warrant was issued to forcibly take HDP Adana MP Meral Danış Beştaş and HDP Party Spokesperson Ayhan Bilgen for arrest.	Meral Daniş Beştaş û Ayhan Bîlgen ên ku serbest hatibûn berdan piştî îtiraza serdozgerîyê hatin girtin.
On January 28 Meral Danış Beştaş and on January 29 Ayhan Bilgen were taken into custody and later released on probation on the same day. Meral Danış Beştaş was arrested on January 30.	Di 29ê Kanûna Paşiyê de Ayhan Bîlgen hatibû desteserkirin û di heman rojê de bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest hatibû berdan.

Antep Governorship has announced that it banned events including petitions, hanging banners, and press statements to be held outdoors during February.	Walîtîya Dîlokê da zanîn ku ji bo mehekê li Dîlokê hemî çalakîyên li derveyî avahiyan yên wek kampanyayên îmzekomkirinê, daxuyaniyên ji bo çapemeniyê û hwd.  qedexe ne.
The campaigns for constitutional amendment referendum to be held in April took start throughout Turkey. (YY/TK)	Ji bo referandûma ku dê di meha Nîsanê de bê kirin li hemî bajaran dest bi kampanyayan hatiye kirin. (YY/MB) 
Parliamentary Deputy Speaker Ahmet Aydın has submitted the Constitutional Amendment Draft which has 18 articles to President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan for assessment.	Pêşnûmeya guhertina makeqanûnê ku ji 18 qanûnan pêk yê û Serokwekîlê Meclisê Ahmet Aydin îmze kiribû, ji Serokomar Erdogan re hat şandin. Divê Erdogan pêşnûmeyê di nav 15 rojan de erê bike.
How does the process continue?	Wê çi bibe?
Erdoğan has 15 days to assess the draft.	Divê Erdogan di nav 15 rojan biryar bide ka ji wê pêşnûmeyê referandum were kirin an na.
If he approves it, the draft will be published in the Official Gazette.	Eger Erdogan erê bike wê agahî di Rojnameya Fermî de were weşandin.
Following the publish on the Official Gazette, the referendum will be held on the first Sunday after 60 days.	Piştî di Rojnameya Fermî de were weşandin, divê piştî 60 rojan referandum were kirin.
Mardin Metropolitan co-Mayor Ahmet Türk's attorney, Zeynep Ceren Boztoprak said the İstanbul Forensic Medicine Institution report, published today, has determined continued imprisonment would not constitute a life threatening situation for Türk, provided "health checks are undertaken every six months".	Saziya Tîpa Edlî ya Stenbolê rapora xwe ya derbarê Hevşaredarê Bajarê Mezin ê Mêrdînê Ahmet Turk de diyar kir. Parêzerê Turk Zeynep Ceren Boztoprak daxuyand ku di wê raporê de hatiye gotin ku “bi şertê 6 mehan careke kontrola tenduristî, Ahmet Turk dikare di girtîgehê de bimîne, ti xetereyeke bo tenduristiya wî nîn e.”
Boztoprak told bianet, "The report came to this decision, even though it diagnoses all of Ahmet Türk's all health problems, including the fact that he has a pacemaker."	Boztoprak daxuyanî da bianet’ê re û got: “Di wê raporê de hemû nexweşî û pîlê di dilê Ahmet Turk de tê tespîtkirin lê dîsa jî di raporê de encameke tê diyarkirin.”
6 displacements in 2 months arrest	Di girtina 2 mehan de li 6 bajaran hat gerandin
Following a January 25 health examination at the Fırat University Faculty of Medicine, Türk was taken to İstanbul Forensic Medicine Institution on January 30 to determine whether he was fit to serve a prison sentence. He remained at the Institution for only one day.	Di 25ê Çileyê de Turk li Nexweşxaneya Zanîngeha Firatê ya Xarpêtê hat dermankirin û di 30ê Çileyê de careke din sewqî saziya tîpa edlî hat kirin û ji bo rojekî wî dîsa birin Stenbolê.  
Türk's transfer to Elazığ was allegedly due to a lack of vacancies in Diyarbakır Prison, though the reason for his earlier transfer to Silivri Prison is unknown.	Her wiha wî ji bo rojekî jî birin Amedê ku beşdarê rûniştina dozê bibe.
About Ahmet Türk	(AS/YO)
The first photo of Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Co-Chair Selahattin Demirtaş’s has been released to the public since his arrest as part of an investigation by Diyarbakır Chief Public Prosecutor’s Office on November 3, 2016.	Hevserokê Giştî yê HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş di 4ê Mijdarê de hate girtin û heta niha cara yekem wêneyek wî yê ji girtîgehê hat weşandin.
The photo was taken while Demirtaş received a visit from his father Tahir, mother Sadiye, spouse Başak, daughters Delal and Dılda, and brother Şadiye.	Malbata Demirtaş wî li Girtîgeha Tîpa F ya Edirneyê ziyaret kir û wêneya pê re kişandin jî belav kirin.
About Selahattin Demirtaş	Derbarê Demirtaş de 142 sal ceza tê xwestin
After college, Demirtaş worked as a freelance lawyer for a time before becoming a member of the executive committee of the Diyarbakır Branch of the Human Rights Association (IHD).	Derbarê Selahattîn Demirtaş de bi hincetên weke “rêvebirê rêxistina terorî ye”, “propagandaya rêxistina terorê kiriye”, “pesna sûc û sûcdaran daye” ve heta 142 salan cezayê hepiskirinê tê xwestin.
Demirtaş started his political career as a member of the Democratic Society Party (DTP) in 2007, at which time he stood as one of the ‘Thousand Hope Candidates’ for the DTP and several other democratic organizations in Turkey. He was elected to the 23rd Parliament and became the Parliamentary Chief Officer for the party at the age of 34.	(EKN/YO)
Simultaneous operations were carried out against Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) in multiple cities yesterday (February 5).	Hêzên ewlehiyê serê sibeyê dest bi operasyonekê kir.
60 people in Ankara, 18 in İstanbul and Kocaeli, 46 in Bursa, 9 in İzmir, 47 in Antep, 100 in Urfa, 10 in Adıyaman, 37 in Konya, 10 in Bingöl, 25 in Adana, 38 in Hatay, 2 in Malatya, 4 in Kilis, 17 in Çorum, 4 in Diyarbakır, 10 in Antalya, 8 in Van, and 3 in Muğla were detained.	Li Edene, Semsûr, enqere, Antalya, Dîlok, Çewlig, Bursa, Çorum, Amed, Hatay, Stenbol, Izmîr, Kilîs, Kocaeli, Konya, Meletî, Manîsa, Mugla, Samsun, Rûha û  Wanê li dijî DAIŞê operasyonek hatiye kirin.
Turgay Gülenç, sub-Governor of Bismil district of the Turkey's southeastern province of Diyarbakır has been appointed to the district's municipality as a trustee.	Piştî derbarê Hevşaredarê Bismilê Cemîle Eminoglu de biryara binçavkirinê hat dayîn, qaymeqamê navçeyê Turgay Gulenç weke qayûm li şaredariyê hat tayînkirin.
Police had searched the apartment of Cemile Eminoğlu, co-Mayor of Bismil Municipality governed by the Democratic Regions Party (DBP), the municipality building and the Eminoğlu's office on Saturday (February 4).	Roja şemiyê polîsan avêtin ser mala Hevşaredarê Bismilê Cemîle Eminoglu û biştre li avahiya şaredariyê jî lêgerîn pêk anîn.
According to the news agency Dihaber, there is a detention order for Eminoğlu issued in the investigation launched by Diyarbakır Chief Public Prosecutor's Office.	Li gorî nûçeya Dihaberê di çarçoveya lêpirsîna ku Serdozgeriya Amedê daye destpêkirin de, derbarê Hevşaredar Cemîl Eminoglu de biryara binçavkirinê hat dayîn.
İstanbul 43rd Criminal Court of First Instance has rejected the indictment prepared against fashion designer Barbaros Şansal on charge of “inciting people to animosity and enmity” on the ground that “There is no certain and convincing evidence”.	43. Dadgeha Asliye Cezayê ya Stenbolê îdianameya derbarê Barbaros Şansal de ku ji ber ‘gel tehrîkê kîn û dijminatiyê kiriye’ ve hatibû amadekirin, bi hinceta ‘ti delîleke teqes û rast nayê xuyandin’ ve red kir.
Complainant: Presidency	Muştekî-Gilîkar: Serokomarî
In the indictment, Presidency on behalf of President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan is the complainant.	Di îdianameyê de ya balkêş ew e ku, bi ser navê Serokomar Tayyîp Erdogan Sekreteriya Serokomartiyê jî weke muştekî-gilîkar cih digre.
Prosecutor Umut Tepe sent the indictment demanding 3 years in prison due to some of Şansal’s tweets to court on February 3.	Dozger Umur Tepe di çarçoveya qanûna 216. de derbarê Barbaros Şansal de îdianame amade kiribû û di 3ê Sibatê de şandibû ji heyeta dadgehê re. Li gorî wê îdianameyê derbarê Şansal de 3 sal ceza dihat xwestin.
Court: IP numbers don’t match	Dadgeha: Nimareya IPê ji hev nagire
Attorney Efkan Bolaç representing Şansal told bianet the court didn’t accept the indictment today (February 6).	Parêzerê Şansal Efkan Bolaç derbarê mijarê de ji bianetê re axivî û diyar kir ku dadgehê îro îdianameyê red kir û wiha got:
“The reason behind court’s rejection is that it has yet to be proved that the tweets allegedly posted by Şansal were actually his tweets.	“Yek ji hincetên redkirina îdianameyê ew e ku ew twitên ku di serê salê de hatine parvekirin, ne hatiye îspatkirin ka Şansal avêtiye an na.
Barbaros Şansal is in Silivri Prison since January 3.	Dozger xwest ku di çarçoveya 301an de jî lêpirsîn were kirin
Stating that he shared the video in Northern Cyrpus, Şansal had drawn some circles' reaction for saying "I hope you die in your own shit Turkey".	Şansal piştî van parvekirinên li Qibrîsê ji hêla gelek aliyan ve hedef hat nişandan û rastî gefxwarinên mezin hat û di heman rojê de ji Qibrîsê hat dersînorkirin.
Adana Bar Association Union President Attorney Veli Küçük has announced that the four association administrators who were first arrested and later released over the fire in the girls' dorm in Aladağ district of Turkey's southern province of Adana killing 12 people including 11 children, have been arrested again.	Li navçeya Aladagê ya Edeneyê, warê xwendekaran şewitîbû, bi şewatê 12 kesên ku 11 ji wan zarok bûn miribûn. Ji ber şewata warê xwendekaran çar rayedarên hatibûn destserkirin û berdan hatin girtin.
In the investigation run by Aladağ Public Chief Prosecutor's Office following the dorm fire, dorm director Cumali Genç, director of Aladağ Aid Association for Course Students and Pupils İsmail Uğur and four administrators of the dorm Ramazan Keleş, Ramazan Dede, Mustafa Öztaş, Mahir Kılınç were arrested on December 4, 2016.	Serdozgeriya Aladagê, di 4ê Kanûna Pêşiyê de midûrê yurdê Cûmalî Genç, serokê Komeleya Alikarîdayina Xwendekarên di Dibistanan de Ismaîl Ugur, birêvebirên komeleyê Ramazan Keleş, Ramazan Dede, Mustafa Oztaş, Mahir Kilinç girtibûn.
Keleş, Dede, Öztaş and Kılınç were released on January 22, 2017 after their attorneys challenged the decision on the grounds that the expert report said that the respective administrators were only secondary suspects.	Di 22yê Kanûna Paşiyê de ew kesên girtî hatibûn serbest berdan.
What had happened?	(YY/MB) 
Following the bomb and gun attacks in İstanbul and İzmir, 948 people have been taken into custody, 248 others have been arrested over their posts on Twitter and Facebook.	Piştî êrîşên bi bombeyan yên li Stenbol û Izmîrê li 81 bajaran ji ber parvekirinên li medyaya civakî di du hefteyan de  948 kes hatine desteserkirin, 248 kes hatine girtin.
According to the report of the state-run Anadolu Agency, those who were sharing the postings which were being monitored were identified by the department against cyber crimes subordinated to the provincial security directorates.	Li gor nûçeya Ajansa Anadolûyê piştî gilîkirinê hesabên medyaya civakî hatine şopandin.
Operations were run on December 11, 2016 and February 6, 2017 regarding the postings shared on social media following the bomb attack on December 10, 2016 in Beşiktaş district of İstanbul killing 46 people including 38 police officers.	Li Beşîktaşa Stenbolê di 10ê Kanûna Paşiyê de êrîşeka bi bombeyan hatibû kirin û 46 kes miribûn, 38 ji wan polîs bûn. Piştî êrîşê di 11ê Kanûna Pêşiyê de operasyonên li dijî hesabên medyaya civakî hatin kirin.
700 people were released	700 kes hatine berdan
248 of the 948 people taken into custody were later placed under arrest.	Bikarhênerên hesabên medyaya civakî bi piştgirîdana terorê têne sûcdarkirin.
The other 700 were released by court on probation or released after testifying in the police station.	948 kes hatine desteserkirin, 248 ji wan li dadgehan hatine girtin. 700 kes bi şertê kontrola edlî hatine serbest berdan. (AS/MB) 
330 academics from 48 universities were discharged by the new statutory decree issued yesterday (February 7) evening under the State of Emergency.	Bi Biryarnameya di Hikmê Qanûnan de ya 686. ji 48 zanîngehan 330 akademîsyen ji karî hatine avêtin.
The largest number of discharges were at Ankara University (78), Anadolu University (28), Yıldız Technical University (27) and Marmara University (23).	Herî zêde akademîsyenên ji Zanîngeha Enqereyê(78) ji Zanîngeha Anadolûyê û ji Zanîngeha Marmarayê(23) hatine avêtin.
The number of academics dismissed in the five statutory decrees issued until today has reached 4811. 16 of these were given back their positions by a later Statutory Decree.	Heta niho 5 biryarname hatine weşandin. Bi biryarnameyan 4811 akademîsyen ji karî hatine avêtin.

The curfew hours in Turkey's southeastern province of Şırnak has been changed from between 11 p.m - 5 a.m. to between 11 p.m. - 02.30 a.m.	Li Şirnexê di sietên 22:00-05:00ê de derketina derve qedexe bû, qedexe hat guhertin dê ji îro pê ve di sietên 23:00 – 02:30ê de derketina derve qedexe be.
The curfew in effect since March 14 in Şırnak had been partially lifted on November 14, 2016 for between the hours 5 a.m - 10 p.m.	Walîtîya Şirnexê di 14ê Adara 2016ê de derketina derve li hemîya Şirnexê qedexe kiribû. Di 14ê Çiriya Paşiyê de walîtîyê qedexe ji bo hin sietan rakiribû.
Şırnak vice-Governor Turan Bedirhanoğlu was appointed to Şırnak Governorship as a trustee on November 5, 2016.	Di 5ê Çiriya Paşiyê de cihgirê walîyê Şirnexê Turan Bedirhanoglû wek şaredar hatibû erkdarkirin.
Two soldiers have lost their lives, 15 others have been injured in the armed clashes between the Turkish Armed Forces (TSK) and Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) in Operation Euphrates Shield carried out in Al-Bab region of Syria.	Li Elbabê di şerê di navbera Hêzên Çekdarên Tirk(TSK) û DAIŞê de du leşker mirine 15 leşker birîndar bûne.
TSK in its statement announced that the 15 soldiers who had no severe injuries were brought to hospital.	Li gor daxuyaniya TSKyê 15 leşkerên birîndar li nexweşxaneyan têne dermankirin.
The two soldiers who lost their lives were brought to Antep on helicopters and were delivered to morgue after autopsy procedures were completed.	Herdu leşkerên mirîn bi helîkopteran ji bo Êlihê hatine anîn.
In the region where Operation Euphrates Shield is carried out, a Russian jet hit a building with soldiers from Turkish Armed Forces in it during an air strike launched onto forces of Islamic State of Syria and Iraq (ISIS) yesterday (February 9) morning.	Balafireka şerî ya Rûsyayê duhî di operasyoneka li dijî DAIŞê de, li El Babê li xaniyekê daye ku leşkerên Hêzên Çekdar ên Tirkan(TSK) tê de bûn.
Three soldiers have lost their lives, 11 soldiers one of whom is in a critical condition have been injured.	Bi êrîşê sê leşker miribûn û 11 leşker birîndar bûbûn.
"Bomb hit building accidentally"	“Ji xeletî ve bombe lê ketiye”
Director of CIA was in Turkey	Serokê CIAyê li Tirkiyeyê bû
Director of the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) Mike Pompeo had visited Ankara for the first time yesterday, on the day of the bombing. Pompea had met President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan to talk about the Operation Raqqa.	Di heman rojê de, serokê CIAyê Mike Pompeo da ku li ser mijara Operasyona Reqqayê û Sûriyeyê bide û bistîne hatibû Enqereyê.
Three soldiers	Sê leşker
The bodies of 23 year-old Ömer Akkuş, 25 year-old Sergeant Major Mehmet Şahin and 26 year-old tanker Corporal Major Emre Mücahit Topal were taken out of the ruins of the bombed building. (NV/DG)	Duhî ji xerabeyên xaniyê herifî termê Omer Akkûşê 23 salî, Mehmet Şahînê 25 salî û Emre Mûcahît Topalê 26 salî hatibû derêxistin.(NV/MB) 
Vice Prime Minister Nurettin Canikli has said that the list concerning expels of academics will be sent to the Higher Education Council (YÖK) and the wrongdoings will be fixed.	Cihgirê serokwezîrî, Nûrettîn Canîklîyî eşkere kir ku lîsteya akademîsyenên jikarîhatînavêtin dê ji bo Lijneya Xwendina Bilind(YOK) bê şandin û xeletî dê bêne serastkirin.
According to a report by Nuray Babacan from Hürriyet newspaper, expulsion of 330 academics by the latest Statutory Decree was discussed as well at Group Administrative Board of the Justice and Development Party (AKP) meeting. The AKP deputies brought the subject to agenda, the report says. The members asked Canikli of who prepared the list. The members stated that they closely know many figures on the list and there is no chance that they could be anyway linked with any illegal group.	Li gor nûçeya Nuray Babacanê ku li Huriyetê belav bûye endamên Lijneya Birêvebir a AKPyê li ser jikarîavêtina 330 akademîsyenan axivîne.
What happened?	Çi bûbû?
330 academics from 48 universities were expelled from public service by Statutory Decree No. 686 issued on February 7, 2017 as part of the State of Emergency.	Bi Biryarnameya di Hikmê Qanûnan de ya 686. ji 48 zanîngehan 330 akademîsyen ji karî hatine avêtin.
The Constitutional amendment draft has been referred by President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan to Prime Ministry to be put to the popular vote.	Serokkomarê Recep Tayyîp Erdogan teklîfa guhertina Makeqanûnê îmze kir. Teklîf ji bo serokwezîrîyê hat şandin, referandûm dê li ser wê bê kirin.
The legislation will be published on the Official Gazette if passed. The referendum will be held on the first Sunday after 60 days of its publishing on the Official Gazette.	Makeqanûna bi navê Makeqanûna Komara Tirkiyeyê ya 6771. dê li Rojnameya Fermî bê weşandin. Piştî weşandina Makeqanûnê divê 60 roj biborin. Piştî 60 rojan di Yekşema pêşiyê de Referandûma Makeqanûnê dê bê kirin.
184 of 330 academics who have been expelled by Statutory Decree No. 686 dated February 7, 2017 are signatories of the declaration entitled “We Will Not be a Party to This Crime”.	Bi Biryarnameya di Hikmê Qanûnan de, 330 akademîsyen ji karî hatin avêtin, 184 ji wan Danezana Aştiyê îmze kiriye.
The number of signatories who were expelled by the Statutory Decree reached 312. 28 of them were previously either sacked or they resigned.	Hejmara Akademîsyenên Aştîxwaz ên ji karî hatîn avêtin bû 321, 28 ji wan ji beriya jikarîderêxistinê îstifa kiribû.

Tuba Kıyan	Tuba Kıyan
(BK/TK)	(BK/MB)
According to the reports bianet compiled from local and national newspapers, news sites and agencies, men have killed 29 women; raped six; harassed six; sexually abused 27 girls; inflicted violence on 23 in January.	Li gor nûçeyên bianetê ji rojnameyên herêmî û neteweyî, ji malper û ajansan berhev kirîn, mêran di Kanûna Pêşiyê de 29 jin kuştine, tecawiz li şeş jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 27 keçên zarok kiriye, tûndkarî li 23 jinan kiriye.
Murder	Kuştin
52% of the women were killed by husbands and boyfriends; two were killed by elder brothers; one by a male relative; two by sons of the men whom their mothers to wed; one by her ex-fiancée, one by the son of the man she would marry; one by her sister’s husband; nine by husbands of official marriage; two by husbands of religious marriage; one by her neighbor; one by her son; four by boyfriends; one by her grandson; one woman by men of the family by the family’s decision.	Ji sedî 52yê jinên hatîn kuştin mêrê wan an jî destgirtiyê wan ew kuştine. Birayê du jinan ew kuştine. Kurê zirbavê du jinan ew kuştine. Kurê mêrekê ku jinek dê pê re bizewiciya ew kuştiye. Mêrê bi zewaca fermî zewicî yê neh jinan ew kuştine. Mêrê bi zewaca dînî zewicîn ên du jinan ew kuştine. Neviyê jinekê ew kuştiye. Jinek bi biryara malbata wê bi destê mêrên malê hatine kuştin.
62% of the women were murdered with fire arms: Nine women were killed with knives; one by being strangled; one by being cut in throat; 16 with pistols; two with rifles.	Ji sedî 62yê jinan bi çekên gulexwer hatine kuştin. Neh jin bi kêran hatine kuştin. Jinek hatiye xeniqandin. Gewriya jinekê hatiye birîn. 16 jin bi demanceyan û du jin bi tifekan hatine kuştin.
Five of the murders occurred on the street.	Pênc jin di nava kolaneyan de hatine kuştin.
24% of the women were killed by their husbands/boyfriends for attempting to break up/divorce; 10% by husbands of their daughters or sisters who attempted to break up/divorce.	Ji sedî 24ê jinên hatîn kuştin mêrê wan an jî destgirtiyê wwan ew kuştine.
One of the murderers had been convicted of murder in the past. Seven murderers committed suicide following the murders and two others attempted to commit suicide.	Yek ji qatilên jinan ji beriya hingê jî ji ber wî sûcî hatiye mehkûmkirin. Qatilê heft jinan piştî kuştina jinan xwe kuştine.
One man threw the corpse of the woman he killed in front of a police station. One man attached a note reading “We are going on vacation” and ran away following the murder.	Mêrekî piştî ku jina xwe kuşt termê wê avêtiye ber deriyê qereqolê. Mêrekê jî piştî jina xwe kuşt li ser deriyê xwe nivîsîye “em diçin betlaneyê” û reviyaye.
Rape	Tecawiz
Six rape cases were reported in the media in January.	Di Kanûna Paşiyê de nûçeyên şeş bûyerên tecawizê hatine nivîsîn.
Two of the rapists were the women’s fathers; one was a man she met on social media; one was a bus driver; one was a man she knew or was a friend; one was a stranger man.	Bavê du jinan tecawiz li wan kiriye. Jinekê mêrek ji medyaya civakî nas kiriye û wî mêrî tecawiz li wê kiriye. Nasê jinekê tecawiz li wê kiriye. Mêrekê nenasê jinekê tecawiz li wê kiriye.
Two of the rape incidents occurred in women’s houses; one in a vehicle; one in a hospital; one in a hotel; one on a bus.	Du bûyerên tecawizê li mala jinên tecawiz lê hatî kirin çêbûye. Bûyereka tecawizê di tirimbêlê de, bûyerek li nexweşxaneyê, bûyerek li otêlê, bûyerek di otobêsê de çêbûye.
One of the rapists was released on probation due to sexual harassment. One rapist had 48 criminal files including sexual crimes; he was being tried over three different sexual abuse cases.	Tecawizkarek ji berê ji ber bûyera destdirêjiyê hatiye girtin û dadgehê ew bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest berdaye. Tecawizkarekî jî li 48 bûyeran qeyda sûcdariya ji sûcên cinsî hebûye.
Five men were arrested following the rape incidents and one man was released on probation. Process about one man wasn’t covered by the media.	Piştî bûyerên tecawizê pênc mêr hatine girtin. Mêrek bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest hatiye berdan. Pêvajoya edlî ya ji bo mêrekê di nûçeyan de cih negirtiye.
Harassment	Destdirêjî
At least six women were harassed in January.	Di Kanûna Paşiyê de ya kêm destdirêjî li 6 jinan hatiye kirin.
Two harassers were convicted of the same crime. A criminal complaint was filed against one of them, yet, jurisdiction had taken no precaution.	Du kesên ku destdirêjî kiriye ji berê jî ji ber kirina wî sûcî qeyda wan a sûcdariyê hebûne.
One harasser was released by the court pending a trial; one was released on probation; a standoff warrant was issued for one; one couldn’t be captured. A woman’s husband killed a harasser who sneaked into her apartment; the woman was released on probation as the husband was arrested.	Giliya kesekê hatiye kirin lê ji bo astengkirina wî ti nehatiye kirin.
Half of the harassers were known to the women. Three women were harassed by stranger men; one by her chief at the workplace; one by a man she knew or was a friend of her.	Yek ji wan kesên destdirêjî kirî bêyî ku bê girtin tê dadkirin. Kesek bi şertê kontrola edlî serbest hatiye berdan. Biryara jêdûrmanê ji bo mêrekê hatiye dayin.
One was subjected to digital harassment; one to voyeurism; one to exhibitionism. One man sneaked into the apartment of a woman whom he sent harassing text messages. Two women were physically harassed.	Nîvê wan kesên destdirêjî kirîn nasên wan kesan bûne ku destdirêjî li wan kirine. Mêrên ne nasên sê jinan destdirêjî li wan kiriye. Cîranê jinekê destdirêjî lê kiriye. Mêrekê nasê hevalê jinekê destdirêjî li wê kiriye.
One of the harassment cases occurred on the street; one in a workplace; one on a ferry.	Bûyereka destdirêjiyê li kolanan, bûyerek li kargehekê û bûyerek jî di kargehekê de pêk hatiye.
The cities in which the harassment cases occurred were Adana (1), Diyarbakır (1), İstanbul (2), İzmir (1) and Kayseri (1).	Bajarên bûyerên destdirêjiyê lê hatine kirin Edene (1), Amed (1), Stenbol (2), Izmîr (1) Qeyserî (1)
Child abuse	Îstismara zarokan
63% of the girls were abused by teachers: 11 girls were abused by high-school teachers, one by her secondary-school teacher; five by vice principals; one by her classmate’s father; one by her father; one by her grandfather; one by her neighbor; one by a shuttle driver; one by a man she met on social media; two by stranger men. Identities of two men weren’t reported in the media.	Ji sedî 63yê keçên zarok ên îstismar li wan hatiye kirin, dersdarên wan îstismar li wan kiriye. Dersdarên lîseyan îstismar li 11 zarokan kiriye. Dersdarê xwendina navê destdirêjî li keçekê kiriye. Cihgirên birêvebirên dibistanan îstismar li pênc keçan kiriye, bavê hevala keçekê, du mêrên ne nasên du keçan destdirêjî li wan kiriye.
Three girls’ being abused was brought to light by teachers at the schools.	Dersdarên dibistanan eşkere kirine ku sê zarokên keç tê îstismarkirin.
Violence-injury	Tûndkarî û birîndarkirin
Men injured/inflicted violence on 23 women in January. Four men injuring women are being charged of attempted willful murder.	Mêran tûndkarî li 23 jinan kiriye/ew birîndar kirine. Doza bi qesta kuştinê birîndarkirina mirovan li çar mêran hatiye vekirin ku wan çar jin birîndar kiribûn.
43% of the women were subjected to violence by their husbands and boyfriends: One woman was subjected to violence by her father; one by her ex-husband; one by her ex-boyfriend; one by her husband of religious marriage; eight by husbands; one by her neighbor; one by her client; two by sons; one by a bus driver assistant; one by her boyfriend; one by a man she knew.	Ji sedî 43yê wan kesên tûndkarî lê hatiye kirin, mêrê wan an jî destgirtiyê wan tûndkarî li wan kiriye. Bave jinekê, mêrê berê yê jinekê, destgirtiyê berê yê jinekê, mêrê bi zewaca dînî bi jinekê re zewicî tûndkarî li wan kiriye. Mêrê heşt jinan tûndkarî li wan kiriye. destgirtiyê jinekê, simsarê otobûsekê, cîranê jinekê û mêrek nenas tûndkarî li jinan kirine.
Identities of four men injuring women weren’t mentioned.	Çar jin hatine birîndarkirin lê eşkere nebûye ka kê ew birîndar kirine.
29% of the violence-injury cases occurred in public places including a TV set, hospital, bus or the street.	Ji sedî 29ê bûyerên birîndarkirinê di nava kolanan de, li kargeha televizyonan, li nexweşxane û cihên civakî pêk hatiye.
Trans women constituted 17% of the women subjected to violence in January.	Du jinan ji ber ku xwestine ji mêrê xwe cida bibin tûndkarî li wan hatiye kirin.
One of the perpetrators was a security officer and another one was working as a religious officer at the office of mufti.	Yek ji kesên tûndkarî kirîn karmendê parastina ewlehiyê bûye. Kesek jî karmendê dînî bûye ku di miftîtîyê de kar kiriye.
The cities in which violence-injury cases occurred were Adana (1), Aksaray (2), Ankara (1), Antalya (1), Çanakkale (1), Edirne (1), Erzurum (1), İstanbul (2), İzmir (5), Kayseri (1), Kocaeli (3), Konya (1), Muğla (1), Samsun (1) and Zonguldak (1).	Bajarên ku nûçeyên tûndkariyê hatine nivîsîn: Edene (1), Aksaray (2), Enqere (1), Antalya (1), Çeneqele (1), Edirne (1), Erzurum (1), Stenbol (2), Izmîr (5), Qeyserî (1), Kocaeli (3), Konya (1), Mugla (1), Samsun (1) û Zonguldak (1).
Distribution by regions	Li gor herêman
In January the largest number of murders took place in İzmir province, followed by İstanbul and Trabzon.	Di meha Kanûna Paşiyê de herî zêde jin li Izmîrê hatine kuştin.
“We, the filmmakers of Turkey, who came together in the 67th Berlin Film Festival, are behind our very first call for peace. Therefore, we are calling for support from our colleagues all over the world to rise up the solidarity against censorship, oppression and war politics”.	"Em sînemagerên ji Tirkiyeyê yên ku li Mîhrîcana Fîlman a Berlînê ya 67an da gihane hev gotina xwe ya pêşiyê, banga aştiyê dubare dikin. Em bang dikin hemî hevpîşeyên xwe yên li dinyayê bila li dijî sansûr, zordarî û polîtîkayên şerî hev bigirin.
122 academics from Amsterdam University have made a call for solidarity with academics of Turkey via a statement they released.	122 akademîsyenên Zanîngeha Amsterdamê bi danezanek ve hevgiriya xwe ya ji bo akademîsyenên aştîxwaz diyar kirin.
“We, academics from the University of Amsterdam, are deeply concerned about the continued attacks on academic freedom and on critical academics in Turkey which the Turkish government has escalated in recent days.	Di wê danezana akademîsyenên ji Zanîngeha Amstedamê de wiha hat gotin:
“On February 10, the police used excessive force against students and faculty protesting the most recent decision of the government, using tear gas at close range, beating peaceful protesters and arresting several academics.	“Li Tirkiyeyê di van rojên dawî de hukimet zextên li akademîstenên aştîxwaz gelek zêde kiriye. Em weke akademîsyenên Zanîngeha Amstedamê ji vê yekê aciz in.
“In light of these alarming developments, we urge our colleagues at the University of Amsterdam and in the international academic community	“Em bang li akademiyaya navneteweyî dikin ku hesasiyet nîşanê van xalên li jêr bikin:
•   to stand in solidarity with their colleagues who have been dismissed and are under attack from their government and the police,	“Hukimet û polîs li dijî kademîsyenên aştîxwaz êriş pêk tînin û ew ji karên xwe jî hatine avêtin. Divê hevgiriya bi wan akademîsyenan re were xurtkirin.
•   to continue to express this solidarity publicly, and to persist in defending academic freedom whenever and wherever it comes under attack,	“Divê li her deverê hevgiriya bi wan akademîsyenên aştîxwaz re were berzkirin û her tim azadbûna akademiyê were parastin.
•   to support those political and civil society organizations in Turkey which protest the government’s increasingly oppressive policies,	“Divê ji bo şermezarkirina polîtîkayên zextê ku hukimeta Tirkiyeyê pêk tîne, çalakî were lidarxistin.
•   to provide institutional support for dismissed and threatened Turkish academics through visiting scholarships, emergency programs, and other means,	“Divê ji bo wan akademîsyenan piştgiriya aborî û xebatê were dayîn.
•   to urge our national governments and international organizations to fearlessly hold the Turkish government accountable for its persistent violations of human and civil rights, academic freedom and the rule of law.	“Li dijî hukimeta Tirkiyeyê ku hiqûqa navxweyî û navteweyî binpê dike, bi awayekî navneteweyî bertek were nîşan dan.”

Matthijs Jonker, Philosophy and Cultural Sciences	Matthijs Jonker, Philosophy and Cultural Sciences
11 of 59 HDP MPs remain behind bars	11 parlementerên HDPê girtî ne
HDP Co-Chairs Selahattin Demirtaş and Figen Yüksekdağ, Şırnak MPs Ferhat Encü, Leyla Birlik, Hakkari MPs Selma Irmak, Abdullah Zeydan, Diyarbakır MPs İdris Baluken, Nursel Aydoğan, Ziya Pir, İmam Taşçıer, Ankara MP Sırrı Süreyya Önder and Mardin MP Gülser Yıldırım were taken into custody on November 4. Yüksekdağ, Demirtaş, Baluken, Birlik, Irmak, Aydoğan, Yıldırım, Zeydan and Encü were arrested on the same day.	Hevserokên Giştî yên HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş û Figen Yuksekdag, Cîgirê Koma HDPê û Parlementerê Amedê Îdrîs Baluken, parlementerên bi navê Leyla Birlik, Selma Irmak, Nûrsel Aydogan, Gulser Yildirim, Ferhat Encu û Abdullah Zeydan di 4ê Mijdara 2016an de hatibûn girtin.
Pir, Taşçıer and Önder were later released on probation.	Parlementerê Colemêrgê Nihat Akdogan jî di 7ê Mijdarê de hatibû girtin.
HDP Hakkari MP Akdoğan was arrested on November 7.	Derbarêr Parlementerê Şirnexê Faysal Sariyildiz û Parlementera Wanê Tuba Hezer de jî biryara girtinê hatiye dayîn.
HDP Group Deputy Chair Çağlar Demirel and HDP Siirt MP Besime Konca were arrested on December 13, which increased the number of arrested HDP MPs to 12.	Cîgira Koma HDPê Çaglar Demirel û Parlementera Sêrtê Besîme Konca jî di 13ê Kanûnê de hatibûn girtin.
HDP İstanbul MP Filiz Kerestecioğlu and HDP Muş MP Ahmet Yıldırım were replaced for the arrested group deputy chairs. Şırnak MP Leyla Birlik was released on January 4, 2017.	Parlementera Şirnexê Leyla Birlik di 4ê Çileyê de hatibû tehliyekirin.
Baluken was discharged on January 30, 2017.	Parlementerê Amedê û Serokwekîlê Koma HDPê Îdrîs Baluken jî di 30ê Çileyê de hat tehliyekirin.
First released on probation after getting arrested, Adana MP Meral Danış Beştaş was taken into custody and arrested again on January 30, 2017 upon opposition by the Prosecutor's office.	Herî dawî Parlementera Edeneyê ya HDPê Meral Daniş Beşdaş di 31ê Çileyê de hat girtin.

Baluken had been arrested on November 4, 2016 and later released on January 30, 2017.	Baluken di 4ê Mijdarê de di encama operasyonên li dijî parlementerên HDPê de hatibû girtin û di 30ê Çileyê de jî hatibû tehliyekirin.

Dadgeha Cezayê Giran ya Amedê li ser îtîraza serdozgeriyê, derbarê Baluken de careke din biryara girtinê da.

A fire has broken out in Müjdat Gezen Art Center in İstanbul’s Kadıköy district.	Avahiya Navenda Çanda Mujdat Gezen ku li Stenbol Kadikoyê ye şewat pêk hat.
Bottles and plastic gloves were found in the garden and trash box of the building as a result of the fire extinguishing.	Piştî ku welatiyên derdor agahî dan agirkujan, şewat hat vemirandin. Piştî vê yeke li hewşa avahiyê lêkolîn hat kirin û hin şûşe û lepik hatin dîtin.
 Artist Müjdat Gezen told Sözcü newspaper it was an arson.	Mujdat Gezen derbarê mijarê de daxuyanî da û got ku keseke agir berdaye avaghiyê:
“It is an incident of arson. A man with beard crosses the street with a gas can and set [the building] on fire. The police work is ongoing. I hope it will be revealed as soon as possible”, Gezen said.	“Di dîmenan de jî dixwiyê ku bi zanetî agir berdane avahiyê. Kesekî rûdirêj, deste wî de vîdonek benzin heye, tê kolanê û agir berdide avahiya navenda çandê. Xebatên polîsan didome. Hêviya me ew e ku demeke nêz de ew kes were girtin.”
Müjdat Gezen Art Center was targeted by pro-government AKİT TV last week. (BK/TK)	Tê zanîn ku Navenda Çanda Mujdat Gezen hefteya borî di AKİT Tvyê de hedef hatibû nişandan.

Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) Adıyaman MP Behçet Yıldırım has been taken into custody.	 Polîsan parlamenterê Semsûrê yê Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP), Behçet Yildirim desteser kir.
According to the report of Di Haber (Dicle News Agency), Yıldırım was taken into custody and brought to the police station from Adıyaman Airport where he went for his flight to Ankara.	Li gor nûçeya DiHaberê, Yildirim li balafirgeha Semsûrê hatiye desteserkirin.
Adıyaman Public Chief Prosecutor's Office had drafted indictments under six different cases against Yıldırım. Warrant was issued to take Yıldırım forcibly to hearing as he did not appear before court for his hearing on February 17.	Serdozgeriya Semsûrê 6 lêpirsînên ji hev cida li ser Yildirimî vekiriye û diyar kiriye ji ber ku ew di 17ê Sibatê de beşdarî dadkirina xwe nebûye biryara desteserkirina wî hatiye dayin.
Yıldırım is being charged with "being a member of an [illegal] organization", "propagandizing for an [illegal] organization", "insulting state institutions" and "opposing to the Law on meetings and demonstrations".	Yildirim bi sûcên “endambûna rêxistinê” “propagandakirina ji bo rêxistinê û “sivikkirina dewletê” tê sûcdarkirin.

Having "Living Languages and Dialects" courses in the curriculum make it possible for younger generations to comprehend the importance of learning and being educated in their mother tongues, rights guaranteed in international conventions.	 Serdar Korucuyî li ser nivîsîna Ermenkî ya bi şêweyê Tircnakirî nivîsî. 13 of 59 HDP MPs are arrested	Ji 59 parlamenterên HDPyê, 12 parlamenter di girtîgehê de ne
As of February 21, 12 HDP MPs including the co-chairs of the party are arrested. The MPs behind bars are; Selahattin Demirtaş, Figen Yüksekdağ, Selma Irmak, Nursel Aydoğan, Gülser Yıldırım, Ferhat Encü, Nihat Akdoğan, Abdullah Zeydan, Çağlar Demirel, Besime Konca, Meral Danış Beştaş, Ayhan Bilgen and İdris Baluken.	Hevserokên wê jî tê de 12 parlamenterên HDPyê di girtîgehê de ne: Selahattin Demirtaş, Figen Yüksekdağ, Selma Irmak, Nursel Aydoğan, Gülser Yıldırım, Ferhat Encü, Nihat Akdoğan, Abdullah Zeydan, Çağlar Demirel, Besime Konca, Meral Danış Beştaş, Ayhan Bilgen.
Yüksekdağ, who has been under arrest since November 4, was sentenced to 10 months in prison for attending the funeral of the Marxist Leninist Communist Party’s (MLKP) Yasemin Çiftçi, who was killed by an improvised explosive device on February 13, 2012, a verdict the Supreme Court approved.	Hevseroka Giştî ya HDPê Fîgen Yuksekdag ji 4ê Mijdarê vir ve girtî ye. Ew di 13ê 2012an de ji ber ku beşdarê merasîma cenazeyê endamê MLKPê Yasemîn Çiftçi bûbû, derbarê wê de doz hatibû vekirin û 10 meh ceza lê hatibû dayîn. Dadgeha Bilind jî di 2ê Mijdara borî de cezayê derbarê wê de hatibû dayîn erê kiribû.
The court’s decisions regarding MPs are read aloud in the parliament, resulting in an MP being immediately stripped of his/her duties without a vote, per Constitution Article No. 84.	Îro bi tezkereya bi îmzeya Alîkarê Serokwezîr Nurettin Canikli li meclisê hat xwendin û parlementeriya Figen Yuksekdag hat betalkirin.
HDP Co-Chairs Selahattin Demirtaş and Figen Yüksekdağ, HDP Group Deputy Chair İdris Baluken and MPs Leyla Birlik, Selma Irmak, Nursel Aydoğan, Gülser Yıldırım, Ferhat Encü and Abdullah Zeydun were arrested after being detained on November 4, 2016.	Piştî ku parêzbendiya parlamenterên HDPyê hat betalkirin gelek parlamenterên HDPyê hatin desteserkirin û bi şertê kontrola edlî hatin serbestberdan. 13 parlamenter hatine girtin. Herî dawiyê parlamenteriya Yûksekdagê hat betalkirin.
