On May 29, 2017, HDP Siirt MP Besime Konca was detained in Batman and arrested by the court he was brought to.	Di 28ê Kanûna Paşiyê ya 2017ê de, parlamentera HDPyê ya Edeneyê Meral Daniş Beştaş hat girtin û di heman rojê de hat serbestberdan.
On August 2, 2017, HDP Van MP Lezgin Botan was taken into custody in Van Airport.	Dadgeha Cezayî ya Bazidê 5 meh cezayê girtinê da Selahattîn Demîrtaşî.
The trial of the closed Özgür Gündem's Editors-in-Chief on Watch Ertuğrul Mavioğlu, Faruk Eren, Celal Başlangıç, Ömer Ağın, İhsan Çaralan, Celalettin Can, Fehim Işık and Öncü Akgül has continued.	Rojnamegerên bi navê Ertugrul Mavioglu, Faruk Eren, Celal Başlangiç, Omer Agin, Îhsan Çaralan, Celalettin Can, Fehîm Işik û Oncu Akgul ku beşdarê kampanyaya hevgiriya bi Ozgur Gundemê re bûbûn derbarê wan de bi îdiaya ‘propagandaya rêxistinê kirine’ doz hatibû vekirin û duh rûniştina dozê hat kirin.
The prosecutor demanded that the file of Özgür Gündem Managing Editor İnan Kızılkaya be seperated from the file of the eight journalists and combined with the Özgür Gündem main file seen by 23rd Heavy Penal Court.	Di rûniştinê de dozger mutalaya xwe diyar kir û xwest ku dosyeya Mudirê Karên Nivîsan ê Ozgur Gundemê Înan Kizilkaya were cudakirin û tevli doza sereke ya Ozgur Gundemê were kirin.
What happened?	Çi bûbû?
Closed Özgür Gündem newspaper's Editor-in-Chief on Watch campaign was launched on May 3, 2016 and ended on August 7, 2016.56 people joined the campaign.	Piştî 24ê Tîrmeha 2015ê pevçûnan dest pê kir, gelek doz li Ozgûr Gûndemê hatin vekirin. Li hemberî zordariyan Ozgûr Gûndemê Kampanyaya Nobedariya Berpirsiyariya Weşanê da dest pê kirin.
50 of the attendees faced prosecution. Of the prosecuted, files of the 36 have been turned into cases.	Doza ''propagandaya rêxistina terorî'' li wan kesên ku ji bo rojekê bûbûn berpirsên weşanê, hat vekirin.
Of the 36 Editors-in-Chief on Watch, Erol Önderoğlu, Ahmet Nesin and Şebnem Korur Fincancı were arrested in June 2016 and released 10 days after it.	Sê kesên beşdariya kampanyayê kiribûn; berpirsê Tirkiyeyê yê Rojnamegerên Sînornenas, Erol Onderoglû, seroka Weqfa Mafên Mirovan a Tirkiyeyê, Şebnem Korûr Fîncanci û nivîskar Ahmet Nesîn ji bo demekê hatin girtin.
Cases of Önderoğlu, Korur-Fincancı and Nesin have been combined.	Di 16ê Tebaxê de Dadgeha Cezayên Sûlhê ya 8. biryara girtina Ozgûr Gûndemê da.
Cases of Ragıp Duran and Ayşe Düzkan have been combined.	Di 19ê Tebaxê de, Asli erdogan a nivîskara Ozgûr Gûndemê û endama Lijneya Şêwirmendên Weşanê hat girtin.
Non-prosecution verdict was issued for 11 of the 50 Editors-in-Chief on Watch.	Di 22yê Tebaxê de Zana Kayayê berpirsê weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê û berpirsê naveroka nivîsan Inan Kizilkaya hatin girtin.
50 people against whom lawsuit was filed are as follows:	Derbarê 50 rojnamegerên Nobedarên Weşanê de lêpirsîn dan destpêkirin û derbarê 39 rojnamegeran de jî doz hat vekirin.
11 non-prosecution	(EA/ÇT/YO)
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Co-Chair Selahattin Demirtaş has been sentenced to 5 months in prison.	Dadgehê bi sûcê “sivikkirina qedirgiranîya gelê Tirk, Dewleta Komara Tirkiyeyê û organên wê” 5 meh cezayê girtinê da Selahattîn Demîrtaşî.
Demirtaş was tried over a speech he made at Newroz celebration in Ağrı’s province of Doğubeyazıt. “We are on the side of dialogue and peaceful solutions. Our doors are open to anyone willing to negotiate any matter. However, if anyone tries to hit our hand which lend for peace with a club, we take that club and hit them in their heads. They should also know this”, Demirtaş had said.	Demîrtaş ji Girtîgeha Cûrreyê Fyê ya Edirneyê bi SEGBISê(Sîstema Peywendîdanê ya bi Deng û Dîmenan) beşdarî dadkirina xwe ya li Dadgeha Bazidê tê birêvebirin bû.
Özgür Gelecek Newspaper editor-in-chief Aslı Ceren Aslan has been arrested in Turkey's southeastern Urfa province.	Mudira Karên Nivîsan ya Rojnameya Ozgur Gelecekê Asli Ceren Aslan li Rihayê hat girtin.
The daily reported yesterday (February 21) that Aslan was arrested four days after being taken into custody on February 9 in Urfa.Aslan was in Urfa to follow up the latest developments in Syria and Rojava.	Aslan bi “îxlalkirina xeta sînor” û “endamdita rêxistinê” hat sûcdarkirin, lê wê van sûcan red kirin. Wê ragihand ku ji bo şopandina nûçeyan hewl daye ku ji sînor derbas bibe.
Charges of "border violation" and "illegal organization"	“Dema binçavkirinê hat tazîkirin û derbkirin”
Aslan, arrested for "border violation" and "being a member of an [illegal] organization"has denied the charges and stated that she had been trying to cross the borders while trying to perform her journalistic duties related to keep abreast of the latest developments in the region.Order to strip naked for examination and beating in detention.	Parêzerê Aslan Kubra Gunduz derbarê mijarê de ji bianetê re axivî û got: “Asla n dema karê xwe yê rojnamegeriyê pêkdianî, ji ber îxlalkirina xeta sînor hat binçavkirn. Herçiqas ku ti delîl nebe jî,  derbarê wê de bi îdiaya ‘endamê rêxistinê ye’ biryara girtinê hat dayîn.”
Charges have been pressed against Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) Diyarbakır MP Altan Tan for five different crimes. Tan faces from 17.5 to 38.5 years in prison.	Derbarê Parlementerê Amedê yê HDPê Altan Tan de bi îdiaya 5 sûcan doz hat vekirin û heta 38,5 salan ceza tê xwestin.
Tan was taken into custody and later released on probation as a part of the investigation run by Diyarbakır Chief Public Prosecution. Diyarbakır 5th High Criminal Court has approved the 304-pages indictment about Tan.	 Altan Tan bi sûcên “avakirin û rêvekirina rêxistina terorî”, “di bûyerên 6-7ê Cotmehê de tehrîkirina ji bo sûcê”, “muxalefeta li dijî qanûna 2911”, “propagandakirina rêxistina terorî” tê sûcdarkirin û heta 38,5 salan ceza ji bo wî tê xwestin.

Vice Prime Minister Veysi Kaynak has declared that the matter of conferring citizenship to the Syrians will considered after April 16, which is the date of constitutional amendment referendum.	Di 16ê Nîsanê de ji bo Makeqanûna nû referandûm dê bê kirin.
“We don’t want to overshadow the April 16”, Kaynak said.	Cihgirê serokwezîrî, Veysî Kaynakî eşkere kir ku heta 16ê Nîsanê ji bo welatîyan mafê welatîbûnê dê neyê dayin.
Kaynak stated that around 80,000 Syrians from different cities have been established at the first stage, and that the governorships informed that Ministry of Interior of these families.	Kaynakî eşkere kir ku di pêngava pêşiyê de ji bo 20 hezar welatiyan mafê welatîbûnê dê bê dayin. Li ser hev 80 hezar welatiyên Sûriyeyê dê mafê welatîbûna Tirkiyeyê bistînin.
Governor Şahin: The files are in Ankara	Walî dosya li Enqereyê ne
Stating that conferring citizenship to the Syrians in İstanbul has already begun, İstanbul Governor Vasip Şahin announced that files concerning 2,000 Syrians have been sent to capital city of Ankara.	Waliyê Stenbolê, Vasîp Şahînî eşkere kir ku wan ji bo 2 hezar malbatên welatiyên Sûriyeyê dest bi dayina mafê welatîbûnê kiriye û wan dosyeyên pêwîst ji bo Enqereyê şandine.
“As many as 540,000 Syrians reside in İstanbul. The files for 2,000 qualified families of those have been sent to the ministry.	 “Li Stenbolê nêzîkî  540 welatiyên Sûriyeyî dijîn.
“The ministry will decide to whether confer citizenship”.	“Dosye ji bo Enqereyê hatine şandin.
Journalist Şifa Gerdi, the Rûdaw TV’s Output Director, has lost her life in an explosion during coverage of the operation going on against Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) in Syrian city of Mosul.	Şîfa Gerdîya rojnameger dema ku ji bo çêkirina nûçeyan li Mûsilê bû, di teqînekê de miriye.
Cameraman Yunus Mustafa has been also injured in the explosion.	Berpirsa Outputê ya Rûdaw TVyê di teqînê de mir û Yûnûs Mûstafayê kamêreman di heman teqînê de birîndar bû.
Gerdi lost her life by a bomb being detonated, Rudaw reported.	Rûdawê bi daxuyaniyekê eşkere kiriye ku Şîfa Gerdî bi teqîna teqemeniyeka çandî miriye.
Who is Şifa Gerdi?	Şîfa Gerdî kî ye?
Born in 1986, Gerdi graduated from Computer Technical Institute in 2006 and Selahaddin University in 2013.	Di sala 1996ê de Xwedê daye. Di sala 2006ê de wê xwendina xwe ya li Enstîtûya Teknîkên Kompîteran temam kir. Di sala 2013ê de xwendina li Beşa Ragihandinê ya Zanîngeha Selahedînî temam kir.
Starting journalism in 2006, Gerdi worked as a teacher in addition to practicing journalism from 2007 to 2010.	Wê di sala 2006ê de dest bi rojnamegeriyê kiriye. Di salên 2007-2010ê de wê digel rojnamegeriyê dersdêrî jî kiriye.
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Urfa MP İbrahim Ayhan has been detained at Urfa Airport. Ayhan has been released following the prosecution questioning.	Parlementerê Rihayê yê HDPê Îbrahîm Ayhan îro di saetên sibehê de dema diçû Enqereyê li Balafirgeha Rihayê hat binçavkirin.
A detention warrant was issued for Ayhan as part of an investigation launched due to a speech he made in Turkey’s southeastern Şırnak province.	Hat ragihandin ku polîsan Îbrahîm Ayhan birine Mudiriyeta Emniyeta Rihayê.
The detention warrant was issued on the grounds that Ayhan didn't attend the third hearing of a trial in which he is tried over a post he shared on his social media account, according to DİHABER.	Derbarê Ayhan de ji ber axavtineke wî yê li Şirnexê lêpirsîn dabûn destpêkirin û piştre derbarê wî de biryara girtinê hatibû derxistin.

Before his appointment with Prime Minister Binali Yıldırım, President of the Iraqi Kurdistan Regional Government Masoud Barzani has met with Mardin Metropolitan co-Mayor Ahmet Türk, who has been discharged from office by a statutory decree, and Ağrı co-Mayor Sırrı Sakık.	Serokê Herêma Kurdistana Iraqê, Mesûd Barzanî digel hevserokê berê yê Şaredariya Mêrdînê Ahmet Turk û hevşaredarê Şaredariya Agiriyê, Sirri Sakikî civîya.
"Everybody is concerned"	“Her kes di fikarê de ne”
"Our priority is to get the country out of this see of blood, what can we do? Everybody is concerned that a new bloody period would start with the beginning of spring.	“Tiştê ji beriya hertiştî em lê difikirin ev e: Ka em ê vî welatî çawa ji vê rewşê derbêxin. Her di fikarê de ne ku bi hatina biharê çêdibe pêvajoyeka dî ya herikîna xwînê dest pê bike.
"The Kurds in Turkey have been experiencing this for a long time. Barzani is an actor who has both a good communication with the government and is respected in the public opinion".	“Hem dîyalogeka baş a Barzanî digel hiikûmetê heye hem jî di civakê de hirmeta wî tê girtin.
"How to get back to the spirit of 2013?"	“Ew gihane aştiyê divê em jî bigihinê.
"We have talked about the fact that Kurdish politicians, co-chairs, MPs, mayors, political party leaders should come to get back on their duty and how they could get out of jail.	“Ji 2013ê ve Barzanî kesek e ku alîkarîya wî gihaye pêvajoyê. di vê demê de dîsa li welatê me pevçûn hene. Hin erkên Barzanîyî çêdibin.
The Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) has filed a criminal complaint upon Minister of Interior Süleyman Soylu’s statements against HDP co-Chair Selahattin Demirtaş on charges of “defaming” and inciting people to animosity and hostility”.	HDPê derbarê Suleyman Soylu de ji ber gotinên wî yên derheqê Serokê Giştî yê HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş de gilîname da. Gotinên Soylu di çarçoveya ‘heqaret’ û ‘gel tehrîkê sûckirin û dijminatiyê dike’ ve hat gilîkirin.
In the statement made concerning the complaint, the HDP said “Soylu used ugly remarks against HDP co-Chair Selahattin Demirtaş in a meeting in Erzurum”.	HDPê derbarê gilîkirinê de daxuyanî da û got: “Soylu di civîneke ku li Erziromê beşdar bûbû de derbarê Hevserokê Giştî yê HDPê Selahattîn Demirtaş de gotinên nebaş û neheq aniye ziman.”
Demirtaş has been behind bars in Edirne Type F Prison since November 4, 2016.	Selahattîn Demirtaş ji 4ê Mijdara 2016an vir ve li Girtîgeha Tîpa F ya Edirneyê girtî ye.
What had Soylu said?	Soylu çi gotibû?
“The so-called human Demirtaş calls people to the squares to provoke people against each other”, Minister Soylu had said in a speech he made at New Turkey Conference (Yeni Türkiye Konferansı) held in Necip Fazıl Kısakürek Cultural Center in Erzurum on February 23.	Wezîrê Karên Hundir Suleyman Soylu di 23ê Sibatê de li Erziromê di konferansê de axivîbû û derbarê Selahattîn Demirtaş de wiha gotibû: “Ew Demirtaşê ku qaşû camêr e, ji bo gel lihev bide kuştin, wan bangê meyadanan dike.”
Soylu also claimed that the HDP had put pressure on people at the ballots.	“Bila ev referandum xelas bibe, ka hûn bibînin dê çi bibe.”

Vice Prime Minister and Government Spokesperson Numan Kurtulmuş issued a press conference yesterday (February 27).	Cihgirê serokwezîrî û berdevkê hikûmetê Nûman Kûrtûlmûş duhî piştî civîna dîwana wezîran axivî.
Kurtulmuş made comments on an article entitled “The headquarters is disturbed / Seven Responses to Seven Questions” by Hande Fırat from Hürriyet newspaper.	Kûrtûlmûş li ser nûçeya Hurriyetê ya “serokerkanî aciz e” got welê dixweyî ku hinek ji hevkariya desthilata siyasî û leşkerî aciz in.
The article included seven criticisms directed against the Turkish Armed Forces (TSK) and seven responses given by an anonymous source.	Li gor nûçeyê çavkaniyeka/ê navê xwe nedayî bersiva heft rexneyên li Serokerkaniya Leşkerî hatî kirin daye.
“Turkey is not the old Turkey anymore”	Hurriyetê heta niho bersivek nedaye.
About the headline of the newspaper, Kurtulmuş said:	Serokwezîrê Bînalî Yildirim got: “Bi sernivîsan hewil didin eyarên hikûmetê biguherin.”
“It looks as there are some who is disturbed by the Turkish Armed Forces working in harmony with civil will and government in Turkey.	Wezîrê dadê jî li ser nûçeyê gotibû: “Ti kes û hêz nikarin eyarên Parlemana Tirkiyeyê û gelê tirk biguhere.”
“It is not possible anymore to regulate neither Turkish Armed Forces, nor civil will and government of Turkey.	“Tirkiye ne Tirkiyeya berê ye. Ji ber vê yekê divê her kesan hay ji gotinên xwe hebin.
Die Welt Turkey Correspondent Deniz Yücel kept in custody for 13 days in İstanbul Security Department has been arrested yesterday (February 27) for "propagandizing for an [illegal] organization and inciting people to hatred and hostility.	Nûçegihanê Tirkiyeyê yê Die Weltê, Denîz Yûce 13 roj bûn ku li navenda polîsan desteserkirî bû, dadgehê duhî bi sûcê “propagandaya ji bo rêxistinê û ji bo dijminî û kîndariyê tehrîkkirina gelî” biryara girtina wî da.
Yücel was taken into custody on February 14 in İstanbul as he wanted to testify to the investigation units regarding an article he had written about RedHack hacking the personal e-mail account of Minister of Energy Berat Albayrak.	Yûce di 14ê Sibatê de ji ber nivîseka wî hatibû desteserkirin. Wî nivîsek li ser E- Maîlên wezîrê enerjiyê, Berat Albayrakî nivîsîbû ku RedHeckê bi destxistibûn.
Tunca Öğreten, Ömer Çelik and Mahir Kanat are also arrested as a part of the same investigation.	Ji ber heman lêpirsînê Tunca Ogreten, Omer Çelîk û Mahîr Kanat jî hatine girtin.
Yücel questioned about his reports	Çi bûbû?
During Yücel's testimony, his journalist colleagues and Republican People's Party (CHP) MP Sezgin Tanrıkulu also appeared at the courthouse.	Li gor nûçeya Sabahê ya di 25ê Kanûna Pêşiyê de hatî nivîsîn, di heman rojê de 9 rojnameger hatine desteserkirin lê ji ber ku Denîz Yûce li derveyî welatî ye nehatiye desteserkirin.
Sibel Çapraz, arrested since March 2, 2016 was released by court in today's (February 28) hearing. The court has decided to put Çapraz under house arrest.	Sîbel Çapraz di 2yê Adara 2016ê de, birîndar bûbû û bi wî halî hatibû desteserkirin û girtin. Çapraz dê îro ji girtîgehê bê derêxistin.
Prosecution demanded punishment over "membership to an illegal organization"	Dozgerî xwest ji ber “endametiyê” ceza bê dayin
In the hearing held before Yüksekova High Criminal Court, Prosecutor Mithat Öz demanded that Çapraz be convicted of "being a member of a terrorist organization (Article 314/2 Turkish Criminal Code).	Dadkirina Sîbel Çaprazê li Dadgeha Cezayê Giran a Geverê hat birêvebirin. Dozgerî xwest ji bo Çaprazê bi endambûna rêxistinê ceza jê re bê dayin.
What had happened?	Çi bûbû?
Çapraz firstly stayed in Bakırköy Closed Women Prison, then transferred to İzmir Menemen Type R Prison on June 30. She was transferred to Bakırköy Prison in İstanbul on June 30.	Cihgira serokê giştî yê Dîwana birêvebiriya Colemêrgê, Sîbel Çapraz di meha Ciriya Paşiyê de beşdarî xwenîşandana derêxistina dengan bûbû.

Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP) û Partiya Herêman a Demokratîk(DBP) eşkere kir ku ew ê şahiya pîrozkirina Newrozê wek kampanyaya “Na”yê bi kar bîne.  
The celebrations, which will be organized over 30 centers, will be combined with “No” campaign due to the fact that it falls ahead of the constitutional amendment referendum to be held on April 16.	Newroz dê li zêdetirî 30 navendan bê pîrozkirin.

A lawsuit has been filed demanding up to 21 years in prison on three charges against Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Ağrı MP Leyla Zana.	Dozgeriya Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a 5. a Amedê xwest parlamentera HDPyê ya Agirîyê, Leyla Zana 21 salan di girtîgehê de bimîne.
Among the accusations were Zana doing victory sign, going to the building of Democratic Society Congress (DTK) and her speech at March 8 International Women’s Day.	Li gor nûçeya Dihaberê bi sûcên nîşandana cotên tiliyan(îşareta biserketinê) çûna Kongreya Civakên Demokratîk û axiftina di 8ê Adarê, Roja Jinan de, ji bo Zanayê lêpirsîn hatine vekirin.
Zana was detained in Diyarbakır on February 8 and was released on probation by the Criminal Judgeship of Peace on Duty following the prosecution questioning.	Polîsan di 8ê Sibatê de Leyla Zana desteser kiribû, dozgeriyê îfadeya wê standibû û dadgeriyê bi şertê kontrola edlî biryara serbestberdana wê dabû.
The indictment seeks from 8 to 21 years in prison on charges of “being a member of an armed terror group”, “opposing to law on demonstrations and meetings by not dispersing despite police warning”, “praising crime and criminal”.	Di îdianameyê de, sûcên “endambûna rêxistina çekdar a terorî” “bêçek beşdariya civîn û xwenîşandana neqanûnî” “pesindariya sûc û sûcdaran.
Who is Leyla Zana?	Çi bûbû? 
She entered parliament as Social Democratic Populist Party Diyarbakır MP following an election campaign which saw a huge support from the women in the southeastern region in general elections in 1991.	Di 4ê Çiriya Paşiyê de, hevserokên Partiya Gelan a Demokratîk(HDP), Selahattîn Demîrtaş û Fîgen Yûksekdag, berdevkê HDPyê Îdrîs Balûken û parlamenterên HDPyê Leyla Bîrlîk, Selma Irmak, Nursel Aydogan, Gûlser Yildirim, Ferhat Encû û Abdullah Zeydan hatin girtin.

Journalist Erdem Mühirci has been released on probation in the first hearing of his trial.	Di 21ê Kanûna Pêşiyê de Erdem Mûhîrcî hatibû girtin. Mûhîrcî îro bi şertê kontrola edlî hat tehlîyekirin.
The hearings in the trial of eight people including Erdem Mühirci, the arrested journalist of DİHA (Dicle News Agency) which was closed by a statutory decree issued under the State of Emergency (OHAL) have begun.	Bi Rewşa Awarte, Biryarnameyên di Hikmê Qanûnan de hatin derêxistin, bi biryarnameyekê Ajansa Nûçeyan a Dîcleyê hat girtin. Erdem Mûhîrcî jî tê de 8 xehatkarên Dîcleyê hat girtin.
The above mentioned eight people arrested on charges of "being a member of an [illegal] organization" and "aiding and abetting an [illegal] organization" were released on probation in the first hearing of their trial held before Van 2nd High Criminal Court.	Doz li Dadgeha 2. a Cezayên Giran a Wanê hat birêvebirin. Di rûniştina yekem de, Erdem Mûhîrcî bi şertê kontrola edlî hat serbestberdan. Mûhîrcî bi sûcên “endambûna rêxistinê” û “piştgirî û cihdana rêxistinê” dihat sûcdarkirin.
Mühirci: I will continue writing	Mûhîrcî: Ez ê berdewam binivîsim
Pointing out to the rights violations he experienced in prison lately, Mühirci after his release said;	Erdem Mûhîrcîyî eşkere kir ku di girtîgehan de girtî di halê gelek xerab de ne. Wî got ew ê ji bo nivîsînê berdewam be.(EA/MB)

Bolaç: The arrest was a mistake from the beginning	Dadgeha Stenbolê ya Cezayên giran a 5. biryara serbestberdana wî da.

Modekar Barbaros Şansal di vîdeoya li ser twitterê parve kiribû de wiha digot: “Îro ev qas rojnameger girtî ne, ev qas zarok tên tecawîzkirin û tacîzkirin, ev qas pêkanînên nerêtî û ruşwetê hene û serhişkan li kolanan behsa qirêjiyê dikin. Ka hûn sala nû pîroz dikin gelo?”

Peoples' Democratic Party (HDP) women MPs have announced they will join the March 8 International Women's Day strike.	Parlamenterên HDPyê eşkere kir ku ew ê di 8ê Adarê de beşdarî greva jinan bibin.
The call for a strike came from Argentina, where women rallied around the "Solidarity is our weapon". To date, women from over 30 countries plan to participate in the International Women's Strike (IWS).	Jinên Arjantînê gotibûn “çeka me hevgiriya me ye” û bangî hemî jinên dinyayê kiribû ku ew beşdarî Greva Jinan a Navneteweyî bibin.
HDP İstanbul MP Filiz Kerestecioğlu announced that women MPs will "take a break at the parliament" on March 8 and noted:	Ji 30ê zêdetir welatan jin dê beşdarî Greva Jinan a Navneteweyî (International Women’s Strike, IWS) bibin.
"Take a break at the Parliament on March 8! We know that the world is in a crisis at the moment, but we refuse to be the victims of this crisis".	Fîlîz Kerestecîoglûya parlamentera HDPyê eşkere kir ku jinên HDPyî dê di 8ê Adarê de beşdarî grevê bibin û neçin parlamenê.

The permission granted for the meeting in which Minister of Justice Bekir Bozdağ would give a speech regarding the constitutional amendment referendum this night in Gaggenau province Baden-Württemberg state of Germany has been cancelled.	Wezîrê dadê dê li bajarê Gaggenauyê yê Almanyayê beşdarî civînekê bibûya, rayedarên bajarî pêşiyê ji bo civînê destûr da, paşê destûr betal kir.
The reason for the cancellation was announced as the lack of capacity of the hall.	Civîn dê şeva dî bihatiya kirin. Rayedaran diyar kirin ku ji ber salon biçûk e destûra hatî dayin hatiye betalkirin.
About the arrest of journalist Deniz Yücel, Bozdağ had said “It is the decision of the independent courts”.	Bozdagî ji bo girtina rojnamegerê almanî-tirk gotibû: “Biryara dadgehên bêalî ye.”
Statement by Vice PM Kurtulmuş	Daxuyaniya Nûman Kûrtûlmûşî
Following the banning of Bozdağ’s meeting in Germany, first statement was issued by Vice Prime Minister Numan Kurtulmuş. Kurtulmuş said:	Li ser betalkirina civînê, cihgirê serokwezîrî Nûman Kûrtûlmûşî gotiye.
“The meetings to be organized in Germany didn’t bear an intention of affecting Germany’s domestic politics. In a democratic country, such a ban is unacceptable in principle. The ways should be paved for both yes and no [campaigns]. These are the requirements of democracy. If you are not going to organize meetings, how will you call people to vote”.	“Ew civîna dê li Almanyayê bihatiya kirin, ne yek ji wan civînan e ku bandorê li sîyaseta navxweyî ya wî welatî bike. Betalkirina wê civînê ji bo welatek demokratîk wek prensîp nayê qebûlkirin.”
The meeting had drawn reactions	Mîtînga li Vîyanayê ya di 2014ê de
In reaction to Germany not granting permission to the meeting which Minister of Justice Bekir Bozdağ would attend Minister of Foreign Affairs Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu has said “This has become a systematical practice of the German deep state”.	Wezîrê dadê Bekir Bozdag dê li Almanyayê beşdarî civînekê bibûya lê civîn hat betalkirin. Li ser vê yekê wezîrê karên derve Mevlûd Çavûşoglûyî got “karekê sîstematîk ê dewleta kûr a Almanyayê ye.”
Çavuşoğlu also mentioned that President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan’s meeting about July 15 coup attempt was prevented as well.	“Ev tevgera Almanyayê bi rastî ne li gor mafê xweîfadekirinê, demokrasîyê an jî mafê kombûnê ye. “
“You grant permission to terror leaders but not Turkey’s President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. There is no way to explain it”.	Çavûşoglûyî da zanîn ku ji bo mîtînga Recep Tayyîp Erdoganê serokkomar jî destûr nehatibû dayin ku beşdarî civîneka li ser 15ê Tîrmehê bibe.
 “Now, especially the municipalities have started to cancel the meetings. This is no coincidence. This has become a systematical practice of the German deep state.	“Bi taybetî şaredarî van civînan betal dikin. Ev ne tesedifî ne. Dewleta kûr a Almanyayê bi awayekê sîstematîk vî karî dike.
“You need to see us equal partners. Turkey is not a country under your command. You are not the boss of Turkey.	“Hûn mecbûr in me wekhev bibînin. Tirkiye ne welatekê di bin fermana we de ye. Hûn ne çîna yekem û em çîna duyem in.
“If you want to work with us, you have to learn how to treat us”.	“Heke hûn bi me re kar bikin Hûn mecbûr in hîn bibin ka tevgerên we yên bi me re divê çawa bin.”
What happened?	Çi bûbû? 
The permission granted for the meeting in which Minister of Justice Bekir Bozdağ would give a speech regarding the constitutional amendment referendum this night in Gaggenau province Baden-Württemberg state of Germany was cancelled.	Wezîrê dadê dê li bajarê Gaggenauyê yê Almanyayê beşdarî civînekê bibûya, rayedarên bajarî pêşiyê ji bo civînê destûr da, paşê destûr betal kir.
The reason for the cancellation was announced as the lack of capacity of the hall.	Civîn dê şeva dî bihatiya kirin. Rayedaran diyar kirin ku ji ber salon biçûk e destûra hatî dayin hatiye betalkirin.
About the arrest of journalist Deniz Yücel, Bozdağ had said “It is the decision of the independent courts”.	Bozdagî ji bo girtina rojnamegerê almanî-tirk gotibû: "Biryara dadgehên bêalî ye."
The meeting had drawn reactions	Daxuyaniya Nûman Kûrtûlmûşî
Bozdağ’s planned visit to Germany drew reactions from various parties’ administrators as well as social media users.	Li ser betalkirina civînê, cihgirê serokwezîrî Nûman Kûrtûlmûşî gotiye.
Social media users launched a campaign calling for to not Bozdağ be permitted to enter Germany.	"Ew civîna dê li Almanyayê bihatiya kirin, ne yek ji wan civînan e ku bandorê li sîyaseta navxweyî ya wî welatî bike. Betalkirina wê civînê ji bo welatek demokratîk wek prensîp nayê qebûlkirin."
Concerning the matter, German Minister of Justice Heiko Maas said:	Mîtînga li Vîyanayê ya di 2014ê de
“The Turkish politicians to attend meetings in Germany should very well know of how freedom of the press and expression is important for us. And those who demand freedom of expression should themselves be able to ensure freedom of the press”. (YY/TK)	Di 2014ê de, Recep Tayyîp Erdoganî ji bo hilbijartina serokkomarîyê li Vîyanayê mîtîngek pêk anibû. Piştî mîtîngê piştevanên AKPyê û mûxalifên wê şer kiribûn.(YY/MB) 
Die Welt daily's arrested journalist Deniz Yücel has written a letter from prison.	Nûnerê Tirkiyeyê yê Die Weltê ji girtîgehê li ser rewşa xwe nameyek nivîsî.
Writing the letter during a visit by his attorneys in prison, Yücel has thanked everyone who has been supporting him.	Dema parêzer çûyîn serdana wî, wî name nivîsîye.
Yücel's letter published in the news website of Deutsche Welle reads as follows:	Li gor Deutsche Wlleyê Yûcelî li ser nameyê ev rêzik nivîsîne.
 	 
"Hello World,	"Merheba Dinya
Sincerely,	bi hestên ji dilî...
Deniz	Denîz"
What had happened?	Çi bûbû?
Diken news website editor Tunca Öğreten, DİHABER (Dicle News Agency) Diyarbakır Bureau Chief editor Ömer Çelik and correspondent Metin Yoksu, Yolculuk (Journey) newspaper Editor-in-Chief Eray Sargın, BirGün daily Executive Official Mahir Kanaat were taken into custody on December 24, 2016 in house raids.	Nûçegihanê Tirkiyeyê yê Die Weltê, Denîz Yûce 13 roj bûn ku li navenda polîsan desteserkirî bû, dadgehê bi sûcê “propagandaya ji bo rêxistinê û ji bo dijminî û kîndariyê tehrîkkirina gelî” biryara girtina wî da.
Of the above mentioned, Diken news site editor Öğreten, DİHA Diyarbakır News Director Çelik, BirGün daily executive Kanaat were arrested for "being a member of an [illegal] organization after 24 days in detention.	Yûce di 14ê Sibatê de ji ber nivîseka wî hatibû desteserkirin. Wî nivîsek li ser E- Maîlên wezîrê enerjiyê, Berat Albayrakî nivîsîbû ku RedHeckê bi destxistibûn.
DİHA correspondent Metin Yoksu, Yolculuk newspaper Editor-in-Chief Sargın and ETHA executive Okatan were released.According to pro-government Sabah daily reporting about the house raids, Deniz Yücel was abroad at the time of the house raids conducted as a part of an investigation into nine journalists. (EKN/DG)	Ji ber heman lêpirsînê Tunca Ogreten, Omer Çelîk û Mahîr Kanat jî hatine girtin.Li gor nûçeya Sabahê ya di 25ê Kanûna Pêşiyê de hatî nivîsîn, di heman rojê de 9 rojnameger hatine desteserkirin lê ji ber ku Denîz Yûce li derveyî welatî ye nehatiye desteserkirin.(EKN/MB) 
“Nazism continues in Germany”	“Ji parlamentoyê biryara îdamê derbikeve ez ê îmze bikim.
“Then she tells my Prime Minister ‘There shouldn’t have been such a harsh treatment’.	“Serokwezîra Almanyayê Angela Merkelê ji min re got: “Heke hûn serbest berdin em ê keyfxweş bibin.”
“I thought Nazism had ended in Germany, it seems it still continues”.	“Min got ew ne rojnameger e, terorîst e. Denîz Yûcelî mehekê xwe li konsolxaneya Almanyayê veşart. Ev mêrik terorîst e. Ne rojnameger e.”
* Tokatlılar are the people who are from Tokat province	Wêne: * Murat Çetinmühürdar - Serokkomarî / AA
Önal went to the courthouse to watch the trial of Dersim co-Mayor Mehmet Ali Bul, who is jailed pending trial.	Onlû ji bo li dadkirina hevserokê Şaredariya Dêrsimê Mehmet Alî Bulî temaşe bike çûye dadgehê.
Tunceli Heavy Penal Court had issued a detention to take Önlü forcibly on charge of “Propagandizing for a terror group”.	Serokê Şaredariya Dêrsimê Mehmet Alî Bul piştî hat girtin ji karê wî jî hatibû avêtin.
Önlü was detained on December 15, 2016 and later released.	Di 15ê Kanûna Pêşiyê de Alîcan Onlûyê parlamenter hatibû desteserkirin û paşê hatibû berdan.
About Alican Önlü	Kronolojiya girtin û desteserkirina parlamenterên HDPyê
CLICK-THE STATUS OF HDP MPs TO DATE	Di 17ê sibata 2017ê de Ferhat Encû dîsa hat girtin.
According to the reports bianet compiled from local and national newspapers, news sites and agencies, men have killed 24 women; raped 7; harassed 11; sexually abused 21 girls, injured 28 women in February 2017.	Li gor nûçeyên bianetê ji rojnameyên herêmî û neteweyî, ji malper û ajansan berhev kirîn, mêran di meha Sibatê de 24 jin kuştine, tecawiz li heft jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 11 keçên zarok kiriye, 28 jin birîndar kirine, îstismara cinsî li 21 keçên zarok kiriye.
Men killed 53 women and girls; raped 13 women; harassed 17; sexually abused 48 girls; inflicted violence on 51 women since the beginning of 2017.	Di herdu mehên destpêka 2017ê de mêran 53 jin kuştine, tecawiz li 13 jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 17 jinan kiriye, îstismara cinsî li 48 zarokên keç kiriye, tûndkarî li 51 jinan kiriye.
Murder	Kuştin
Men killed 24 women and girls in February.	Mêran di meha sibatê de 24 jin û zarokên keç kuştine.
2 women were found dead in their apartments. Their murderers are not known yet. 4 other women have committed or allegedly committed suicide. One of these women was married at a very young age and was being exposed to systematic violence. Another of these women was receiving death threats for attempting to divorce.	Termê du jinan hatiye dîtin ku guman heye ew hatibin kuştin. qatilê du jinan nehatine dîtin. Çar jinan xwe kuştiye an jî tê îdiakirin ku wan xwe kuştiye. Yek ji wan jinan di emrê zarokatiyê de hatiye zewicandin ya dî dixwest ji mêrê xwe cida bibe.
**	**
29% of the women were murdered for attempting to divorce.	Ji sedî 29ê jinên hatîn kuştin ji ber ku xwestine ji mêrê xwe cida bibin hatine kuştin.
One of the women murdered was a Syrian refugee.	Yek ji wan jinên hatîn kuştin penabereka ji Sûriyeyê bûye.
12.5% of the murders were committed openly in the middle of the street. 8% of the murders were committed in front of the homes or workplaces of the women.	Ji sedî 12,5ê jinên hatîn kuştin di nava kolanan de hatine kuştin. Ji sedî 8ê jinên hatîn kuştin li ber deriyê mala xwe an jî li ber deriyê kargeha xwe hatine kuştin.
2 women were murdered despite restraining orders and another woman despite having filed a complaint in the police department right before the murder.	Digel ku biryara parastinê ji bo du jinan hatiye dayin jî ew hatine kuştin. Jinekê ji beriya bê kuştin li navenda polîsan giliya qatilê xwe kiriye lê digel wê yekê jî hatiye kuştin.
58% of the women were killed by their husbands: 1 woman was killed by her elder brother; 2 others by their fathers; 2 women by their ex-boy friends, 1 by a burglar; 13 women by their husbands; 1 other by her husband of religious marriage; 1 by the brother of her husband; 1 by her boyfriend and 1 by the husband of her niece attempting to divorce.	Ji sedî 58ê jinên hatîn kuştin mêrê wan ew kuştine. Birayê jinekê ew kuştiye, bavê du jinan ew kuştine, destgirtiyê berê yê du jinan ew kuştine, mêrê bi zewaca fermî zewicî tê 13 jinan ew kuştine. Tîyê jinekê ew kuştiye. Jinek hatiye kuştin lê nayê zanîn ka çi têkiliya wê bi qatilî re hebûye.
50% of the women were murdered with a fire arms. 7 women were killed with knives; 1 by being strangled; 1 by being beaten; 2 others by bowstrings, 8 with pistols; 4 with rifles and 1 girl with poison.	Ji sedî 50yê jinên hatîn kuştin bi çekên gulexwer hatine kuştin. Heft jin bi kêran hatine kuştin, jinek hatiye xeniqandin, jinek bi hingavtinê hatiye kuştin, du jin bi werîs/ta/şelît/hebnok/şarokan hatine xeniqandin. Heşt jin bi demanceyan hatine kuştin, Çar jin bi tifekan hatine kuştin. Zarokek keç bi jehriyê hatiye kuştin.
Following the murders, 5 of the perpetrators committed suicide and 5 others attempted suicide.	Piştî bûyerên kuştinê, 5 mêrên qatil xwe kuştine, 5 mêran jî hewil dane xwe bikujin.
Harassment	Tecawiz
At least 11 women were harassed in February.	Di meha sibatê de nûçeya 11 bûyerên tecawizê hatine nivîsîn.
4 of the harassment cases occurred on the street; 1 in the apartment which the harassers broke into; 2 in the houses of the women and 1 in a hospital.	Hevpîşeyê jinekê dema ji bo karî bi wê re civîyayî tecawiz li wê kiriye, serkarê jinekê tecawiz lê kiriye, mêrekê bi rêya medyaya civakî jinek nas kirî tecawiz lê kiriye, temîrkarekê çûyî mala jinekê tecawiz lê kiriye. Du mêrên nenasên du jinan tecawiz li wan kiriye.
1 of the harassers had already been convicted of sexual assault.	Jinek li malekê hatiye desteserkirin û tecawiz lê hatiye kirin. Li tuwaleta Mollekê tecawiz li jinekê hatiye kirin.
Child abuse	Îstismarkirina zarokan
Men sexually abused at least 21 girls including 1 with disabilities in February.	Mêran di meha Sibatê de îstismara cinsî li 21 zarokan kiriye. Yek ji zarokan kêmendam bûye.
19% of the girls became pregnant due to abuse.	Ji sedî 19ê zarokên keç piştî îstismarê ducanî bûne.
4 abuse cases were brought to light by girls telling other teachers about the abuse.	Bûyera îstismara li çar zarokên keç hatî kirin piştî ku wan zarokan ew bûyer ji dersdêrên xwe yên dî re gotine eşkere bûye.
The cities in which the abuse incidents occurred were Adana (1), Aydın (3), İstanbul (3), İzmir (2), Kırklareli (1), Kocaeli (1), Konya (3), Malatya (1), Manisa (3), Mardin (1), Samsun (1) and Yozgat (1).	Li van bajaran zarok hatine îstismarkirin: Adana (1), Aydin (3), Stenbol (3), Izmîr (2), Kirklarelî (1), Kocaeli (1), Konya (3), Meletî (1), Manisa (3), Mêrdîn (1), Samsun (1), Yozgat (1).
Violence-injury	Tûndkarî û birîndarkirin
Men injured/inflicted violence on at least 28 women in February.	Mêran di meha Sibatê de ya kêm tûndkarî li 28 jinan kiriye.
11% of the women were subjected to violence for attempting to divorce; 11% despite a restraining order.	Ji ber ku 11 jinan xwestine ji mêrê xwe cida bibin mêrên wan tûndkarî li wan kiriye. Ji sedî 11ê jinan digel biryara parastinê jî tûndkarî li wan hatiye kirin.
21% of the violence-injury cases occurred in public places such as in a hospital or on the street.	Yek ji jinên tûndkarî lê hatî kirin trans bûye.
One of the victims of violence was a trans woman.	Ji sedî 61ê jinên tûndkarî li wan hatî kirin partnerên wan tûndkarî li wan kiriye.
61% of the women were subjected to violence by their partners and ex-partners: 1 woman was subjected to violence by her family; 1 by her son-in-law; 2 by their ex-boyfriends; 13 by husbands; 1 by her son; 1 by her boy friend; 1 by a taxi driver. two by sons; one by a bus driver assistant. In 7 cases, the identity of the assaulter was not reported on the media.	Malbata jinekê, zavayê jinekê, mêrê berê yê jinekê, destgirtiyê berê yê du jinan tûndkarî li wan kiriye. Şifêrekê tûndkarî li bikira xwe kiriye. Di nûçeyan de bûyerên tûndkariya li 7 jinan hatiye eşkerekirin lê nehatiye eşkerekirin ka kê ew kiriyar kiriye.
46% of women were injured with knives or firearms: 11 with knives and 2 with pistols. 15 women were beaten.	Ji sedî 46ê jinan bi çekên gulexwer an jî kêran hatine birîndarkirin. 11 jin bi demanceyan hatine birîndarkirin. 15 jin hatine hingaftin.

March 9	 Çi bûbû?
Closed Özgür Gündem newspaper's Editor-in-Chief on Watch campaign was launched on May 3, 2016 and ended on August 7, 2016.56 people joined the campaign.	Di 22yê Tebaxê de Zana Kayayê berpirsê weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê û berpirsê naveroka nivîsan Inan Kizilkaya hatin girtin.
50 of the attendees faced prosecution. Of the prosecuted, files of the 38 have been turned into cases.	Di 31ê Tebaxê de, endama Lijneya Weşanê ya Ozgûr Gûndemê, Necmîye Alpaya nivîskar û zimanzan hat girtin.
İmam Canpolat standing trial together with Baysoy was sentenced to 1 year and 3 months in prison.	Di 29ê Kanûna 2016an de Asli Erdogan û Necmiye Alpay serbest hatin berdan.(EA/MB) 
In an interview to Die Welt, Mitte District Office Director Falko Drossmann expressed that the precautions against fire in the hall are inadequate, and that these inadequacies were detected during the inspections.	Di rojnameya Die Weltê de hat eşkerekirin ku Çavûşoglû dê li Plaza Event Centerê beşdarî bernameya ji bo referandûmê bibûya lê bername hatiye betalkirin.
Anadolu Agency: The event hasn’t been cancelled	Ajansa Anadolûyê: Bername nehatiye betalkirin
State-run Anadolu Agency (AA) reported that Çavuşoğlu’s event hasn’t been cancelled.	“Bi awayekê di dîrokê de nimûneyên wê nîne hewil didin bernameya me betal bikin.
Another hall was arranged for Çavuşoğlu’s speech and this would be announced today, the AA reported.	“Ez ê biçim ti kes nikarin rê li min bigirin. em ê cihekê bibînin ku lê bicivin. “
What happened?	Çi bûbû? 
Minister of Justice Bekir Bozdağ and Minister of Economy Nihat Zeybekçi’s events were cancelled successively for security reasons.	Wezîrê dadê, Bekir Bozdag dê li bajarê Gaggenauyê yê Almanyayê beşdarî civînekê bibûya, rayedarên bajarî pêşiyê ji bo civînê destûr da, paşê destûr betal kir.
Later on, President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan said, “Your practices are no different than the Nazi practices in the past. We don’t want to see that Nazi world. We thought Germany had passed over these a long time ago, we were mistaken”.	Civîn dê şeva dî bihatiya kirin. Rayedaran diyar kirin ku ji ber salon biçûk e destûra hatî dayin hatiye betalkirin.
Lastly, Erdoğan said, ““I thought Nazism had ended in Germany, it seems it still continues”.	Li ser betalkirina civînê, cihgirê serokwezîrî Nûman Kûrtûlmûşî gotiye.
German Governmental Spokesperson Steffen Seibert dismissed the Nazi comparison as “absurd”. (YY/TK)	Di 2014ê de, Recep Tayyîp Erdoganî ji bo hilbijartina serokkomarîyê li Vîyanayê mîtîngek pêk anibû. Piştî mîtîngê piştevanên AKPyê û mûxalifên wê şer kiribûn.(YY/MB) 
Journalist and bianet Project Advisor Nadire Mater, who joined closed Özgür Gündem newspaper’s Editors-in-Chief on Watch campaign, appeared before judge today (March 7).	Hasan Cemal, Yildirim Tûrker û Nadîre Materê ji bo Ozgûr Gûndemê, Nobedariya Berpirsiyarîya Weşanê kiribû. 
İstanbul 22nd Heavy Penal Court sentenced Mater to 15 months in prison and fined her 6,000 TL (1,500 Euros). The prison sentence was suspended.	Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a 22. a Stenbolê bi sûcê "propagandakirinê" 15 meh cezayê da Murat Uyurkulakî.
"These trials have revealed to public what sort of crackdowns Özgür Gündem and Kurdish media have been confronting. In this regard, I need to thank you".	Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a 22. a Stenbolê bi sûcê “propagandakirinê”10 meh û 15 roj cezayê girtinê da Yildirim Tûrkerî. 
Mater’s attorney Meriç Eyüboğlu pleaded for Mater.	Dadkirina Murat Uyurkulakî 
Stressing that Anti-Terror Act Articles 6/2 and 7/2 under which Mater is tried, changed in 2013 and that “element of inciting to violence and force” was added in order to render it in accordance with the European Court of the Human Rights (ECtHR) standard:	"Pîvanên weşana rojnameyan dikare di nav civakê de an jî li zanîngehê bê axiftin û minaqeşe li ser bê kirin. Dadgeh ne ew cih e ku pîvanên rojnameyan lê bêne eşkerekirin."
Eyüboğlu: The court has to take the ECtHR standard into consideration	Dadkirina Jûlîde Kûral û Ilham Bakirî
“It is not a lawful trial”	Cezayê pereyî
“We are not face to face with a lawful trial”, said Eyüboğlu and concluded the plead stating “We hope Turkey’s record of the freedom of expression won’t become worse with this verdict”.	Dadgehê biryar da ji Xala 7/2. 6 hezar Lîreyên Tirkan ceza da Cemalî.
Eyüboğlu demanded acquittal of Mater.	Dadkirina Yildirim Tûrkerî
The court sentenced Mater to 15 months in prison under Anti-Terror Act Article 7/2 over “terror propaganda”. The sentence was suspended.	Li ser navê Tûrkerî parêzera wî Emel Ataktûrk axivî û wê got: “Ez hêvî dikim hûn bêyî ku aliyekê bigirin, biryaran bidin.”
The court also fined Mater 6,000 TL, corresponding to 10 months in prison. 	Dadgerî got: “Ev gotinên te fişş in û ez heman gotinan li te vedigerînim.”
What happened?	Ceza hat paşdedan
Closed Özgür Gündem newspaper's Editor-in-Chief on Watch campaign was launched on May 3, 2016 and ended on August 7, 2016.56 people joined the campaign.	Dadgehê ji ber sûcê “propagandakirinê” salek û 6 meh ceza da Tûrkerî. Ji ber ku ew sûc bi rêya çapemeniyê hatiye kirin ceza hat guhertin û bû 2 sal û 3 meh. Ji şeşê yekê cezayî hat kêmkirin û ceza bû salek û 10 meh û 15 roj.
50 of the attendees faced prosecution. Of the prosecuted, files of the 38 have been turned into cases.	Dîwana dadgeran a serokê wê Firat Demîr e, cezayê girtinê bi paş de da.  
50 investigations launched	Dadkirina Nadîre Materê
50 people against whom lawsuit was filed are as follows:	Materê got “divê ev doz bê betalkirin” wê ji bo dadgeran got:
Legal action was taken against Ömer Ağın for an article published under the editorship of Celal Başlangıç, against İmam Canpolat for an article published under the editorship of Cengiz Baysoy and against İlham Bakır for an article published under the editorship of Jülide Kural.	Sê kesên beşdariya kampanyayê kiribûn; berpirsê Tirkiyeyê yê Rojnamegerên Sînornenas, Erol Onderoglû, seroka Weqfa Mafên Mirovan a Tirkiyeyê, Şebnem Korûr Fîncanci û nivîskar Ahmet Nesîn ji bo demekê hatin girtin.
Of the 36 Editors-in-Chief on Watch, Erol Önderoğlu, Ahmet Nesin and Şebnem Korur Fincancı were arrested in June 2016 and released 10 days after it.	Di 16ê Tebaxê de Dadgeha Cezayên Sûlhê ya 8. biryara girtina Ozgûr Gûndemê da.
İmam Canpolat standing trial together with Baysoy was sentenced to 1 year and 3 months in prison.	Di 22yê Tebaxê de Zana Kayayê berpirsê weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê û berpirsê naveroka nivîsan Inan Kizilkaya hatin girtin.
Nadire Mater was sentenced to 15 months in prison (deferred) and fined 6,000 TL (1,500 Euros).	Di 31ê Tebaxê de, endama Lijneya Weşanê ya Ozgûr Gûndemê, Necmîye Alpaya nivîskar û zimanzan hat girtin.
The Council of Higher Education has cancelled the work permit of Boğaziçi University academic member Assist. Prof. Dr. Noémi Levy-Aksu.	Lijneya Bilind a Perwerdeyê(YOK) hevpeymana karkirinê ya Ass. Prof. Dr. Noémi Levy-Aksuyê nû nekir.
Remarking that YÖK’s decision was related to her being a signatory of the declaration entitled “We Will not be a Party to This Crime” issued by the Academics for Peace, Levy-Aksu said, “People are unjustly sacked in many places. Mine is a piece of this wave and we will continue to stand against it”.	Di 22yê Sibatê de jî YOKê bi nivîsekê ji Zanîngeha Bogazîçîyê re eşkere kiriye ku hevpeymana Ass. Prof. Dr. Noémi Levy-Aksuyê hatiye betalkirin.
312 signatory academics have been discharged	“Li gelek deran bi awayekê neheqane xelk ji karên wan têne avêtin ya min jî pêlek ji wan pêlan e.”
In total 4,811 academics from 112 universities have been discharged via five Statutory Decrees issued under the State of Emergency. Of these academics, 58 were returned to their duties via another decree. The number of signatories among the discharged are 312. (BK/TK)	Ass. Prof. Dr. Noémi Levy-Aksu li Londonê ye û wê ev biryar ji wê derê bihîstiye. Wê got ew ê ji bo têkoşînê vegere Tirkiyeyê. (BK/MB) 
The street was filled with women carrying hundreds of banners with different messages and slogans	Ji bo Şeva Femînîstan kaxezên bi hezaran dirûşm li ser hatîn nivîsîn hatin nîşandan.
Bianet's women employees at the Night March.	Xebatkarên bianetê li Meşa Jinan bûn.
In the press statement held at Tunnel Square, the women Turkish Metal Union Workers who lost their lives in a bus accident while driving to Ankara to attend International Women's Day activities have been commemorated and their names have been read out: Leyla Çiçek, Refika Barışsever, Özlem İnan, Fatma Hacıoğlu, Güleydan Sezer, Elvan Mutlu and Leyla Yalçın.	Karkerên Metalê duhî ji bo Roja Jinan pîroz bike ber bi Enqereyê çûbûn û di rê de otobasa wan qeza kiribû. Karkerên di  qezayê de mirîn hatin yadkirin. Navên wan ( Leyla Çiçek, Refika Barışsever, Özlem İnan, Fatma Hacıoğlu, Güleydan Sezer, Elvan Mutlu û Leyla Yalçın) hatin xwendin.
Aynur Özallı was another woman who was commemorated in the press statement. Özallı was killed by her ex-husband on March 8, the International Women's Day.	Aynûr Ozalli jî hat yadkirin. Aynûrê ji ber ku xwestiye ji mêrê xwe cida bibe îro(di 8ê Adarê de) hatiye kuştin.
Women condemned the "the attack on March 8" at Bilgi University where students, who organized a March 8 Festival in Santral Campus of Bilgi University, faced an attack by a group of men.	Li Zanîngeha Bîlgîyê komeka ji 30 kesan pêk tê êrîşî standa 8ê Adarê kiribûn. Ev bûyer hat şermezarkirin.
Another highlight in the press statement was the support on the "March 8 International Women's Strike". Women chanted the slogans of other women demonstrating in Argentina, Ire land, Mexico, Russia, Italy and South Korea: "We stop life" and "Our solidarity is our weapon".	Jin û Transan eşkere kirin ku di Halê Awarte de jî ew bi hev re ne.
The press statement ended with the words "We will not leave the streets and the nights!". The march turning into a celebration with halay dance was followed by an (after) party at "the Mekan" where the Ritm Kolektif and djs Didem and Haziran took the stage. (HK/DG)	Jinan dirûşma “em ê meydanan bernedin gotin” û meş temam kir.

Trials of Faruk Balıkçı, Dicle Anter, Derya Okatan, Kumru Başer and Ayşe Batumlu, who were among the Özgür Gündem Editors-in-Chief on Watch, have continued at İstanbul 22nd Heavy Penal Court.	Dageha Cezayên Giran a 22. a Stenbolê 5 Nobedarên Weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê, Faruk Balikçi, Dîcle Anter, Derya Okatan, Kumru Başer û Ayşe Batumlu dad kir.
Balıkçı has been fined 6,000 TL, Anter and Okatan each have been fined 7,000 TL, and Başer and Batumlu each sentenced to 15 months in prison.	Nobedarên Weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê, Balikçi 6 hezar, Anter û Okatanê 7 hezar Lîre cezayê pereyî stand, Başer û Batûmlûyê 15 meh cezayê girtinê stand.
What happened?	Çi bûbû?
Closed Özgür Gündem newspaper's Editor-in-Chief on Watch campaign was launched on May 3, 2016 and ended on August 7, 2016. 56 people joined the campaign.	Piştî 24ê Tîrmeha 2015ê pevçûnan dest pê kir, gelek doz li Ozgûr Gûndemê hatin vekirin. Li hemberî zordariyan Ozgûr Gûndemê Kampanyaya Nobedariya Berpirsiyariya Weşanê da dest pê kirin.
Legal action was taken against Ömer Ağın for an article published under the editorship of Celal Başlangıç, against İmam Canpolat for an article published under the editorship of Cengiz Baysoy and against İlham Bakır for an article published under the editorship of Jülide Kural.	Sê kesên beşdariya kampanyayê kiribûn; berpirsê Tirkiyeyê yê Rojnamegerên Sînornenas, Erol Onderoglû, seroka Weqfa Mafên Mirovan a Tirkiyeyê, Şebnem Korûr Fîncanci û nivîskar Ahmet Nesîn ji bo demekê hatin girtin.
Of the 36 Editors-in-Chief on Watch, Erol Önderoğlu, Ahmet Nesin and Şebnem Korur Fincancı were arrested in June 2016 and released 10 days after it.	Di 16ê Tebaxê de Dadgeha Cezayên Sûlhê ya 8. biryara girtina Ozgûr Gûndemê da.
İmam Canpolat standing trial together with Baysoy was sentenced to 1 year and 3 months in prison.	Di 22yê Tebaxê de Zana Kayayê berpirsê weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê û berpirsê naveroka nivîsan Inan Kizilkaya hatin girtin.
Nadire Mater was sentenced to 15 months in prison (deferred) and fined 6,000 TL (1,500 Euros).	Di 31ê Tebaxê de, endama Lijneya Weşanê ya Ozgûr Gûndemê, Necmîye Alpaya nivîskar û zimanzan hat girtin.
Sending a message to bianet, Şık said:	Ahmet Şikî ji bo bianetê peyamek şand.
“Like many who kept in prison, I also know that I am being kept hostage for the [constitutional amendment] referendum. Today’s prosecutors are no different than [Gülen] Community’s ones. As I would have said if I were outside, against all sorts of dicta regime, in every language, NO!”	“Wek gelek kesên di girtîgehê de ez dizanim ez jî ji ber referandûmê di girtîgehê de me. Ti ferq di navbera dozgerên vê demê û dozgerên cimaetê de nîne. Heke ez li derve jî bûma min ê bigotiya ku ji hemî desthilatên dîkte re NA” 
What had happened?	Çi bûbû?
İstanbul 8th Criminal Judgeship of Peace ruled arrest of Şık for “propagandizing for FETÖ/PDY (Fethullahist Terror Organization/Parallel State Structure and PKK (Kurdistan Workers’ Party)” on December 30, 2016.	Ahmet Şik ji ber Twîtên xwe û nûçeyên xwe di 29ê Kanûna Paşiyê ya 2016ê de hatibû desteserkirin. Mijara desteserkirina wî ji parêzerên wî re nehat gotin lê ji bo Ajansa Anadolûyê hatibû şandin.
On January 3, 2017, Şık was transferred to Silivri Prison in which he was kept for 375 days as part of Oda TV investigation.	Lêpirsîn ji ber hin Twîttên wî û nûçeyên wî yên li malpera Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê belav bûyîn hatiye vekirin.
On January 4, 2017, İstanbul 9th Criminal Judgeship of Peace rejected the objection filed against Şık’s arrest.	Ew bi "propagandaya rêxistina terorî" û "şikandina rûmeta dewletê û organên medyayê" tê sûcdarkirin.
Şık met with his wife Yonca Verdioğlu Şık and attorneys on January 5, 2017, the first time since his arrest on December 30, 2016.	Ahmet Şik di 30ê Kanûna Pêşiyê de hat girtin. Şik ji 3yê Kanûna Paşiyê ve di Girtîgeha Sîlîvrîyê de ye.(EKN/MB)
The Netherlands has refused Turkey demanding an apology for revoking landing rights of Turkey's Minister of Foreign Affairs Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu and the deportation of Minister of Family and Social Policies Fatma Betül Sayan-Kaya from the Netherlands.	Hollandayê destûr neda balafira wezîrê karên derve, Mevût Çavûşoglûyî û wezîra malbat û polîtîkayên civakî, Fatma Betûl Sayan ji sînorên welatî derêxist. Li ser van bûyeran Tirkiyeyê xwest Hollanda jê lêborînê bixwaze.
According to a report by BBC Türkçe, PM Rutte said that wished the tension to de-escelate but they would not apologize.	Li gor nûçeya BBC Turkçeyê, serokwezîrê Hollandayê, Mark Rutteyî eşkere kir ku Hollanda dixwaze têkiliyên digel Tirkiyeyê nerm bibin lê ew ê lêborînê nexwaze.
"Are you crazy?"	“Em nahêlin [Tirkiye] şantajê li me bike”
Upon asked in a TV program about Turkey demanding an apology from the Netherlands, Rutte said; "We wish the tension to de-escelate but not by apologizing. Are you crazy?".	Rutteyî eşkere kir ku parêzbendiya dîplomatîk ya Fatma Betûl Sayanê nîne û heqê Hollandayê heye ku wê dersînor bike.
Rutte according to the report added that the Government of Turkey acted pretty bizarre with regards to the dispute between the two countries and noted "They did their best to make the things get out of control".	“Hikûmeta Tirkiyeyê eşkere kiriye ku ew ê me mecbûrî hin karan bike, em nahêlin ew şantajê li me bike.”
What happened?	Çi bûbû?
The campaign meeting of Minister of Foreign Affairs Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu on March 11 in Rotterdam for the referendum on the Constitutional Amendment Draft on April 16 was cancelled.	Di 6ê Adarê de wezîrê dadê Bakir Bozdagî xwestibû biçe Almanyayê û li wê derê beşdarî civînekê bibe lê civîn hatibû astengkirin.
Çavuşoğlu in a TV program in CNN Türk called the Dutch "Nazis" following the remarks about Germany and if the Netherlands would revoke his landing rights, this would cause sanctions.	Wezîra Malbat û Polîtîkayên Civakî, Fatma Betûl Sayan Kaya piştî ku ji Hollandayê bi zorê ji bo Almanyayê hat birin îro bi balafirê Ji bajarê Kolnê yê Almanyayê hat Stenbolê.
On March 11, the Netherlands revoked Minister Çavuşoğlu's landing rights.	Wezareta Karên Derve: Bila balyozê Hollandayê demekê venegere
Turkish Ministry of Foreign Affairs has sent two separate diplomatic notes to the Netherlands.	Wezareta Karên Derve ya Tirkiyeyê du hişyarî dan Hollandayê.
According to state-run Anadolu Agency, the note read, “The proceedings in question, which don’t comply with diplomatic courtesy and international customs, against Turkish ministers are strongly condemned and that an apology is expected concerning these practices from Dutch authorities”.	Li gor nûçeya Ajansa Anadolûyê Wezareta Karên Derve bi du hişyariyan diyar kiriye:
The note also requested that “The violations in question against Turkish ministers and citizens be investigated, placing punitive, administrative and judicial sanctions against those who carried out the violations, and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs be informed of the outcome”.	“Li welatî û wezîrên Tirkiyeyê kiryarên ne li gor nezaketa dîplomatîk û rêbazên navneteweyî hatine kirin. Ji Wezareta Karên Derve [ya Hollandayê] daxwaz tê kirin ku divê ji bo berpirsên wan kiriyaran cezayan bistînin.”
In the first note, it was stated that the treatment against Minister of Family and Social Policies Fatma Betül Sayan-Kaya and the delegation accompanying her were not in accordance with the international customs and that it violated the Vienna Convention.	Hişyariya duyem jî li ser kiriyarên polîsên Hollandayê yên digel xwenîşanderên li ber deriyê Balyozxaneya Tirkiyeyê ya li Hollandayê hatiye dayin.
The second note was sent with respect to Dutch police’s intervention in the protesters in front of the consulate building.	BIXWÎNE: Sayan-Kayaya wezîr vegeriya Tirkiyeyê
What happened?	Çi bûbû?
The campaign meeting of Minister of Foreign Affairs Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu on March 11 in Rotterdam for the referendum on the Constitutional Amendment Draft on April 16 was cancelled.	Di 6ê Adarê de wezîrê dadê Bakir Bozdagî xwestibû biçe Almanyayê û li wê derê beşdarî civînekê bibe lê civîn hatibû astengkirin.
Çavuşoğlu in a TV program in CNN Türk called the Dutch "Nazis" following the remarks about Germany and if the Netherlands would revoke his landing rights, this would cause sanctions.	Piştî sîyasetmedarên Alman xwe li ser vê yekê nerazî kir, serokwezîra Almanyayê Merkelê got:
On March 11, the Netherlands revoked Minister Çavuşoğlu's landing rights.	"Divê Tirkiye demildest dest ji vê şibandina me û Nazîyan berde."
Netherland's Minister of Foreign Affairs Bert Koenders said that Çavuşoğlu's call to the people from Turkey in the Netherlands for an assembly threatened "the public order and security".	Wezîra Malbat û Polîtîkayên Civakî, Fatma Betûl Sayan Kaya piştî ku ji Hollandayê bi zorê ji bo Almanyayê hat birin îro bi balafirê Ji bajarê Kolnê yê Almanyayê hat Stenbolê.
On March 15, General Elections will be held in the Netherlands. (ÇT/TK)	Xwenîşanderekî/ê alaya Tirkiyeyê bi stûna layan a Balyozxaneya Hollandayê ve kir.
Secretary General of NATO Jens Stoltenberg from Norway has called on Turkey and the Netherlands to defuse the escalating dispute.	Sekreterê giştî yê NATOyê, Jens Stoltenbergî bangî Tirkiye û Hollandayê kir û ji wan re got bila ew peywendiyan nerm bikin.
"It is essential to avoid further escalation and find ways to calm down the situation. Matters of concern can only be resolved through open and direct communication channels.	“Em dixwazin bibin piştevanên aliyan ku rêzê li hev bigirin.
"The European Commission calls on to refrain from excessive statements and actions that risk to further exacerbate the situation with the Netherlands and other EU member states".	“Da ku peywendiyên hişk nerm bibin, divê em li tiştên hevpar bifikirin.”

Serokê Awistûryayê, Christian Kernî diyar kir ji bo parastina rêkûpêkiya civakê ew ê hewil bide, bibe asteng ku ji bo propagandayê wezîrên Tirkiyeyê neçin wê derê.

“We’ve tried to find a solution”	Koenders ji BBCyê re axiviye.
“While we were trying to find a solution, we received a sanction threat like Çavuşoğlu willing to organize a meeting at the consulate building or some other building belonging to the Turkish government. That is why we revoked landing rights, then another minister came without having our permission. This was too risky”.	Wî gotiye: “Ji bo tedbîrstandinê ti rêyên me yên dî nebûn. The second hearing of the trial on January 11 had lasted only five minutes and the court had ruled that the case of the arrested İnan Kızılkaya, a suspect in the same trial with Korur-Fincancı, Önderoğlu and Nesin, be combined with the main trial case of Özgür Gündem daily. 13 editors in chief on watch and 1 writer convicted	Di 16ê Tebaxê de Dadgeha Cezayên Sûlhê ya 8. biryara girtina Ozgûr Gûndemê da.
As of March 9, the above mentioned 14 people have been sentenced to 14.330 Euro (56.000 TL) and 157 months and 15 days in prison in total.	Di 22yê Tebaxê de Zana Kayayê berpirsê weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê û berpirsê naveroka nivîsan Inan Kizilkaya hatin girtin.
The court in the hearing of Özgür Gündem Editors in Chief on Watch Erol Önderoğlu, Şebnem Korur-Fincancı and Ahmet Nesin ruled that Nesin be taken forcibly to give testimony and be released after his statement has been taken.	Nobedarên Weşana Ozgûr Gûndemê Erol Onderoglû, Ahmet Nesîn û Şebnem Korûr Fîncanci bi sûcê “propagandaya ji bo rêxistinên terorî” hatin dadkirin. 
Standing trial on charge of "propagandizing for a terrorist organization" over attending the Editorship in Chief on Watch Campaign for the closed Özgür Gündem daily, Reporters Without Borders (RSF) Turkey representative and bianet rapporteur of the BİA Media Monitoring Reports Erol Önderoğlu, writer Ahmet Nesin and Human Rights Foundation of Turkey (TİHV) President Prof. Dr. Şebnem Korur-Fincancı had their third hearing of their trials today (March 21).	Erol Onderoglû rapornivîsê Çavdêriya Li Medyayê ya biayê û berpirsê Tirkiyeyê yê Rêxistina Rojnamegerên Sînornenas e, Prof. Dr. Şebnem Korur Fîncanci seroka Weqfa Mafê Mirovan a Tirkiyeyê ye û Ahmet Nesîn nivîskar e. 
Passing a preceding judgement, the court has ruled that Ahmet Nesin be taken forcibly to testify and later be released after his statement has been taken.	Onderoglû û Korûr-Fîncanci beşdarî dadkirinê bûn. Dadgehê biryar da ku Ahmet Nesîn bê girtin parastina wî bê standin û serbest bê berdan.
What happened?	Çi bûbû?
Closed Özgür Gündem newspaper's Editor-in-Chief on Watch campaign was launched on May 3, 2016 and ended on August 7, 2016.56 people joined the campaign. Parlamenterê Partiya Gel a Komarî (CHP) ê Stenbolê Sezgin Tanrikulu 21ê Adarê roja Newrozê (duh) li Girtîgeha Tîpa F a Edirneyê, serdana Hevserokê Partiya Demokratîk a Gelan (HDP) Selahattin Demirtaş kir.

The Solidarity for Democracy platform has carried out a study on the broadcasts of 17 national channels during March ahead of the referendum on the Constitutional Amendment Draft on April 16.	Hevgirîyê lê nêriye ka di meha Adarê de di 17 qenalên seteleytî de kîjan partiyê çi qasê cih girtiye.
The results of the study show that the TV channels did not treat the political parties which run a "No" campaign for the referendum equally with regards to the allocation of broadcast duration.	Li gor encamên lêkolînê qenalan wekhev cih nedane partiyên NA û ERÊyê dixwazin. Li gor encaman ji partiyên CHP, HDP, AKP,MHP û serokkomarîyê herî kêm HDPyê di weşanên TVyan de cih girtine.
Representatives of the HDP were also not hosted on any live programme	Endamên HDPyê di meha Adarê de qet tevlî weşanên zindî nebûne.
The broadcasts of 17 national TV channels have been observed for a period of 10 and 20 days each, and the time allocated to the AKP, MHP, CHP, HDP, President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan and his consultants have been compared for the month March.	Erdogan 53 siet, CHP 17 siet, HDP 33 deqîqeyan di televîzyonê de cih girtine.
The TV channels observed in the study are A Haber, ATV, CNN Türk, Fox, Habertürk, Kanal 24, Kanal A, Kanal 7, Kanal D, NTV, Star, Show, TGRT, TRT Haber, TRT 1, TV Net and Ülke TV. The Prime Ministry Council To Protect Children From Sexually Explicit Materials has decided that the March issue of the women's magazine Elle contained "some articles and photographs which were found obscene and harmful for minors' psychology"	Lijneya Parastina ji Weşanên Bandora Xerab li Zarokan Dike ya Serokkomariyê biryar da ku hejmara paşiyê ya kovara Elleyê bandora xerab li zarokan dike.
The decision published on the Official Gazette (March 24) today demand some restrictions be imposed on the magazine according to the Protection of Minors From Sexually Explicit Materials Act.	Li gor lijneyê “hin wêneyên di kovarê de bandoreka xerab li me’inewiyata wan kesên ji 18 saliyê biçûktir dike."
Accordingly, the magazine should be marked as "harmful for minors'" and be placed in an opaque envelope or bag.	Li gor biryara lijneyê ya di Rojnameya Fermî de hatî weşandin. Divê li ser bergê kovarê nivîsa “Zererê Dide Zarokan” hebe û kovar di zerfekê de bê firotin.

What happened?	Çi bibû?
Kemal Kurkut was shot to death by police at security check point on Evrim Alataş street near Newroz Park in Turkey’s southeastern Diyarbakır province on March 21.	Kemal Kurkut ê 23 salê, 21ê Adarê di Newroza Amedê de, li xala kontrolê ya polîsan a nêzîkî Parka Newrozê ya li ser Kolana Evrim Alataşê rastî gulebarana polîsan hat. Kurkut ê ku birin nexweşxaneyê jiyana xwe ji dest da.
In the photos taken at the incident time, Kurkut was seen bare-chested quarreling with police at the check point and starting to run passing through the check point. As some of the police fire in the air, some others fire on him.	Walîtiya Amedê daxuyanî derbarê bûyerê de da û got ku di destê Kurkut de kêr hebû û ‘guman hebû ku xwekuj e’ û derbarê bûyerê de lêpirsîn hatiye vekirin.
Born in Adıyaman, Kurkut was a student at İnönü University Fine Arts Faculty Department of Music.	Kurkut ê li bajarê Semsûrê hatiye dinê û li Zanîngeha Inonuyê di Fakulteya Huneran de beşa muzikî dixwend.

Du karkerên ku li Firoşgeha Zanîngeha Katîp Çelebîyî kar dikirin li ber nivîsa NAyê wêneyek girt. Ji ber vê yekê ji karî hatin avêtin.

Sick prisoner Mehmet Yıldzbakan lost his life yesterday morning (March 27) in Samandağ district prison in Hatay Province.	Girtiyê nexweş Mehmet Yildizbakan di girtîgeha Samandagê de duh destê sibê mir.
The Human Rights Association (İHD) Commission for Prisons in its statement stated that Yıldızbakan (65) was a cardiac and had chronic disorders due to being kept in high security prison for a long time.	Derbarê bûyerê de Komisyona Girtîgehan a Komeleya Mafên Mirovan (İHD) daxuyaniyek belav kir û diyar kir ku Yildizbakanê 65 salî nexweşê dil bû û herwiha ji ber ku demeke direj e di girtîgehên ewlekariya wan zêde de maye hin nexweşiyên wî yên kronîk hebûn.
According to İHD stats, there are 905 sick prisoners 323 of whom are seriously ill in Turkey. Minister of Justice Bekir Bozdağ had declared 2,300 people lost their lives in prison from 2009 to October 2016.	Li gorî daneyên İHDê li Tirkiyê di girtîgehan de 323ên giran bi giştî 905 girtiyên nexweş hene. Wezîrê Dadê Bekir Bozdag ragihandibû ku di girtîgehan de ji sala 2009an heta Cotmeha 2016an 2 hezar û 300 kes mirine.
The whole family is in prison	Hemû malbata Yildizbakan di girtîgehê de ne
The İHD in its statement also noted that they had several times demanded release of Yıldızbakan:	Li gorî daxuyaniya İHDê wan berê jî gelek caran daxwaza berdana Yildizbakan kirine:
“He started to go blind due to diabetes and he was seen in the risky group because he had embolism in four veins of his heart.	“Ji ber diyabetê êdî çavên wî baş neditît, ji ber ku 4 damarên dilê wî girtî bû di koma bi rîsk de dihate qebûlkirin û nekarîbû ameliyat biba.
“Even though execution of his sentence ended, he was not released because of the arbitrary circular letters issued by the Ministry of Justice.	“Ji ber pirsgirekên tenduristiyê 5 sal in me daxwaz dikir ku Yildizbakan bê berdan û herçiqas ku cezayê wî qediyabû jî ji ber giştînameyên kêfî yên Wezareta Dadê nedihat berdan.
“Mehmet Yıldızbakan’s two children and spouse are in high security prison as well.	“Du zarok, bûk û hevjîna Mehmet Yildizbakan jî di girtîgehê de ne ku dewletê ew bi darbestê berda.”
Işık University management has urged the academics, who signed the declaration entitled “We Will Not be a Party to This Crime” released by the Academics for Peace, to withdraw their signatures. Assoc. Prof. Dr. M. Sinan Birdal didn’t withdraw and was fired.	Alk. Doç. Dr. M. Sînan Bîrdal yek ji wan Akademîsyenên Aştîxwaz e ku danezana “em ê nebin şirîkên vî sûcî” îmze kiriye.  Zanîngeha Işikê M. Sînan Bîrdal ji karî avêt.
Declaring the incident on his social media account, Birdal said, “I was notified that I was discharged from Işık University after I refused to withdraw my signature. I will continue to advocate truth and freedom with the hope of seeing my students and colleagues again”.
