Peoples' Democratic Party's (HDP) Prison Commission Information Desk has published a report on the hunger strike, which has been launched by the prisoners sitting in İzmir Şakran Prison arrested or convicted in the trials of Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK) and Kurdistan Free Life Party (PJAK), suggesting the strikes has spread to other prisons as well.	Maseya Enformasyon a Komisyona Girtîgehan a Partiya Demokratîk a Gelan (HDP) rapora xwe ya derbarê grevên birçîbûnê de belav kir ku di 15ê Sibatê di girtiyên ji doza PKKê û PJAKê yên di Girtîgeha Şakranê de dabûn destpêkirin û paşê li gelek girtîgehan belav bibû.
In the report based on data acquired by HDP MPs, Human Rights Association (İHD), Initiative for Solidarity with Dungeons, Libertarian Jurists Platform (ÖHP) and Civil Society Association in Execution System (CİSST), the commission declared that in six different prisons, 76 prisoners 17 of whom are women, are on an indefinite and non-rotating hunger strike and in several other prisons definite and rotating hunger strikes have been going on since March 15.	Rapor li gorî agahiyên ji parlamenterên HDPê, Komeleya Mafên Mirovan, Înîsiyatîfa Piştevaniya Zindanan û Platforma Hiqûqnasên Azadîxwaz û Komeleya Di Sîstema Girtîgehan de Civaka Sivîl hatine standin pêk hatiye. Di raporê de behsa xebatên HDPê yên derbarê greva birçîbûnê de hat kirin. Herwiha hatiye diyar kirin ku ew ê pêvajoyê bişopînin û derbarê çalakiyan de rasterast û bi awayekî rêkûpêk raya giştî agahdar bikin.
How many prisoners on strike in which prisons?	Li kîjan girtîgehê, çend roj in grev berdewam dike?
According to the report, the prisons in which the indefinite and non-rotating hunger strikes continue and the number of days the prisoners carry out the hunger strike are as follows:	Di raporê de derbarê grevên birçîbûnê yên bêdem û bêdor de ev agahî tê dayin:
* 5 women prisoners from Şakran Hospital are on 44th day, 7 prisoners from Şakran T4 Prison on the 12th, 8 others on the 33th and 12 prisoners from Şakran T2 and T3 prisons are on the 47th day of the hunger strike	* Di Girtîgeha Şakranê de 5 girtiyên jin di 40emîn roja greva birçîbûnê de ne. Dîsa di Girtîgeha Tîpa T4 a Şakranê de 7 girtî di roja 12emîn, 8 girtî di roja 33yemîn, di Tîpa T2 û T3ê de bi giştî 13 girtî jî di 47emîn roja grevê de ne.
* 7 women prisoners from Sincan Women's Prison on the 39th day	* Di Girtîgeha Jinan a Sincanê de 7 jin di 39emîn roja greva birçîbûnê de ne.
* 10 prisoners in Tekirdağ Prison on the 26th day of the hunger strike	* Di Girtîgeha Tekirdagê de 19 girtî, di 26emîn roja greva birçîbûnê de ne.
* 5 women prisoners in Tarsus Women's Prison on the 20th day of the hunger strike	* Di Girtîgeha Jin a Tarsûsê de 5 jin di 20emîn roja greva birçîbûnê de ne.
* 10 prisoners in Bolu type-F Prison on the 6th day and	* Di Girtîgeha Tîpa F a Boluyê de 10 girtî di 6emîn roja greva birçîbûnê de ne.
* 11 prisoners in Hatay type T Prison on the 3rd day of the hunger strike.	* Di Girtîgeha Tîpa T a Hatayê de 11 girtî di 3yemîn roja greva birçîbûnê de ne.
Arrested HDP MPs are also on hunger strike	BIXWÎNE - DEMİRTAŞ: ME JI BO XWE TI DAXWAZ NÎNIN
HDP Co-Chair Selahattin Demirtaş and party's Hakkari MP Abdullah Zeydan who also went on a hunger strike due to "unlawful practices in Edirne Prison and no step being taken to stop hunger strikes" on March 31 had ended the strike on April 1 "within the scope of mutual commitments made with good intentions to solve the problems".	Di Girtîgeha Edirneyê de li ser rewşa heyî Hevserokê Giştî yê HDPê Selahattin Demirtaş û Parlamenterê HDPê yê Colemêrgê Abdullah Zeydan biryar girtibûn ku di 31ê Adarê de bikevin greva birçîbûnê. Piştî vê biryarê di 1ê Nîsanê de li gorî mesaja Demirtaş û girtiyan “Ji ber ku ji bo çareseriya pirsgirêkan niyeta pak derketiye holê” him girtiyên din him jî Demirtaş û Zeydan greva xwe ya birçîbûnê bidawî kiribûn.
27 year-old Evin Buldan, an editor of Diyarbakır-based Rojeva Media Newspaper created as a substitute to Azadiya Welat daily which was closed by a statutory decree, has lost her life of a heart attack in Turkey's southeastern Diyarbakır province on April 2.	Edîtora Rojeva Medyayê, Evîn Bûldan şeva dî, di 2yê Nîsanê de li Amedê çû ber dilovaniya Xwedê.
Buldan's funeral ceremony will be held today (April 3) in Yüksekova district in Turkey's southeastern province of Hakkari.	Rojnameya Rojeva Medyayê li Tirkiyeyê tekane rojname ye ku weşana bi Zimanê Kurdî dike. 
About Evin Buldan	Evîn Bûldan kî ye?
According to Şûjin daily, Evin Buldan had to move to a United Nations Camp in Maxmûr in Iraq with her family to escape from oppressions by the state when she was 4 years old and grew up there.	Li gor malpera Gazete Şûjinê dema Evîn Buldan 4 salî bû ji ber zordariya dewletê malbata wê bar kiriye kampa Mexmûrê.
İstanbul 25th Heavy Penal Court judges who ordered release in the trial of 21 journalists concerning “Fethullahist Terror Organization” have been relieved of duty.	Dadwerên 25emîn Dadgeha Cezayê Giran a Stenbolê ji ber ku di doza derbarê lingê medyayê yê “Rêxistina Terorê ya Fethulahî” (FETO) de biryara berdana 21 rojnamegeran dan, ji kar hatin dûrxistin.
The Supreme Board of Judges and Prosecutors (HYSK) Deputy Chair Mehmet Yılmaz in his statement said they have launched an investigation in line with the report prepared by the HSYK Inspection Board to inquire into all allegation against these people, Fevzi Çakır from Habertürk reported.	Li gorî nûçeya Fevzi Çakir a di Haberturkê de hatiye weşandin de, Wekîlê Serokê Lijneya Bilind a Dadwer û Dozgeran (HSYK) Mehmet Yilmaz di daxuyaniya xwe de gotiye ku ji bo lêpirsîn derbarê hemû îdiayên derbarê van kesan de bê kirin di çarçoveya wê rapora pêşîn de lêpirsîn hate destpêkirin ku rapor ji hêla Lijneya Teftîşê a HSYKê ve hatiye amadekirin.
The suspended judges are Chief Judge İbrahim Lorasdağı, and judges Barış Cömert and Necla Yeşilyurt Gülbiçim.	Dadwerên ku ji kar hatin dûrxistin: Serokê dadgehê İbharim Lorasdagi, dadwer Bariş Comert û Necla Yeşilyurt Gulbiçim.
Minister Bozdağ: It is not a discharge	Bozdag: Ne ji kar standin e
Minister of Justice Bekir Bozdağ commented on the matter:	Derbarê mijarê de Wezîrê Dadê Bekir Bozdag jî daxuyaniyek da:
“Suspension doesn’t mean discharge”.	“Ji kar dûrxistin, nayê wateya ji kar standinê.
What happened?	Çi bibû?
İbrahim Loğasdağı, the President of the court passing the verdict in the trial held before İstanbul 25th High Criminal Court of Justice, had ruled that Abdullah Kılıç, Ahmet Memiş, Ali Akkuş, Atilla Taş, Bayram Kaya, Bünyemin Köseli, Cemal Azmi Kalyoncu, Cihan Acar, Cuma Ulus, Gökçe Fırat Çulhaoğlu, Habip Güler, Halil İbrahim Balta, Hanım Büşra Erdal, Hüseyin Aydın, Muhammet Sait Kuloğlu, Murat Aksoy, Mustafa Erkan Acar, Oğuz Usluer, Seyid Kılıç, Yakup Çetin and Yetkin Yıldız be released.	Di doza lingê medyayê yê FETOyê de 26 jê girtî 29 kes dihatin dadgehkirin. Dadgeh biryar da ku Atilla Taş, Abdullah Kılıç, Ahmet Memiş, Ali Akkuş, Bayram Kaya, Bunyamin Koseli, Cemal Azmi Kalyoncu, Cihan Acar, Cuma Ulus, Gokçe Fırat Çulhaoglu, Habib Guler, Halil İbrahim Balta, Hanım Buşra Erdal, Huseyin Aydın, Muhammed Sait Kuloglu, Murat Aksoy, Mustafa Erkan Acar, Oguz Usluer, Seyid Kılıç, Yakup Çetin û Yetkin Yıldız bên berdan.
In addition, the prosecutor had objected to the decision of İstanbul 25th High Criminal Court of Justice ordering the release of had Hanım Büşra Erdal, Ahmet Memiş, Bayram Kaya, Cemal Azmi Kalyoncu, Cuma Ulus, Habib Güler, Halil İbrahim Balta and Muhammet Said Kuloğlu in the trial regarding the "Media organization of FETÖ". İstanbul 26th High Criminal Court had sustained the objection.	Dozgerî li hemberî berdana Hanim Buşra Erdal, Ahmet Memiş, Bayram Kaya, Cemal Azmi Kalyoncu, Cuma Ulus, Habib Guler, Halil İbrahim Balta û Muhammed Said Kuloglu hatibû derketin û 26emîn Dadgeha Cezayê Giran ya Stenbolê serîlêdana dozgeriyê qebûl kiribû. Di vê encamê de derbarê 8 kesan de biryara zevtkirinê hatibû standin.
“Coup” investigation was launched into the other released suspects Atilla Taş, Ali Akkuş, Hüseyin Aydın, Murat Aksoy, Mustafa Erkan Acar, Seyid Kılıç and Yetkin Yıldız, and detention warrants were issued for them.	Ji bo Atilla Taş, Ali Akkuş, Huseyin Aydin, Murat Aksoy, Mustafa Erkan Acar, Seyid Kiliç û Yetkin Yildiz de Serdozgeriya Komarî ya Stenbolê lêpirsîna “derbeyê” dabû destpêkirin û derbarê van kesan de biryara desteserkirinê derxistibû.
Three soldiers lost their lives and five others were injured in the attack.	Di encama êrîşê de 3 leşker mirin û 5 leşker jî birîndar bûn.
The injured soldiers have been delivered to the nearby hospitals for treatment.	Leşkerên birîndar ji bo dermankirinê rakirin nexweşxaneyan.
The indictment about 19 people including manager, writers and employees at Cumhuriyet newspaper has been covered in Sabah newspaper, however, the indictment is yet to be handed to defense attorneys.	Îdinameya derbarê 19 rêveber, nivîskar û xebatkarên rojnameya Cumhuriyetê de hatiye amadekirin di Sabahê de hat belav kirin ku îdianame hîna (14.08) nedabûn parêzerên rojnameyê.
According to Sabah, the offenses “Aiding an [illegal] organization though not being a member” and “being a member of an [illegal] organization” took place in the indictment.	Li gorî nûçeya Sabahê di îdianameya ku hîna ji hêla dadgehê ve nehatiye qebûlkirin de ji bo 19 kesan tohmetên “Herçiqas ku ne endamê rêxistina terorê ya çekdarî be jî alîkariya rêxistinê” û “Endamtiya rêxistina terorê ya çekdarî” cî digirin.
Cumhuriyet Foundation Executive Board Chair Akın Atalay, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board President Orhan Erinç, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Bülent Utku, Cumhuriyet Daily Editor-in-Chief Murat Sabuncu, columnists Hakan Kara, Hikmet Çetinkaya, Aydın Engin, Kadri Gürsel, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Güray Öz, Cumnhuriyet Foundation Board Member Önder Çelik, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Turhan Günay, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Musa Kart, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Hakan Karasinir, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Hakan Karasinir, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Mustafa Kemal Güngör, columnist Aydın Engin, Cumhuriyet Foundation Board Member Hikmet Çetinkaya, Cumhuriyet Newspaper Account Manager Günseli Ozaltay, daily’s correspondent Ahmet Şık, Cumhuriyet Newspaper former Editor-in-Chief Can Dündar, Cumhuriyet Foundation former Board Member Bülent Yener, journalist İlhan Tanır and Ahmet Kemal Aydoğdu arrested over his tweets were mentioned in the indictment.	Di îdianameyê de navê Serokê Lijneya Icra yê Weqfa Cumhuriyetê Akin Atalay, Serokê Lijneya Birêveberiya Weqfa Cumhuriyetê Orhan Erinç, Endamê Lijneya Birêveberiya Weqfa Cumhuriyetê Bulent Utku, Gerînendeyê Giştî yê Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê Murat Sabuncu, Şêwirmendê Weşanê yê Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê Kadri Gursel, Endamên Lijneya Birêveberiya Weqfa Cumhuriyetê Guray Oz, Onder Çelik, Turhan Gunay, Musa Kart, Hakan Karasinir, Mustafa Kemal Gungor, Hikmet Çetinkaya, nivîskarê Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê Aydin Engin, Midûrê Muhasebe yê Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê Gunseli Ozaltay, Nûçegîhanê Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê Ahmet Şik, Gerînendeyê Giştî yê berê yê Rojnameya Cumhuriyetê Can Dundar, Endamê berê yê Lijneya Birêveberiya Weqfa Cumhuriyetê Bulent Yener û ligel rojnameger İlhan Tanir, navê Ahmet Kemal Aydogdu yê ji ber parvekirinên wî yên Twitterê hatibû girtî di îdianameyê de heye.
What happened?	(EA/FD)
Village guard Mansur Solcan lost his life, one soldier and three village guards were wounded in the clash erupted yesterday (April 4) during the operation launched in Güzeldere village of Bingöl’s Genç district. Following the incident, Bingöl Governorship declared curfew in seven villages and eight neighborhoods prior to the operation to be launched in the forestry and mountainous areas.	Li gundê Guzeldere yê navçeya Gencê ya Çewligê di dema operasyona leşkerî de duh (4ê Nîsanê) pevçûn derket û di encamê de cerdevanê bi navê Mansûr Solcan mir, leşkerek û 3 cerdevan jî birîndar bûn. Piştî bûyerê Walîtiya Çewligê ragihand ku beriya operasyona li çoltar û daristanên navçeya Gencê ji bo 7 gund û 8 taxan biryara qedexeya derketina derve hatiye standin.
The governorship said the operation will be launched until further notice in order to “ensure people’s safety of life and property”.	Li gorî daxuyaniya Walîtiyê ji bo “sazkirina jiyan û mal û milkên gel” heta biryareke din li gundên Dikpinar, Gerçekli, Doşekkaya, Uçgul, Kavakli, Dedebag û Gozertepe û li herêmên di navbera taxên Demirboga, Karataş, Çekmece, Arakli, Yeniler, Ekinli, Gulluce û Bayramliyê yên Gencê de derketina derve hatiye qedexekirin.
Attack on HDP Bingöl provincial building	Li hemberî avahiya HDPê ya Çewligê êrîşê pêk hat
An attack was carried out on HDP provincial building by people who are reportedly relatives of the village guard who lost his life in the clash.	Di vê navberê de hin kesên ku hat îdiakirin xizmên cerdevanê di pevçûnê de mir, êrîş birin ser avahiya HDPê ya Çewligê.
As the party building was damaged, the group chanting slogan “martyrs are immortal our land is indivisible” was blocked by police. The group then dispersed after chanting slogans for a bit more in front of the building.	Polîsan pêşiya koma ku sloganên “Şehîd namirin, welat dabeş nabe” berz dikir girt û ew asteng kir. Li ser vê rewşê komê piştî ku sloganên xwe berz kir û li ber avahiyê sekinî belav bû.
Hakkari Governorship on its website announced that curfews were declared in one village and three hamlets in Şemdinli district.	Li Colemêrgê jî biryara qedexeya derketina derve
The governorship in its statement said the curfew was declared to “protect citizens’ safety of life and property” prior to the operation to be launched. (TP/EKN/TK)	Walîtiya Colemêrgê di malpera xwe ya fermî de aşkere kir ku li gundê Altinsu û Dereboyu û di navbera sînorên gundikê Elde û Meydanê de biryara qedexeya derketina derve hatiye ragihandin.(TP/EKN/FD)
Teaching at the Department of Mathematics in Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences at Bilgi University for 18 years, academic member Chris Stephenson’s work permit has been cancelled by the Council of Higher Education.	18 senelik işimden atıldım. YÖK çalışma iznimi, hiçbir gerekçe göstermeden, iptal etti.#ChrissizBilgiyeHayır pic.twitter.com/4GIM3uF5Q7
Following the termination of Stephenson’s work permit, “Bilgi Dayanışma” (Bilgi Solidarity) launched a campaign on Twitter with the hashtag “#ChrissizBilgiyeHayır” (#NotoBilgiWithoutChris).	Stephenson biryara betalkirinê li ser hesabê xwe yê Twitterê bi mesaja “Ez ji karê xwe yê 18 salan ve hatim avêtin. YOKê bêyî ti hincet nîşan bide destûra min betal kir. #ChrissizBilgiyeHayir” ragihand.
What happened?	“Ji Bilgi ya bê Chris re na”
Bilgi University academic member, Chris Stephenson was taken into custody at İstanbul Justice Palace in Çağlayan on March 15 where he came to support three academics who were detained because of Academics for Peace/İstanbul group’s declaration.	Piştî ku destûra Stephenson hat betalkirin “Piştgiriya Bilgi yê” got ku ““Ji Bilgi ya bê Chris re na!”:
Stephenson was detained in front of the courthouse at around 9:15 a.m. on charge of having Newroz invitations with signature of Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP) Provincial Presidency.	“Destûra kar a hempîşeyê me Chris Stephenson ê ku 18 sal in li Zanîngeha Bilgiyê weke mamoste kar dike, ji hêla YOKê ve bêyî ti hincet bide nîşandan hat betalkirin.”
He was released on the day (March 16) he appeared before prosecutor but taken to Kumkapı Repatriation Center over demand for deportation. Stephenson left for England on the same day.	Piştî jêpirsîna dozgeriyê Stephenson hat berdan lê destûr nehate dayin ku ew ji edliyeyê derkeve û polîsan ew bir Navenda Paşdeşandinê ya Kumkapiyê.
İstanbul Provincial Immigration Management Directorate declared on March 18 that Stephenson is not prohibited to return to Turkey. Stephenson saying he will “gladly return to Turkey” to bianet, then came back to Turkey. 	Dozger ji bo Stephenson daxwaza dersînorkirinê xwest û Stephenson bêyî ku li bende biryara dersînorkirinê bisekine di 17ê Adara 2016an de çû Îngiltereyê.
Charged with “terror organization propaganda”, Stephenson appeared before judge on June 23, 2016. 13th Heavy Penal Court ordered acquittal of Stephenson. (EKN/TK)	Stephenson piştî Midûriyeta Birêveberiya Koçberiyê ya Stenbolê daxuyaniyek da û got ku qedexeya ketinê ji bo wî nîne, biryar girt ku were Tirkiyê.
Sûjin correspondents Zeynep Turgut and Nişmiye Güler have been detained in a café in Bitlis' district of Tatvan where they were present for news coverage.	Polîsan du nûçegihanên Şûjinê yên ji bo çêkirina nûçeyan çûbûn Tetwanê, desteser kirin.
According to Sûjin’s report, it is unknown where the journalists, who were detained following an ID check by police, were taken to. (EA/TK)	Li gor nûçeya Şûjinê herdu nûçegihan li kafeyekê rûniştine. Polîsan pirsa nasnameya wan kiriye û nasnameya wan kontrol kiriye. Paşê ew desteser kirine. Piştî desteserkirina wan ti agahî ji wan nehatiye standin.(EA/MB) 
Criminal Judgeship of Peace has issued a confidentiality order upon request of Diyarbakır Prosecutor’s Office for the investigation of the killing of university student Kemal Kurkut, who was shot to death at the entrance of Newroz celebrations area in Diyarbakır.	Dadweriya Ceza ya Sulhê ji bo lêpirsîna kuştina xwendekarê zanîngehê Kemal Kurkut biryara veşarîtiyê stand ku Kurkut li Amedê roja Newrozê dema dixwest bikeve qada Newrozê ji hêla polîsan ve hat kuştin.
With the confidentiality order, Kurkut family’s attorneys cannot access to information and documents in the investigation file until the case is presented.	Bi ev biryara dadweriyê re parêzerên malbata Kurkut heta ku doz vebe wê nikaribin xwe bigihînin dokuman û zanyaiyên di dosyeya lêpirsînê de. Parêzer wê giliyê vê biryarê ösjsıç
Diyarbakır Public Prosecutor’s Office earlier had a gag order issued as to the killing of Kurkut.	Beriya niha jî Serdozgeriya Komarî ya Amedê derbarê kuştina Kurkut de biryara qedexekirina weşanê girtibû.
What happened?	Çi bibû
Kemal Kurkut was shot to death by police at security check point on Evrim Alataş street near Newroz Park in Turkey’s southeastern Diyarbakır province on March 21.	Kemal Kurkut ê 23 salî û ji Adiyamanê xwendekarê Beşa Muzîkê ya Fakulteya Huneran a Zanîngeha Înonuyê bû.
In the photos taken at the incident time, Kurkut was seen bare-chested quarreling with police at the check point and starting to run passing through the check point. As some of the police fire in the air, some others fire on him.	Di 21ê Adarê de di dema Newroza Amedê de di xala kontrolê de ya polîsan a li ser Kolana Evrim Alataş a li nêzîkî Park a Newrozê rastî gulebarana polîsan hat. Heta ku rakirin nexweşxaneyê Kurkut mir.
dihaber reported that Kurkut was shot despite a police chief ordering “Don’t shoot”.	Walîtiya Amedê diyar kir ku di destê Kurkut de kêr hebû û “gumana xwekujiyê li ser wî hebû” û herwiha derbarê bûyerê de lêpirsîn dane destpêkirin.
Diyarbakır Governorship declared that Kurkut had a knife in his hand, he was “suspected to be a suicide attacker”, and an investigation has been launched into the incident.	Paşê dihaberê hin fotograf bi raya giştî re parve kir ku di dema bûyerê de hatibûn kişandin. Di van fotografan de tê dîtin ku di destê Kurkut de kêr heye û jora laşê wî bê cil e. Kurkut ê ku bi polîsan re nîqaşan dike dest bi bazdanê dike û polîs guleyan bera hewayê dide. dihaberê nivîsand ku fermandarekî polîsan gotiye “gule bernedin” lê digel vê jî gule bera Kurkut hatiye dayin.
First hearing of the trial concerning 15-year-old Berkin Elvan being killed with a gas cartridge during the Gezi Protests was held yesterday (April 6).	Berkîn Elvan di dema Berxwedana Gezîyê de, bi fîşeka gazê  hat kuştin. Doza ji bo Berkîn Elvanî îro dest pê kir.
The participation was broad in the hearing.	Doz li Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a 17. a Stenbolê tê birêvebirin.
Police officer F.D. charged with “murder with eventual intent” pleaded, Elvan family voiced their demand for arrest.	Serdozgeriya Cezayên Giran lêpirsîn dabû destpêkirin. Lêpirsîn Îsa Dalgiçî amade kiriye û wek bersûc bi tenê F.D.yê polîs hatiye nîşandan.
Second hearing is on July 6	Dadgehê daxwaza BAROyan red kir
The chief judge rejected the arrest demand and ruled that the trial continue on July 6, 2017 at 10 a.m.	Malbata Elvanî, dêya wî Gûlsûm û bavê wî Samî xwestin digel zarokên xwe beşdarî dadkirinê bibin. Dadgehê daxwaza wan qebûl kir. 
Defendant: I don’t remember clearly	Daxwaza anîna bersûcî hat redkirin 
Verdict has been rendered in the lawsuit in which former bianet Kurdish section editor Yunus Önal was charged with “being a member of an [illegal] organization”; Önal was sentenced to 6 years and 3 months in prison on Turkish Penal Code (TCK) Article 314/2 (being a member of an armed organization).	Yek ji edîtorên berê bianet/Kurdîyê bi îdiaya “endambûna rêxistinê” hat dadakirin. Li Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a 2.  Bilîsê rûniştina 5. ya dadkirinê pêk hat. Dadgehê bi xala 314/2yê TCKyê [bi endambûna rêxistina terorî] 6 sal û 3 meh cezayê girtinê da Onalî.
Public Prosecutor Nedim Özbey prepared the indictment based on dancing the halay with the song “Oremar”, attending a press conference on education in mother tongue, and witness statement.	Dozgerê bi navê Nedîm Ozbey, di lêpirsînê de diyar kir ku Onalî digel sitrana “Oremarê” govend girêdaye û beşdarî daxuyaniya li ser zimanê dayikê bûye.
Bitlis 2nd Heavy Penal Court accepted the indictment and opened the case on the TCK 314/2 over “being a member of an [illegal] organization”.	Dadgeha Cezayên Giran a 2.  Bilîsê li ser lêpirsîna navborî dest bi dadkirinê kir.
Önal: This is a conjunctural trial	Onal: Dadkirin li gor konjonktûrê ye
Speaking to bianet, Önal said:	Onalî ji bianetê re got:
“I believe this is a conjunctural trial in both its investigation and verdict stages. The verdict seems to prove my point. What I did was journalism. I worked with Kurdish, which has been banned for decades and is despised by the state. I voiced my most humane demands in a democratic way within the framework of the freedom of expression. I told these in my plea as well.	“Ez difikirim ku di dema lêpirsînê û dadkirinê de bi temamî li gor konjonktûrê biryar hatiye dayin. Ji xwe biryara hatî dayin jî vê yekê ispat dike. Min rojnamegerî kir. Min bi wî zimanî kir ku dewlet wî hezim nake û bi deh salan ew qedexe kiriye. Min daxwazên herî mirovane, bi rêyên demokratîk û bi azadiya xwe-îfadekirinê diyar kirin.
“However, it is of course impossible to expect a trial complying with universal legal norms from the rationale of a government which has burned down the Kurdish cities since 2015, sent hundreds of journalists and the MPs elected by millions to prisons, closed down a large number of media outlets. Because in this conjunctural, even mentioning the word ‘Kurdish’ is sufficient to be targeted by the government.	“Di sala 2015ê de, ji wê hikûmeta ku li ber çavên dinyayê bajarên kurdan şewitand û roxand, parlamenterên bi milyonan kesan deng dabûyê girtin, rojnameger girtin, organên medyayê girtin û qedexe kirin, nayê hêvîkirin ku ew li gor normên navneteweyî yên hiqûqê biryarê bide. Di vê konjonktûrê de gotina navê kurdan jî têrê dike ku mirov ji desthilatê re bibe armanc.
“A court rendering such an absurd verdict with ‘offenses’ like ideological halay, demand for education in mother tongue just to suppress people is an indicator of how Turkey disregards the universal legal norms. My response to this situation is; I am glad that I’ve become a right defender, a journalist and a teacher”.	“Biryara ku ji ber govend-girêdana îdeolojîk û daxuyaniya ji bo zimanê zikmakî hatî dayin biryareka der-aqilan e. Ev biryara dadgehê dayî nîşan dide ka li Tirkiyeyê rêzikên hiqûqa navneteweyî çi qasê tê binpêkirin. Li ser vê yekê bersiva min ev e: Baş e ku ez mafparêz im, rojnameger im û bûme mamoste.”
Witness statement was let out of consideration	Îfadeya şahidî hat paşguhkirin
Statement of a witness who was not included in neither investigation nor prosecution questioning was put in the file. The aforementioned witness S.T. had said “He is in charge of group’s (PKK) junior branch“, but in the hearing, he said “I couldn’t recognize the person whom I saw on TV and you called Yunus Önal, I don’t recall seeing him before”. Nevertheless, this statement was left out of consideration.	Di dema dadkirinê de îfadeya şahidan nebû û paşê lê hat zêdekirin. S.T.yê şahid pêşiyê gotiye “berpirsê ciwanên Tetwanê yê rêxistinê ye” û paşê gotiye “Ew kesê ez li ser şaşeyê dibînim ku hûn dibêjin Yûnûs Onal e, nayê bîra min, ne di bîra min de ye ku min berê dîtibe an na.”
Önal’s attorney Mimar Önal objected against the court decision at Erzurum Regional Court of Appeal. The decision is awaited.	Heyeta dadkirinê ya ku Alper Saykal serokatiya wê dike û endamên wê Nîsa Çamtahta û Nîlgûn Can e biryara xwe weha eşkere kirine.
Önal was sacked because of the investigation	Ji ber lêpirsînê ji karî hatibû derêxistin
An investigation was launched concerning this case as Yunus Önal was working as Kurdish editor for Sputnik. Önal was blocked by police officers as he was heading home and was taken into custody on March 18, 2016. Remaining in custody for two days, Önal was released following the prosecutor’s office’s questioning. Sputnik sacked Önal after his detention was covered in the media.	Dema ku Yûnûs Onal edîtorê beşa Kurdî yê Sputnîkê ji ber heman dozê lêpirsîn li ser wî hatibû dest pê kirin. Di 18ê Adara 2016ê de polîsan li ser rêya mala Onalî rêya wî girtibûn û ew desteser kiribû. Piştî ew du rojan desteserkirî ma dozgerîyê biryara serbestberdana wî dabû. Ji ber nûçeyên di medyayê de li ser desteserkirina Onalî hatî nivîsîn. Spûtnîkê ew ji karî derêxistibû.
About YunusÖnal	Yûnûs Onal kî ye?
Önal graduated from Department of Social Sciences in Education Faculty at 19 Mayıs University. He started to study for master at the same department. He wrote his thesis on Women’s Representation in Kurdish Folklore. He taught Kurdish in Kurdi-Der, which was closed with a Statutory Decree.	Wi di sala 2012ê de li  Zanîngeha 19 Mayisê, Beşa Zanistên Civakî ya Fakûlteya Perwerdeyê qedand. Di heman salê de wî li Zanîngeha Alpaslanî ya Mûşê, di beşa Ziman û Çanda Kurdan dest bi xwendina masterê kir. Wî teza xwe li ser Temsîlkirina Jinan a Di çanda Kurdan de nivîsî. Wî li Kurdî-Dera ku bi Biryarnameya di Hikmê Qanûnan de hatibû girtin ders dan.
He started journalism at the DİHA. He served as publishing coordinator at Mevsimlik Magazine and as editor-in-chief at Radio Dengê Kurdî. He worked as an editor at Sputnik and most recently, he was a bianet Kurdî editor from May 2016 to April 2017. (EA/TK)	Wî li DIHAyê dest bi rojnamegeriyê kir. Li kovara Mevsîmlîkê bû koordînatorê weşanê. Di Radyoya Dengê Kurdî bû midûrê weşanê. Li Spûtnîkê wek edîtor xebitî. Di navbera Gulana 2016ê-Nîsana 2017ê de edîtorê kbianet/Kurdîyê bû.(EA/MB) 
Curfews imposed in Turkey’s southeastern Cizre, Silopi, İdil and Central districts of Şırnak have been lifted.	Li navenda Şirnexê û navçeyên Hezex, Cizîr û Silopyayê di hin sietên şevê de derketina derve qedexe bû. Walîtîya Şirnexê qedexeya ku ji beriya salekê îlan kiribû rakir.
The curfew declared on March 14, 2016 lasted for eight months. Şırnak Governorship announced to have lifted the curfew.	Di 14ê Adara 2015ê de, li navenda Şirnexê ji bo hemî sietên roj û şevê qedexe hatibû îlankirin. Piştî 8 mehên qedexeya ji bo hemî sietan, di 8ê Sibata 2017ê de hat guhertin. Piştî guhertinê di sietên 23:00-02:30ê de derketina derve hat qedexekirin.
The Human Rights Association prepared a report	Qedexeyên li Şirnexê
A committee of nine people from the Human Rights Association (İHD), Human Rights Foundation of Turkey (TİHV) and Diyarbakır Bar prepared report of their examinations in Şırnak on March 28, 2017.	*Cara pêşiyê li Şirnexê di 16ê Tebaxê de derketina derve hat qedexekirin. Di dema qedexeyê de li navçe û navenda Şirnexê operasyonên leşkerî hatin kirin.
Minister of Interior Süleyman Soylu has organized a press meeting due to the security measures taken in the constitutional amendment referendum to be held on April 16.	Referandûm dê di 18ê Nîsanê de bê kirin. Ji bo referandûmê 319 hezar û 222 hilbijêr dikarin dengên xwe bi kar bînin.
Soylu said that 17,674 personnel were assigned for the protection of transformers.	Sûleyman Soylûyî eşkere kir ku 17 hezar û 674 karmend dê ji bo ewlehiya trafoyên ceyranê kar bikin.
In order to ensure security, a total of 380,223 personnel consisting of 251,788 security personnel and 128,445 gendarmerie personnel was assigned.	Li gor daxuyaniya wezîrê karên navxweyî ji bo ewlehiya referandûmê 251 hezar û 788 polîs, 128 hezar û 445 Cendirme dê kar bikin.
“6,000 soldiers were assigned in case of need”	“6 hezar leşker dê di amadebaşiyê de bin”
“Furthermore, 51,148 security rangers and 18,675 voluntary security rangers in 26 cities were assigned for the referendum.	“Herweha li 26 bajaran 51 hezar û 148 cerdevan dê kar bikin. 18 hezar û 675 cerdevanên dildar jî dê kar bikin.
“In addition to these, 6,000 Land Forces Command personnel are planned as reinforcement in case of need”. (EKN/TK)	“Ji bilî van hemî ewlehiyan 6 hezar leşkerên girêdayîyên Fermandeya Giştî ya Hêzên Bejayî dê di amadebaşiyê de bin.”(EKN/MB) 
According to reports that bianet compiled from local and national newspapers, news websites and agencies, men have killed 29 women and 3 girls; raped 5 women; forced 38 to sex work; harassed 12; sexually abused 68 girls; injured 39 women.	Li gor nûçeyên bianetê ji rojnameyên herêmî û neteweyî, ji malper û ajansan berhev kirîn, mêran di meha Adarê  de 29 jin û sê zarok kuştine, tecawiz li pênc jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 12 jinan kiriye, bi zorê karkerîya sekskirinê li 38 jinan daye kirin, îstismara cinsî li 68 keçên zarok kiriye, 39 jin birîndar kirine.
In the first quarter of 2017, men killed 82 women; raped 18; harassed 31; sexually abused 116 girls and inflicted violence on 90 women.	Di hersê mehên destpêka 2017ê de mêran 82 jin kuştine, tecawiz li 18 jinan kiriye, destdirêjî li 31 jinan kiriye, îstismara cinsî li 116 zarokên keç kiriye, tûndkarî li 90 jinan kiriye.
Murder	Kuştin
38% of the murdered women attempted to divorce or break up or rejected the murderers’ proposal to recommence a romantic relationship.	Ji sedî 38ê jinên hatîn kuştin ji beriya bêne kuştin xwestine ji partnerê xwe/mêrê xwe cida bibe an jî daxwaza lihevhatinê ya wan qebûl nekiriye.
27.5% of the femicides took place in public places including workplace, in front of the house, park or on the street.	Ji sedî 27,5ê jinên hatîn kuştin li cihên civakî yên wek karger, kolan û parqan hatine kuştin.
52% of the women were killed by their husbands or boyfriends, 24% by ex-husbands: One woman was killed by her brother, one by elder brother, seven by ex-husbands, seven by husbands of official marriage, four by husbands of religious marriage, one by client, two by sons, four by boyfriends, one by grandchild, one by a male stranger.	Ji sedî 52yê jinên hatîn kuştin mêrê wan an jî destgirtiyê wan ê berê ew kuştine. Birayê jinekê ew kuştiye. Mêrên berê yên heft jinan ew kuştine. Mêrên çar jinan ku bi zewaca dînî bi wan re zewicîne ew kuştine. Destgirtiyên çar jinan ew kuştine. Mêrekê nenasê jinekê ew kuştiye.
55% of the murders were committed with firearms: Seven women were killed with knives; one by being strangled; one by being cut in throat; two by being battered; four with pistols; seven with rifles.	Ji sedî 55ê jinên hatîn kuştin bi çekên gulleavêj hatine kuştin. Heft jin bi kêran hatine kuştin, jinek hatiye xeniqandin, gewriya jinekê hatiye birrîn, du jin hatine derbdan û bi wê yekê hatine kuştin, neh jin bi demanceyan û heft jin bi tifekan hatine kuştin.
Four of the murdered committed suicide after the murders and another one attempted suicide.	Çar mêrên ku jin kuştine piştî kuştina jinan xwe jî kuştine. Mêrekê hewildaye xwe bikuje.
The cities in which the murdered women lived are Adana (2), Afyon (1), Ağrı (1), Ankara (1), Antalya (1), Antep (3), Balıkesir (1), Bursa (4), Hatay (1), İstanbul (4), İzmir (3), Kastamonu (2), Manisa (1), Maraş (1), Muğla (2), Tokat (1).	Bajarên ku lê jin hatine kuştin: Edene (2), Afyon (1), Agirî (1), Enqere (1), Antalya (1), Dîlok (3), Balikesîr (1), Bursa (4), Hatay (1), Stenbol (4), Izmir (3), Kastamonu (2), Manîsa (1), Maraş (1), Mugla (2), Tokat (1).
Rape	Tecawiz
Two of the rape incidents took place in women’s apartments; one in workplace; one in a forestry area to where the woman was forcibly taken. Whereabouts of one rape incidents was not reported in the media.	Du bûyerên tecawizê li mala jinên tecawiz lê hatî kirinqewimiye. Bûyereka tecawizê li kargehekê pêk hatiye. Bûyerek jî li daristanê pêk hatiye ku jin ji beriya bûyerê bi zorê ji bo wê derê hatiye birin.
Of the rapists one was the woman’s husband of religious marriage; one was husband of official marriage; one was boyfriend; one was friend; one was a male she met for job interview.	Mêrê jinekê yê ku bi zewaca fermî pê re zewiciye tecawiz li wê kiriye. Mêrekê bi zewaca dînî bi jinekê re zewicî tecawiz li wê kiriye. Destgirtiyê jinekê tecawiz lê kiriye. Serkarê jinekê dema jin ji bo karî çûyî nik wî tecawiz lê kiriye.
A man who raped his friend in the workplace and another man who raped his wife of religious marriage aged 18 were released, two men were arrested. The legal procedure about the man who raped his wife wasn’t covered in the media.	Mêrekê ku li kargehê tecawiz li hevkara xwe kiribû serbest hatiye berdan. Mêrê keçeka kêmendam a 18 salî bi zorê tecawiz li wê kiriye.
The cities in which the rape incidents took place are Ankara (1), Diyarbakır (1), Kayseri (2), Samsun (1).	Li gor nûçeyên hatîn nivîsîn bajarên bûyerên tecawizê lê pêk hatîn ev in: Enqere (1), Amed (1), Qeyserî (2), Samsûn (1).
Sex work by force	Karê sekskirinê yê bi zorê
At least 38 women were forced to sex work in six cities.	Di meha Adarê de, li şeş bajaran karê sekskirinê li 38 jinan hatiye kirin.
The cities in which the sex work by force took place are Adana (5), Muğla (5), Kastamonu (3), Urfa (3), İstanbul (21), Samsun (1).	Bajarên ku lê bi zorê karê seksê li jinan hatiye kirin ev in. 
Harassment	Destdirêjî
Men harassed at least 12 women in March.	 Di meha adarê de mêran herî kêm destdirêjî li hemberî 12 jinan hatiye kirin.
33% of the harassers exposed themselves.	Ji sedî 33 kesên destdirêjî kirine pêşanderî kirine.
16% of the raped women were with disability.	Ji sedî 16 jinên rastî destdirêjiyê hatin astengdar in.
Five of the rape incidents took place on the street; two on public transportation; one in hospital; four in care center for people with disabilities.	5 destdirêjî li kolanê, 2 jê di wesayita giştî de, yek li nexweşxaneyê, 4 jê jî li navenda xwedîkirina astengdaran çêbûne.
66% of the harassers were male strangers: Eight women were harassed by male strangers; two by chiefs at workplaces; two by director of care centers.	Ji sedî 66 kesên destdirêjî kirine mêrên ku ji hêla jinan ve nayên naskirinin: 8 jin ji hêla wan mêrên ku jin wan nas nakin ve rastî destdirêjiyê hatine, 2 jin ji hêla midûrên wan ên kar, 2 ji jîn jî ji hêla midûrên navendên xwedîkirinê rastî destdirêjiyê hatine.
One of the harassers was arrested; one was released; three were detained but the following proceedings were not covered by the media. A care center for people with disability’s director, who harassed four women two of whom were with disabilities, were first appointed to another place from Yozgat and then was suspended.	Kesekî ku destdirêjî kiriye hatiye girtin, yek jî serbest hatiye berdan, 3 kes jî hatin desteserkirin lê berdewamiya pêvajoyê di nûçeyan de cî negirtiye. Midûrê navenda xwedîkirina navenda astengdaran a Yozgotê ku 2 jê astengdar li hemberî 4 jinan destdirêjî kiribû, pêşîn tayînî ciyekî din kirin, paşê ji kar dûr xistin.
The cities in which the harassments took place are Ankara (1), Antep (1), Diyarbakır (1), Kocaeli (2), Konya (1), Niğde (1), Samsun (1), Yozgat (4).	Bajarên ku destdirêjî lê hatine: Enqere (1), Amed (1), Kocaeli (2), Konya (1), Nigde (1), Samsun (1), Yozgat (4).
Child abuse	Istismara li zarokan
At least 68 girls were sexually abused in March.	Di meha adarê de herî kêm 68 zarokên keç rastî istismara zayendî hatin.
50 girls were abused by a man working at school; four by friends of closest men to them (friends of their fathers, elder brothers, boyfriends); two by men living in the same district; one by driver; one by a man who she recently met; six by male strangers. Identities of other four men were not covered by the media.	50 zarok li dibistanê rastî istismara zayendî ya mêrekî karker hatine ku mêr li dibistanê kar dikir. 4 zarok ji hêla hevalên mêrên gelekî nêzîkî wan (bav, bira yan jî evîndarê hevalên wan), 2 heb ji wan ji hêla mêrên li heman navçeyê dijîn, yek ji wan ji hêla ajokarekî, yek ji wan ji hêla mêrê ku hevdû nû nas kiribûn, 6 ji wan jî ji hêla mêrên ku qet wan nas nakin rastî istismara zayendî hatin. Di nûçeyan de behsa nasnameya wan mêran nehatiye kirin ku istismar li hemberî 4 zarokên keç kirine.
Four of the harassment incidents came to light by girls’ getting pregnant. Another one was realized after girl’s parents saw the messages the harasser sent.	4 bûyerên istismarê di encama ducanîbûna zarokan de derket holê. Yek ji wan jî di encama dîtina wan peyaman de derketiye holê ku kesê istismar pêk aniye ji zarokê re dişand.
12 men were arrested; four were released on probation; one was released after his testimony was taken. Legal proceedings about the seven harassers weren’t reported in the media.	12 mêr hatin girtin, 4 ji wan bi şertê kontrola edlî ve hatin berdan, yek ji wan piştî îfade dayinê hat berdan. Pêvajoya hiqûqî ya derbarê 7 kesên istismar kirine de di nûçeyan de derbas nebûye.
The cities in which sexual abuse incidents took place are Adana (1), Aydın (2), Erzurum (2), Giresun (1), İstanbul (1), İzmir (6), Kocaeli (1), Konya (2), Manisa (1), Mardin (50), Samsun (1).	Bajarên ku bûyerên istismara li hemberî zarokên keç pêk hatiye di çapemeniyê de wiha cî girtiye: Edene (1), Aydin (2), Erzerom (2), Giresun (1), Stenbol (1), İzmir (6), Kocaeli (1), Konya (2), Manisa (1), Mêrdîn (50), Samsun (1).
Violence-injury	Tûndkarî û birîndarkirin
Men inflicted violence on 39 women in March. Three of them were trans women.	Di meha adarê de mêran li hemberî 39 jinan tundûtujî bikar anîn an jî ew birîndar kirin. 3 ji van jinên trans bûn.
26% of the violence-injury incidents took place in places such as workplace, café, in front of school, in the middle of the street, in press conference.	Ji sedî 26ê bûyerên tundûtujiyê li kargeh, kafe, li ber dibistanê, li kolanê, li pêşiya kamerayan an jî di civînên çapemeniyê de pêk hatine.
15% of the women were subjected to violence for attempting to divorce or break up. 8% of the women were subjected to violence by their sons-in-law for their daughters attempting to divorce.	Ji sedî 15ê jinan ji ber ku xwestine ji mêran veqetin rastî tundûtujiyê hatine. Ji sedî 8ên jinan jî ji ber ku keçên wan xwestine dest ji mêrên xwe berdin rastî tundûtujiya zavayan hatin.
Two women were subjected to violence despite restraining order.	2 jin digel biryara dûrxistina derxistine jî rastî tundûtujiyê hatin.
56% of the women were subjected to violence with methods that could lead to death; 10 women were injured with firearms; seven with knives; two with cleavers; one with chainsaw; two with jimmy; one by being strangled.	Ji sedî 56ê jinan rastî wê tundûtujiyê hatine ku bi rêbazên kuştinê hatine kirin: 10 jin bi rêya çekên bi gule, 7 ji wan bi kêran, 2 ji wan bi satoran, yek ji wan bi bireka bimotorê, 2 ji wan bi hesin hatine derb kirin. Mêrekî dest xistiye stuyê jinekê ew bi vî awayî birîndar kiriye.
Three assailants were released. Only four assailants were arrested; a man who stormed in a café and shot at his ex-girlfriend injuring also six other people in the café was first released, then arrested. Furthermore, a woman, who took the knife from her husband who was strangling her and wounded him, was arrested. Legal proceedings about the 23 assailants were not reported in the media.	3 êrîşkar hatin berdan. Tenê 4 êrîşkar hatin girtin; mêrekî ku girte ser kafekî û gule bera ser destgirtiya xwe ya berê da û 6 kesên din ên kafeyî birîndar kir pêşîn hat berdan, paşê hat girtin. Herwiha jinek hat girtin ku kêra di destê mêrê xwe yê destê xwe xistibû stuyê wê de girt û ew birîndar kiribû. Pêvajoya hiqûqî ya derbarê 23 êrîşkaran de di nûçeyan de cî negirtin.
The cities in which violence-injury incidents took place are Adana (9), Afyon (2), Amasya (1), Ankara (2), Antalya (2), Antep (1), Aydın (3), Bolu (1), Çorlu (1), Denizli (2), Diyarbakır (1), Düzce (1), Erzurum (1), Giresun (1), İstanbul (1), Kayseri (2), Kocaeli (1), Mardin (1), Mersin (1), Ordu (1), Trabzon (1), Urfa (3). (ÇT/TK)	Bajarên ku tundûtujî û birîndarkirin lê çêbûn: Adana (9), Afyon (2), Amasya (1), Enqeke (2), Antalya (2), Dîlok (1), Aydin (3), Bolu (1), Çorlu (1), Denizli (2), Amed (1), Duzce (1), Erzerom (1), Giresun (1), Stenbol (1), Kayseri (2), Kocaeli (1), Mêrdîn (1), Mersin (1), Ordu (1), Trabzon (1), Riha (3). (ÇT/MB/FD)
20th Metin Göktepe Journalism Awards have been delivered to its laureates with a ceremony held at Barış Manço Cultural Center.	20emîn Xelatên Rojnamegeriyê ya Metin Goktepe li Navenda Çandê ya Bariş Mançoyê bi rêûresmekê ve hatin dayin.
In addition to Kadıköy Mayor, journalists and figures from political and media arena attended the award ceremony organized on birthday of Metin Göktepe, who was murdered on January 8, 1996 as he working as correspondent at Evrensel newspaper.	Rêûresma xelatê di salvegera rojbûna nûçegîhanê rojnameya Evrenselê Metin Goktepe de hat dayin. Di dema rêûresmê de gelek rojnameger, Şaredarê Kadikoyê, hin siyasetmedar jî beşdar bûn.
Metin Göktepe’s mother Fadime Göktepe didn’t attend the ceremony this year due to her illness.	Fadime Goktepe, dayika Metin Goktepe ji ber nexweşiya xwe îsal beşdarî rêûresmê nebû lê bi rêya videoyekê mesaja xwe rê kir û got ku “Metin di nava dilê min de ye û ez li wir im”.
In addition to awards for written and visual news, photography and local journalism, three jury’s special awards were granted.	Îsal li gel xelatên nûçeyên nivîskî, dîtbarî û ya foto û rojnamegeriya herêmî 3 xelatên taybet ên juriyê hat dayin.
Elif Akgül from bianet and Canan Coşkun from Cumhuriyet newspaper were given Jury’s Special Award for their file, which was published simultaneously on both bianet and Cumhuriyet between January 18, 2017-January 20, 2017, on the chronology of Hrant Dink murder, which was committed 10 years ago.	Ji bianetê Elif Akgul û ji rojnameya Cumhuriyetê Canan Coşkun bi nûçeya xwe ya dosyayê xelata taybet a juriyê wergirtin. Akgul û Coşkunê derbarê doza kuştina Hrant Dink de nûçeyek amade kirin û di navbera 18 û 20ê Rêbendana 2017an de di heman demê de him di bianetê him jî di Cumhuriyetê de weşandin. Coşkun wiha axivî:
Families of the prisoners, who are arrested or convicted of PKK and PJAK trials and started hunger strike on February 15 in İzmir Şakran Prison, have as well started hunger strike.	Ji bo piştgiriya grevên birçîbûnê yên ji hêla girtiyên ji doza PKKê û PJAKê di 15ê Sibatê de li Girtîgeha Şakranê dabûn destpêkirin û paşê li gelek girtîgehan belav bibû, malbatên girtiyan dest bi greva birçîbûnê kirin.
Peoples’ Democratic Party (HDP), Democratic Regions Party (DBP), Free Women’s Movement (TJA), and Democratic Society Congress (DTK) members support the hunger strike led by the prisoners’ families.	Endamên Partiya Demokratîk a Gelan (HDP), Partiya Herêmên Demokratîk (DBP), Tevgera Jinên Azad (TJA) û Kongreya Civaka Demokratîk (KCD) jî beşdarî greva birçîbûnê ya malbat pêşekiya wan dikin kirin.
Stating that they “started hunger strikes to prevent deaths”, Aldemir went on:	Daxwazên kesên di greva birçîbûnê de ne
“The prisoners have very humane and natural demands. The attitudes in the prisons are inhumane and unethical. We demand the rights already present in the law. We wanted to make ourselves heard to prevent deaths and we’ve resorted to this protest with solidarity”.	Greva birçîbûnê ya di 15ê Sibatê de li Girtîgeha Şakranê ya ji hêla girtiyên ji doza PKKê û PJAKê hatibû destêpkirin, bi beşdariya gelek girtîgehên li Tirkiyê bi awayê bêdem an jî bidem berdewam dike.
* Heavy isolation conditions for PKK’s imprisoned leader Abdullah Öcalan be lifted	“Bila şert û mercên tecrîda giran ên li ser Serokê PKKê Abdullah Ocalan bên rakirin.”
* Bans and destruction in Kurdish cities be ended	“Bila qedexe û wêrankirina li bajarên Kurdan bidawî bibin.”
* Bad attitude against the prisoners be changed.	Bila helwestên xirab ên di girtîgehan de li hemberî girtiyan bidawî bibin.”

Reacting against President’s chief advisor Şükrü Karatepe’s article on “state system”, Nationalist Movement Party (MHP) Chair Devlet Bahçeli has said, “The president remains silent before this statement. If he approves this, then what can be decision of the nationalists who are against the state system within two days”.	Serokê Partiya Nijadperest a Gelî(MHP), Devlet Bahçelî beşdarî bernameyeka Star TV-NTVyê bû. Di bernameyê de li ser nivîsa şêwirmendê serokkomarî axivî. Şêwirmendê serokkomarî Şûkrû Karatepeyî bi nivîseka li Kovara Lêkolînên li ser Bajarî, eşkere kiribû ku birêvebiriyên wek eyaletan dê bêne çêkirin.
Official statement on Twitter	Bahçelîyî li ser çêkirina eyaletan û birêvebirina wan xwe aciz kir. Wî got:
About this article, Bahçeli said:	Daxuyaniya li Twîtterê
“Now an advisor stands and speaks about the state system. People issuing such statement do either sabotage goal of the Justice and Development Party or assigned through an inner deal. Time will tell which one it is. Now if the president’s advisor says ‘We will implement state system’ and the president remains silent against this, then what can be the decision of the nationalists who are against the state system within two days”.	Piştî gotinên Bahçelîyî li Twîtterê bû yek ji mijarên zêde hatî xwendin, MHPyê daxuyanîyek belav kir û eşkere kir ku: “Em ê di 16ê Nîsanê de ji bo gelî, ji bo miletî û ji bo biserkeftina Tirkbûnê bibêjin Erê.”

The unofficial results of the referendum on the constitutional amendment indicate a lead for the "Yes" vote.	Li gor encamên nefermî di referandûmê de dengê “erê” zêdetir e.
According to the unofficial results published by the state-run Anadolu Agency, ratio of the "Yes" votes is 51.18%, "No" votes is 48.82% as of 9:30 a.m. 24,325,817 electors voted "Yes", 23,201,726 electors voted "No". The voter turnout is 85.46%.	Li gor encamên Ajansa Anadolûyê eşkere kirîn, ji dengên di referandûmê de hatîn avêtin ji sedî 51,18 dengê “erê” ne û ji sedî 48,82 dengên “na”yê ne.
Most of the 18 articles of the Constitutional Amendment Package will enter force on March 3, 2019 when the general and presidential elections will be held simultaneously.	18 xalên Qanûna Bingehîn dê bêne guhertin. Li gor planê heta 19ê Çiriya Paşiyê ya 2019ê hemî xalên nû dê bikevin di rewacê de.
Yet three articles of the package can enter into force instantly. These articles concern membership of the President to a political party, the reorganization of the Supreme Council of Judges and Prosecutors (HSYK)as well as abolishing military justice system.	Sê xal hene ku dibe ew di demeke kurt de bikevin di rewacê de.
According to these articles	*Serokkomar dê bikare bibe endamê partiyekê.
* No military courts will be established except disciplinary courts. Yet in state of war, military courts can be established in order to rule in issues regarding crimes committed by military personnel with regards to their missions. (NV/DG)	*Ji bilî dadgehên disiplînê dadgehên leşkerî jî dê bêne avakirin.(NV/MB)
In the referendum on the Constitutional Amendment Package, "No" votes are leading in nine out of 10 provinces to whose municipalities which were originally governed by Democratic Regions Party (DBP) a trustee was appointed.	 Ji bo 10 şaredariyên ku şaredarên wan ji Partiya Herêman a Demokratîk(DBP) bûn qeyûm hatibûn şandin.
The results originate from the non-official referendum results announced by the state-run Anadolu Agency.	Li gor daneyên Ajansa Anadolûyê belav kirîn ji wan 10 bajaran li 9 bajaran dengê NA li bajarekî dengê ERÊ zêde bûne.
In the local elections in 2014, the DBP was the leading party in 11 provinces and in 95 districts.	Di hilbijartinên herêmî yên 2014ê de, li 11 bajar û 95 navçeyan DBP bûbû partiya yekem.
With statutory decrees issued under the State of Emergency, the trustees were appointed to 85 municipalities in total including the municipalities of 10 provinces, 64 districts and 11 towns.
